Why are you joining us in reminiscing about the past?
Brother! I'm the one who wanted to bring him along.
Why bring him along, then I have to go.
I used to sit in this spot when I was in school, hehe.
The candied haws I hid here are still here, yuck, so disgusting, I'll throw them away.
This spot must be the teacher's favorite spot for asking questions, right?
Ah, you just reminded me of those days, I'm still terrified of being found out that I didn't learn, probably because of what happened then.
Let's go see the teacher.
Strange... Where did the teacher go?
(Oh no, the teacher of the Imperial School has been... by me...)
Do you know where the teacher went?
It's him! He's the one who killed the teacher!
(I'm doomed, I actually let these kids go back then...)
It's you, {PlayerName}? Why did you do this?
I'm sorry, I can't forgive what you've done. Excuse me.
You... aren't you the Ling Hongxuan and Ling Mengdie siblings?
Teacher, long time no see.
Teacher, long time no see.
These two were my best students, the sister was even more talented than the brother.
It's a pity that the sister got a strange disease later on and had to slumber all day, so she stopped studying.
Little sister Ling, how's your illness now?
Thank you for your concern, teacher. Thanks to {PlayerName}'s efforts, my illness has completely healed.
Completely healed? That's good, that's good.
You are...
It's the top scholar!
I didn't expect you to be the top scholar, I always thought you were just a commoner, it seems I was wrong.
Wow... top scholar, I didn't expect you to be the top scholar, then am I not...
Huh? What relations do you have with the top scholar {PlayerName}?
Well... I'll tell you later.
Seems like a promising talent.
I'm deeply grateful for your efforts in seeking treatment for Ling Xiaomei.
Oh, sir, there's no need for that. I've already expressed my gratitude.
These two siblings are my proud disciples, the pride and joy I can boast about even when I'm in my seventies or eighties.
Back then, Ling Xiaomei was studying in disguise as a boy.
Oh? So Mengdie had such an experience when she was young?
At that time, the Imperial School did not allow girls to enroll, but Mengdie's talent surpassed that of most men in the world.
Mengdie's talent and learning touched the teacher, and she herself had the desire to study, so she disguised herself as a boy and enrolled in the school with my and the teacher's protection.
It was because of Mengdie that the Imperial School broke the tradition of not allowing girls to enroll for many years.
So that's the story of Mengdie studying here.
Oh, I'm sorry, I'm teaching the children and can't delay any longer.
Alright, we won't disturb you any longer, sir.
There really hasn't been any change here.
The mark my brother kicked is still there, hehe.
Why didn't you continue studying at the Imperial School?
It's all my fault...
I started falling asleep in class, and when the teacher found out, he went to the Hall of Rejuvenation to seek medical advice for me.
But then one day, the teacher was away, and another substitute teacher came to teach. He was rather impatient, and when he saw me sleeping, he pulled off my headscarf.
When your headscarf was pulled off and your hair fell down, your identity as a girl was revealed?
Yes. The whole class knew.

After that day, I stopped going to school. I stayed at home to recuperate, and three days later, my brother chose to run away from the Imperial School and took me on the journey to seek medical treatment.
Ling Xiaomei, you're back!
It's you again!
Who is this person?
Seems like an old classmate? I can't recognize him...
Ling Hongxuan teleports to 77,153 down right BattleIdle
{yell}, watch me beat you into a pig's head again!
{yell}, stop! Let's talk, not fight!
Brother, who is this? Why are you suddenly wanting to hit him?
This kid, after knowing that you're a girl, actually ran to our doorstep to see you.
Every time he came, I beat him up. I didn't expect him to dare to come today!
Ling Xiaomei, listen to me!
I fell for you before I knew you were a girl!
I was even doubting whether I was gay, but that day I realized I wasn't!
Give me a chance! Ling Xiaomei!
Daring to flirt with my sister in front of me! Seems like you're itching for a beating!
No fighting! No fighting! Let's compete with our pens!
Even if we compete with pens, you'll still lose miserably!
Pfft~
Ling Mengdie grabs your hand tightly, pulls you to stand in front of the two.
You two stop fighting, I have something to announce.
{PlayerName}, how dare you hold Mengdie's hand?
(If you look closely, it's your sister holding my hand...)
MeLing Mengdie and {PlayerName} have formed a bond in front of the God of Marriage's Shrine, and have received the blessing of the matchmaker.
The... God of Marriage's Shrine?
{yell} Wha... What!
Yes, I have decided to walk with {PlayerName}, through the wind and rain, until we are seventy or eighty years old, I will not forget what I said today.
I will also protect Mengdie for the rest of my life, and I will never let go of her hand.
I... I actually...
I approve of you, {PlayerName}.
Really? I thought...
{PlayerName}, I told you he was a good person.
Why are your palms so sweaty?
MeLing Hongxuan approves of you as a rare talent of this era, worthy of my sister.
And you have done a great favor to us siblings, I can't go against my sister's wishes.
Woo hoo, my sister has grown up in a blink of an eye...
Hey, brother, why are you crying?
Can't I cry when my sister is entrusted to someone else?
(I have never seen Ling Hongxuan in this state, it seems that Mengdie is really important to him.)
Don't worry, I will never let Mengdie down.
Go away, I don't want to talk to you.
Uh...
Phew... I feel like I've finally resolved the biggest problem in my heart.
Let's go, {PlayerName}, don't forget what you just said. We still have seventy or eighty years to go!
Don't worry, I will definitely not forget such words!
{PlayerName}, I must teach you a lesson...
Brother-in-law, I've long sensed that there must be a battle between us...
Don't call me that! I want to...
Stop!
Brother, if you make things difficult for {PlayerName}, you are making things difficult for me!
{yell} Uh!
Also, if you do anything to {PlayerName}, I will ignore you!
{yell} Uh!
And, if you dare not approve of us, I will ignore you too!
{yell} Ah!
(Mengdie's few words knocked Ling Hongxuan to the ground...)
{PlayerName}, I approve of you...
Don't misunderstand! I'm doing this so my sister won't be sad.
Don't worry, I will never let Mengdie down.
Go away, I don't want to talk to you.
Uh...
Phew... I feel like I've finally resolved the biggest problem in my heart.
Let's go, {PlayerName}, don't forget what you just said. We still have seventy or eighty years to go!
Don't worry, I will definitely not forget such words!
{PlayerName}, have you been in contact with the Jiuli Tribe?
Uh... Yes, I have been in contact with the Jiuli Tribe.
I have a very important thing to ask for your help...
No, your Toxicology is not enough, if you die, I will be in danger...
If you can improve your Toxicology, I will think about whether this is feasible...
{PlayerName}, have you been in contact with the Jiuli Tribe?
Uh... Yes, I have been in contact with the Jiuli Tribe.
(Deep breath) I will have to face them eventually...
{PlayerName}, I must go to the Jiuli Tribe.
Don't worry, I will protect you.
No, you are indeed strong, but it's not enough to face the Jiuli Tribe directly.
I need to make some more preparations...
Miss Jiang Ziyan is going to face the Jiuli Tribe...
Why do you want to face the Jiuli Tribe?
What preparations do you need to make?
No problem, I'll help you.
It wouldn't hurt to tell you. Do you know why the Jiuli Tribe was after me last time?
Because you possess a rare treasure? The Bug-attracting fragrance?
Exactly, that item originally belonged to my master. When she defected from the Jiuli Tribe, she left many things behind.
Your master defected? From the Jiuli Tribe?... I didn't expect you to have such a connection with the tribe.
I sneaked into the Jiuli Tribe that day to retrieve my master's belongings. However, I was discovered as soon as I got the Bug-attracting fragrance, and was chased all the way to the Central Plains.
Is the Bug-attracting fragrance really that important? I just feel it's a bit more convenient when catching bugs...

If you, like me, have been eating what my master gave me since childhood and practicing the internal skills she taught, the scent of the Bug-attracting fragrance greatly benefits the growth of poison skills.
Before I met you, I used the Bug-attracting fragrance to make a significant breakthrough while being chased by the Jiuli Tribe, which gave me the power to escape.
It seems that others are not fortunate enough to enjoy it.

The last time I went to the Jiuli Tribe, I learned that my master's most important notes fell into the hands of Miao Muli. Unless I ask him directly, I'm afraid I won't know where my master's insights are.
Then just go and ask...
That's the Jiuli Tribe! Do you know how dangerous the Jiuli Tribe is?

My master once warned me that the people of the Jiuli Tribe are like tigers and leopards, they enjoy eating children, hang human heads around their waists, feed poisonous insects with enemy corpses, and offer living people as sacrifices.
They have no ethics, no norms. Even close relatives such as parents and siblings can be killed by their own hands for sacrifices.
(Should I go... to such an uncivilized place, is it really that terrifying?)
(But it's also possible that her master made it up to scare her.)
I only took back a Bug-attracting fragrance, and their leader Miao Muli sent many people to chase me all the way to the Central Plains...
Especially this Miao Muli, my master said she had seen Miao Muli before she defected, although he was just a child at that time...

He was only seven or eight years old, but he was extremely fond of torturing animals for fun, framing others with a righteous face. Such a cruel and ruthless person from a young age has become the leader of the entire tribe...
How can I not be careful?
It's always right to be cautious.
But Miao Muli is already dead...
What, Miao Muli is dead? Really?
Yes, I saw him die with my own eyes.
If that's the case, things will be much easier...
Just take me directly to the main camp of the Jiuli Tribe, I might be able to find my master's insights directly.
Taking you there is just a trip, no problem.
Good, let's set off as soon as possible.
Do you have any plans before facing the Jiuli Tribe?
My master has an unfinished research on Gu poison. In her expectation, if the research is successful, the power will be infinite.
If I can master that kind of Gu poison, I will have much more confidence even facing Miao Muli.
I heard that the martial arts of the Jiuli Tribe mainly involve Gu and poison. Will it be effective to use Gu poison against them?
My master has spent her whole life researching how to restrain the poison skills of the Jiuli Tribe, so there's no need to worry about this.
So how should this research be conducted?
We need to sneak into the lizard den of the Jiuli Tribe. My master told me that only that poisonous mountain cave is the suitable environment.
So the reason this research has not been completed is because your master couldn't return to the Jiuli Tribe...
Very well. Let's infiltrate the Jiuli Tribe lizard cave, complete the Poisonous worm experiment, and finally confront Miao Muli to retrieve the master's insights.
For the first time, this filthy place is so clean...
Found it, everything is here.
Thanks to me for cleaning up the trash here, haha.
Since you've found everything, then...
I still have one thing to do.
The master has developed a kind of Gu, I want to refine it, maybe you can help.
How do you want to refine this Gu?
In the lizard cave. The master said that only the Mountain cave filled with poison barrier is the suitable environment.
That's a small problem, I'll go with you.
{PlayerName}, wait, let me take a breather...
Your face is as pale as paper, are you really that nervous?
I'm not nervous.
Phew... Okay, let's go in.
Wait! You guys...
What, you want to stop me again?
Not to stop you, but to stop this woman in the purple Taoist robe!
The order from above is to watch out for women in purple Taoist robes!
Although I don't know why I should be careful, but if you insist on bringing her into the tribe, I have to inform the people above to confirm, then I can let you go!
(Fortunately, I only encountered a low-level character who doesn't know the intention of the higher-ups, that's good...)
I'm taking her to see the chieftain. <color=#097a76>(Persuade reached level 2 Intermediate)</color>
Can you do me a favor for our friendship? <color=#097a76>(Relations≥60)</color>
(Bribe) Did you guys drop some money? <color=#097a76>(Scrap silver 2两)</color>
Let Miao Caidie handle it.
Turn around and run away.
Is that so?
He comes and goes freely in the tribe every day, probably familiar with the chieftain.
If he goes to the chieftain to complain about us, we'll be in trouble...
Better not to stop.
You guys go in.
Ah, forget it, let you in.
Don't mention me if there's any problem.
Ah yes, yes, this is our lost money.
You guys go in, make way, don't block me from picking up money.
Hey, why are you guys still stopping us?
{PlayerName} is a friend of the Jiuli Tribe, and so is this sister in the purple dress!
Welcome, Saintess!
Honored guest, please come in.
No, now is not the time, we need to find a way to enter the lizard cave to complete the experiment...
Phew... I finally came here, the place that the master mentioned countless times...
The poison gas here... There is a troublesome existence here, it should be a lizard.
It will seriously interfere with my experiment, let's solve this problem first.
Finally solved the lizard problem, can Jiang Ziyan's experiment continue now?
Great, now there should be no one or anything to disturb my experiment...
Phew... I finally came here, the place that the master mentioned countless times...
The environment here, wet, hot, little ventilation, enough miasma, is an excellent place for experiments.
How is your Toxicology experiment going to be conducted?
Do you know the principle of Gu refining?

Of course, it's about placing hundreds of poisonous insects in the same vessel, then letting them kill and devour each other. The last surviving insect, having gathered all the poisons in one body, is the "Gu".
Yes, the general method for all Gu is similar. Different Gu require different types of poisonous insects, quantities, materials of the vessel, size, and environment for refining.
The Gu that I want to refine is the one that my master has been longing for and wanted to complete the most...
Let's start with the preparations. I will look for a place where poisonous gas sinks and accumulates here. You help me catch some poisonous insects.
You want me to catch a hundred? That's too much...
This is too time-consuming. I have almost prepared all the poisonous insects.
Now only a few are missing. You take this Bug-attracting fragrance, you should be able to catch them quickly.
Alright, give me the bug list.
I need a Spider, a Poisonous moth, a Scorpion, a Centipede, two Praying mantis, and three Stinkbugs.
Spider, Poisonous moth, Scorpion, Centipede are poisonous insects, I can understand, but why are Stinkbug, Praying mantis also included?
When I catch insects, if I catch a Praying mantis, the Worm-catching net is likely to be damaged by its double blades. If it's a Stinkbug, I will definitely be smoked by its fart.
I can't figure it out either, maybe Praying mantis and Stinkbug are just nutrients for the Gu.
I think you can find all the bugs in this hole, so you don't have to run around and waste my time.
So, have you gathered all the bugs?
Not yet.
Then don't bother me. It takes a lot of effort to detect the place where the poisonous gas accumulates here.
What do you need from me?
(I brought Jiang Ziyan, who is being hunted by the Jiuli Tribe, here...)
(Should I inform Miao Muli about this?)
Betray Jiang Ziyan!
Protect Jiang Ziyan's secret!
Nothing, just checking if you're okay.
Ha... Do people from the Central Plains like such complicated rituals?
Chief, have you been hunting a purple-robed Taoist nun?
Purple-robed Taoist nun? Oh-- I almost forgot about her if you didn't mention it.
She stole my favorite Bug-attracting fragrance!
I've tricked her into the lizard den, she's now trapped.
What, she actually ran to the lizard den under my nose!
Hmm... you did a good job, after I send someone to deal with her, I will give you a good reward!
Hehehe! Thank you!
What, {PlayerName}, you! You!
Hehehe... Jiang Ziyan, I didn't expect you to walk into the trap... Hahaha!
I have to thank {PlayerName} for delivering you to me, hahaha!
This is what I should do, hehe!
I didn't expect you to pretend to be a decent person, I was fooled and trusted the wrong person...
So my master was right...
Do you think I will surrender, huh...
Hahahaha! No one in this world can take my things and run away!
Tonight the ViperPoisonous Scorpions have an extra meal!
Hey, I heard that Jiang Ziyan's master left some insights with you...
So you're interested in this too? Well, it doesn't matter if I give it to you, but I'm afraid you won't understand it, take it!
Oh! Let me take a good look...
Five quarters later...
Damn it, there are too many codes and cryptic languages in this understanding, I can only understand a very superficial part.
I'm afraid only Jiang Ziyan and her master can decipher all the content...
So, have you gathered all the bugs?
I just happen to have the Bug she wants on me, should I give it to her?
They're all here.
Not yet.
Then don't bother me, I'm detecting the gathering place of the poison gas here, it's quite exhausting.
Good, I've also found the most suitable location.
It's right here!
So what do we do next?
Let me see... next... dig a hole 4 inches deep here, then place the Gu porcelain...

This Gu porcelain requires the mud from the Fire ant nest, along with the Fire ant and the ant queen in the nest to be roasted... the finished product should sound clear when knocked, it's really troublesome.
I'm getting a headache just listening to you. You didn't prepare this Gu porcelain, did you?
The master prepared one, but she never made it back to the Jiuli Tribe. It was later smashed by her, I've glued it back together, but I don't know if it can still be used.
Never mind, let's dig the hole first.
Here we go...
A quarter later, you dug a hole three inches deep...
Slow down!
What's wrong?
Jiang Ziyan bent down and tapped around in the hole. Soon, she dug out a buried porcelain from the dirt wall of the hole.
There are ants scattered like stars on the surface of this porcelain, could it be Fire ants?
Correct, this is an incomplete Gu porcelain.
It must have been buried by the master before she defected, there are still some that slipped through the net...
Wait, your expression doesn't look right, you're not going to smash it too, are you?
I'd like to... but not until after the Gu is refined.
Let's get started.
Jiang Ziyan buried the Gu porcelain in the hole, all kinds of ferocious poisonous insects fell into the Gu porcelain. Then the lid was sealed, and the whole Gu porcelain was buried with soil.
Now we just wait for the results.
Okay.
(This silence is too torturous!)
(I need to find something to talk about.)
Which poisonous insect do you think is most likely to win and become the Gu?
First of all, Spider is impossible, Spider is good at weaving webs, just now it fell into the vessel with hundreds of insects, it didn't have time to weave webs, its combat power was greatly reduced.
Centipede is dexterous, but its body is too long.
Scorpion is highly poisonous, has pincers and Poisonous Vine, and also has A armor. I quite like it.
Finally, how are you going to use this Gu when it's refined?
No one knows, because this research has never been completed, everything is unknown.
But it's certain that the hundreds of poisons swallowed and gathered in the Gu body need to be refined.
The poison refined should be related to the type of poisonous insect that finally wins...
You never mentioned to me that you have a master, where is your respected master now?
Hmph... she's long dead.
From your tone, your relationship with your master wasn't very good?
Not very good? I wish I could bring her back to life, kill her with my own hands, and scatter her ashes!
(This master and disciple have turned against each other!)
I was adopted by her, and I've been running around with my master since I can remember.
It seems that your master defected from the Jiuli Tribe before she adopted you.
That's not right, how could a woman on the run adopt a child, isn't that just a burden?
How should I know?
She often scolds me as a burden, but when I try to escape from her, she goes crazy and grabs me...
Your master... doesn't treat you well?
Not well? If she treated me as a human being, I wouldn't be thinking about killing her day and night.
Your master adopts you, abuses you, and doesn't let you go... It's hard to understand.
Her abuse and harshness are just venting all the grievances and pressures she suffered on the way of escape on me.
As for her keeping me... maybe she's afraid that all her research on Toxicology will disappear from the world after her death...
Your master wants to find a successor, to pass on her mantle to you?
Humph... I won't follow her will.
I want to find all her hard work left in the world, burn it all, burn it clean!
So you risked danger to sneak into the Jiuli Tribe to steal the Bug-attracting fragrance, and to get the notes from Miao Muli, just to destroy everything?
That's correct.
Why did you insist on coming to the lizard den to complete this Gu refining experiment?
This is her dying wish, I have to fulfill it.
Ah? Your words seem a bit contradictory? Did you just say you hate her, or was it me dreaming that you were talking to me?
She raised me without giving birth to me, which is kindness. She treated me inhumanely, which is hatred. Kindness is kindness, hatred is hatred.
I fulfill this last wish, put an end to this research, as a return for her kindness in raising me.
Destroying everything after completion is my revenge.
(Jiang Ziyan's concept is really different from ordinary people...)
(But she grew up like this, it's reasonable for her concept to be a bit twisted.)
Should I continue to chat with her?
Talk to me about something else?
Wait silently for the Gu refining to be completed.
I want to know more about your... master.
After all, you are so special, I'm afraid I can't find another person like you in this world.
So, understanding your master's past might help me understand you better.
Ha... I always have to find someone to vent some things in my heart.
The reason why my master was not accepted by the Jiuli Tribe was because she studied toxicology and found the critical weakness of the Jiuli Tribe's poison skills.
Those who learn Jiuli poison skills will not live long. Unless they use inhuman methods to transform their loved ones into medicine people, and then harvest their blood.
So she started researching new poison skills?
That's correct.

The top masters in the world are just practicing the martial arts left by their predecessors to the extreme. And the truly talented martial arts geniuses have the skill to improve martial arts, and even create their own martial arts.
Your master... might be a genius.
Maybe.
She was studying toxicology in the Jiuli Tribe, and it was going very smoothly. Later... it was discovered by the leader of the Jiuli Tribe at that time.
The poison skill she researched, compared with Jiuli poison skill, is not weak, and there will be no problem of short life.
But the problem is that those who have learned Jiuli poison skill, if they learn my master's poison skill again, they will die from the poison entering the blood.
And my master's poison skill is very restraining to Jiuli poison skill.
So the leader of Jiuli couldn't tolerate her?

Why not? As long as my master is willing to cooperate with his plan, promote her poison skill, deceive and harm political enemies, and ensure that the leader's descendants can sit firmly in the position of the tribe leader.
Indeed, politicians have a long-term vision...
So your master refused the leader and defected? It seems she has some merits in terms of morality.

Who knows, it might just be a beautified excuse. Maybe the master agreed to cooperate, but due to uneven distribution of spoils, or being treated as a pawn, she was betrayed and fled. Hmph... anyway, all the people at that time are dead, no one will know the truth.
What have you been through...
There might be a possibility, that is, the transition from old to new. New things are always naturally conflicting and hostile to the old interest groups.
It depends on which version you believe.

Later, the Jiuli Tribe improved their poison skills based on the master's research. Now their poison skills are not so life-shortening, but they still need to use the blood of their close relatives to enhance their power.
After the master fled, she took me, disguised as a Taoist nun, hiding and continuing to research her poison skills.
She usually uses her beauty to manipulate men, and I was already disgusted with her. Seeing her flirting with men, I feel disgusted with men as well.
No wonder when I first met you, I saw you making things difficult for men.
Men protect her, support her, and finally become her poison test subjects. They die in extreme pain, their bodies twisted and changed horribly, which makes me even more disgusted with men.
If any man dares to approach me, no matter how angry the master will be and how she will torture me, I will poison him to death.
(Growing up seeing the horrible state of men being poisoned to death, how much psychological trauma must this leave on men...)
The poison you used on the waiter that day just made him have diarrhea. Compared with your master, you are simply a Bodhisattva.
Hmph, who knows. If I learn all the skills of the master, maybe it will be different.
She forced me to learn poison skills and eat poisonous insects. When she needed to maintain her image in front of men, I was the one who caught poisonous insects and found corpses for her.
You even use corpses for experiments?
Most of the time it's the fresh corpses of just dead wild animals.
But if I say I haven't used human corpses, would you believe me?
She always missed the notes and items she left in the tribe, and always wanted to find an environment comparable to the lizard cave.
Before she could find it, she fell into the insect pit she created with her own hands. She didn't have time to leave a last word, and her body was gone.
A generation of poison masters died in a ridiculous way on the path of pursuit, died by their own hands... It can be considered a kind of standard ending.
Hmph...
When I sorted out her relics, I found... most of her research was left in the Jiuli Tribe, or remembered in her heart. The notes she wrote after fleeing were just a small part of it.
That's why I tried every means to return to the Jiuli Tribe, retrieve all her research, and then destroy it...
For such revenge and risking danger to enter this place, you are really admirable...
You just said that those men were protectors, supporters, and test subjects for your master. So... what about me to you?
You guess.
One shichen later...
The sound in the Gu porcelain seems to have stopped... Has the Gu been refined?
Silence... Let me listen...
Yes, it should be refined...
Let's dig it out!
Let's open it and see what bug has eaten ninety-nine poisonous insects and survived to the end... Centipede, or Scorpion?

A... farting bug!!
Hehehehahahahaha!
{yell}Hahahahahahahahaha!
{yell}Hahahahahahahahaha!
Jiang Ziyan laughs uncontrollably, without any image, like a madman, as if all the laughter of his previous life burst out at this moment.
Stinkbug! Hahahahaha!
{yell}The king of bugs you researched is a farting bug!
{yell}Did you see that? Huh? Your hard work is just a farting bug!
{yell}Hahahahahahahaha!

Ha..., ha..., ha--, really, I'm laughing to death.

Hmph...
So how do you plan to deal with this Stinkbug king? Any ideas?

Well, then we...
Ah!!!

I want to catch it! How did it get into my nostril!
It's my fault for not keeping it properly, you've been infested!
I've been infested with a farting bug! What should I do!
Don't panic... let me find a way... how do you feel now?
I feel...
It doesn't seem to be a problem.
Pfft.

No, it's actually your illusion.
Pfft.

Pfft... maybe... maybe this is the power of the Stinkbug...
Stop laughing at the side, help me deal with this bug!
Don't panic, let me check the notes first...
Pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft.
Pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft.
Pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft.
I... I feel like I'm being hollowed out!
Brother, you have a great rhythm, are you accompanying my flute sound?
If it wasn't so hard to breathe right now, I would love to play a duet of "Mountain and River" with you.
If you dare to play music at this moment, I will never let you go when I stop farting!
Little stinker, I'm sure you're a little stinker this time. This bug is great, give one to everyone on Dirty Street!
Then Dirty Street will become Fart Street!
I was right to wear a mask, but... the mask can't hold it anymore, disgusting...
Stop making sarcastic comments!
I feel like I'm back in the animal pen of the manor, with a strong smell and... loud and continuous animal roars!
What animal roars! Lu Jian Nan!
Brother, your momentum can be compared to the drumming in the army!
But the momentum of the army drums is first blood, then decline, and finally exhaustion.
But your momentum is getting stronger and stronger!
I'm almost dying, spare me!
I heard the call! Thump thump thump thump thump, hey, where are you going, monster!
This is not the sound of your opera gong!
Quickly take this pill, then press on your Guimen, Guanyuan, and Huiyin acupoints!
No, it's not stopping!
I'm not very familiar with Gu techniques, if this method doesn't work, I'm helpless...
There's actually a problem you can't solve, am I really done for this time?
Don't worry, let me play a tune to calm the Gu worm in your body!
Ah... it stopped, it stopped. I'm really grateful to Caidie...
Caidie could have helped you faster, but the sound of the music was severely interfered with...
Caidie, don't say anymore... I'm about to cry...
This Gu worm is only temporarily dormant, it may never act up again, but it hasn't been completely eradicated.
Caidie has never seen this Gu before, and doesn't know how to completely eradicate it. Maybe only Miss Ziyun knows.
I can't tolerate this thing staying in my body!
Ha! I have to save myself!
Stop... it stopped!
This is the darkest moment of my life... I don't want to experience it a second time...
Although the Gu worm has been temporarily suppressed, I'm at a loss as to how to completely eradicate it...
Ziyun! Ziyun! Save me!!!

Ha... ha... it finally stopped...
The Gu worm is only dormant for now, it may never be triggered, but to completely eradicate it requires other methods...
Save me! I can't tolerate this thing staying in my body!
I have to remove this bug, otherwise my Gu refining was in vain...
Let me study my master's notes...
Found the method to solve the Gu.
What is it? What is it?
Great sorrow, great joy, deafening...
What kind of riddle is this? I don't quite understand...
First... you need to be in an <color=#c44b0e>Exhausted</color> state, standing next to a large bell, listening to the heavy tolling of the bell.
Then, in an <color=#c44b0e>Exhilarated</color> state, listen to the bell toll again.

The Gu worm will sense your body, if you are extremely tired and critically injured, it will be restless and want to escape. At this time, the bell tolls heavily, the Gu worm is tormented by the sound, and is in pain.
Then when you suddenly feel great joy, your heart opens, the Gu worm finds a way to escape, and the bell tolls again, it can be expelled in one fell swoop.
This is not solving the Gu, this is tormenting me to death!
<color=#c44b0e>Exhausted</color> requires my Stamina to be very low.
Exhausting myself is not a difficult task...
<color=#c44b0e>Exhilarated</color> requires raising my Mood. As for the big bell...
The big bell at Shifa Temple, I might be able to use it...
Although the process will be painful, compared to non-stop farting, what's a little pain?
When you're ready, let's go to Shifa Temple together.
You were nearby just now, right? Did you hear the sound of thunder in the lizard den?
The sound of thunder? Haha, that might be...
The call of the lizard as spring arrives, when all things revive...
Is the call of the lizard so terrifying when spring comes?
Like thunder, like drumming, and a smell spreading...
It seems I need to find a second lizard to keep it company soon...
What are you going in for? Let's figure out how to get the Gu out of your body first...
If you want to use the bell of Shifa Temple, you should at least tell Hui Yuan.
Otherwise, ringing the bell privately might cause chaos in the whole Shifa Temple.
Master Hui Yuan, I have a strange Gu in my body and need to use the bell of your temple to shake the Gu out of my body with the bell sound.
Amitabha, saving a life is better than building a seven-story pagoda. Feel free to use it, I will inform the monks not to care.
Thank you, Master.
Abbot, I have a strange Gu in my body and need to use the temple bell to shake the Gu out of my body with the bell sound.
Amitabha, if the disciple is in trouble, how can the master not save him? You can ring the bell yourself, I will inform the monks not to care.
Thank you, Abbot.
Ha... There's no need to ask the bald monk at all, we can just ring the bell, haha.
It's better to bring Jiang Ziyan with us. Without her watching, ringing the bell privately might cause unnecessary trouble...
No... There's no movement in my body...
Could it be because I'm not tired enough?
But after ringing the bell, I feel a bit more tired.
Wow! I can feel the Gu jumping around in my body!
Good, now try to improve your Mood.
Mood, improve Mood...
Sir, every time I'm in a bad mood, eating sweets makes me feel better.
I'll give you my favorite food, hope your mood gets better soon~
Thank you so much, my princess!
I feel surprisingly good now!
I... I feel it coming!
{yell} Achoo!!!!!
The Gu was sprayed out of the nostrils!
Don't run!
Got it!
Finally got rid of it completely!
Good, next, wait for me to refine the poison from the Gu, it's not unusable...
I didn't expect this Gu to have such a strong power even if it's a fart bug... I'm now very curious about how powerful my master's entire research is...
Now you have refined the Gu you wanted the most, and all of your master's relics have returned to you.
Now... I'm going to destroy all this, and turn her hard work into nothing...
When I destroy all this, will you be by my side?
It's just burning some paper, what's so hard about that?
Then follow me.
After Jiang Ziyan refined the poison from the Gu and figured out how to use it, she finally had the confidence to face Miao Muli.
When we're ready, let's go face Miao Muli.
I was thinking about who you were just now, now I remember, you're the woman who took my Bug-attracting fragrance.
Yes, you sent so many people to chase me all the way to the Central Plains afterwards...
Really? I was angry at the time, so I sent a lot of people to catch you. But then Melody House and Beast Manor gave me too much trouble, so I forgot about you later...
I'm here to retrieve my master's insights and all her belongings!
So you're her disciple? No wonder you're carrying the Bug-attracting fragrance... Oh right, you're a Daoist nun too, how did I not connect you with her?
The insights you want are actually with me, but why should I give them to you?
I was too lazy to deal with you, but since you've come to my doorstep, wouldn't it be a loss if I didn't take care of you?
Excuse me, both of you, the atmosphere was too tense for me to interrupt, but I have something to say now...
Considering our friendship, let's let her go.<color=#097a76>(Miao MuliRelations＞80)</color>
Considering what I've done for the Jiuli Tribe, let's let her go.<color=#097a76>(Jiuli TribeRelations＞60)</color>
There's room for negotiation, no need for hostility.<color=#097a76>(Mercantile reached level 5 Master, 1 Gold bullion.)</color>
First sentence: Give it to her. Second sentence: If you don't give it, we'll take it.<color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
Fine, I'll do you this favor.
The previous leader of the Jiuli Tribe has already integrated these poison techniques into our own, these insights are just scrap paper to me.
But I demand that she leaves immediately after taking the items, and never show up in the Jiuli Tribe again!
Sure, everything is negotiable.
We've got everything, let's go.
Phew... Let's go.
Fine, you're still useful to the tribe, I'll do you this favor.
The previous leader of the Jiuli Tribe has already integrated these poison techniques into our own, these insights are just scrap paper to me.
But I demand that she leaves immediately after taking the items, and never show up in the Jiuli Tribe again!
Sure, everything is negotiable.
We've got everything, let's go.
Phew... Let's go.
As far as I know, the research mentions a hundred poison techniques, especially one that seems to enhance strength related to kinship, it was previously used to extend lifespan... right?
You know all this... and you're showing it in front of me, do you think I'll let you go?
Do you think... there are no other friends outside who know that she and I came to the Jiuli Tribe?
As I said earlier, let's not be hostile. Here's a Gold bullion as a token of sincerity.
We will also keep many secrets of the poison techniques, including one of them...
Fine, for the sake of the Gold bullion, I'll return all these things to you.
The previous leader of the Jiuli Tribe has already integrated these poison techniques into our own, these insights are just scrap paper to me.
But I demand that she leaves immediately after taking the items, and never show up in the Jiuli Tribe again!
Sure, everything is negotiable.
We've got everything, let's go.

Pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft.
Pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft pfft.

Me, what's wrong with me? I'm actually Poisoned...?

The Gu King she wanted to create the most... even if it's a fart bug, it's still a Gu King.
Even if I didn't fully learn my master's poison techniques, I still know some weaknesses of the Jiuli poison techniques.
Let's get out of here quickly once we get the items!

You and Jiang Ziyan escape from this witchcraft tribe together, the wind blowing your sleeves, as if nothing in the world can stop you.\nBehind you is a continuous, loud, incessant, like a thousand horses galloping... farting sound.
When I'm not with you, did you go and kill Miao Muli yourself?
If Miao Muli is dead, whether we can retrieve those items is a question...
Fine, take me to the main camp to have a look.
For the first time, this filthy place is so clean...

Now... I'm going to destroy all this, and turn her hard work into nothing...
Come with me.

(Maybe I should say something to lighten the mood.)
This matter is finally understood... Although it's for your mental block, it seems like I'm the one who suffered the most.
I'm sorry.
Huh? Did I hear wrong?
You've been running around for my ridiculous mental block, I didn't even say thank you, if I don't apologize, wouldn't I be just like her?
That seems right...
I remember when I first met you, your poison made people have diarrhea. Now your poison skill has improved, making people fart non-stop.
If this were in the martial arts world, facing such a beautiful and charming Taoist priestess with such a method... it does sound quite contrasting.
I wonder what kind of nickname you'll have when you make a name for yourself in the future? I just thought of one, how about "Golden Practice Fairy"?
Hmm?
(Oh no, I think I made the atmosphere even worse!)
I have another reason for apologizing to you, I hesitated about whether to destroy these notes...
People die, lamps go out, my hatred for her has been washed away by time... but her research on poison is indeed very brilliant, almost unparalleled in the world...
I really don't know whether to destroy all this or not, I don't want to deal with it, you choose.
"Me?"
(The poison theories in these researches are indeed the deepest and most ingenious in the world, it would be a pity to burn them.)
(But if we don't burn them, I'm afraid Ziyan will never be able to get out of her past shadows...)
(Burn it, or keep it?)
Burn it, let Ziyan completely move on.
Keep it, let these poison theories play their role.
Today you seem to feel that your hatred for her has been washed away by time, but if you don't fulfill your long-cherished wish today, your heart will be under her shadow.
After three years, five years, ten years, she will still haunt you like a nightmare, entwining your life.
Burn it, along with all the scars she left behind, your suspicion, your closure, your thorns, and your prejudice and dislike for others, burn them all.
I've said it before, when you smile, you're truly dazzling, I like to see you smile sincerely.
Yes.
Jiang Ziyan stared at the fire, the flying ashes of the paper couldn't get close to her, she gradually showed a fascinated smile.
Alright, it's all burned clean. Shall we go?
Yes.
These poison theories are the best of the best, if we can organize them into a manual, wouldn't we be able to rule the world?
...Yes, you're right, if we can fully understand the theory of poison, we can be called the Poison Sovereigns.
Poison Sovereigns, what a resounding title... It might be because there are too few poison masters in the martial arts world, that's why we have a chance to make a name for ourselves.
Let's keep these well, if we can fully understand them, it will benefit us, and your master's death will not be in vain.
Yes.
You and Jiang Ziyan spent the night organizing all the notes, restoring the research experiments, and continuing everything her master didn't finish.
In a secret language that only Jiang Ziyan can understand, you gradually compile a complete manual of poison techniques.
Mission accomplished!
This manual encompasses all the master's hard work, even someone like you who has never practiced from a young age can learn from it.
Haha, that would be wonderful.
Kid, I've been staying in Shifa Temple for too long and want to see other temples, do you have any recommendations?
Me? Besides Shifa Temple, I also know Baoguo Temple in Daliang City, Yunlin Temple in Lin'an City...
I've been to Baoguo Temple, not going there! But I haven't been to Yunlin Temple, how about you take me there?
I don't mind taking you there, but I hope you won't eat meat and drink alcohol in front of others, not every temple is like Shifa Temple.
Don't worry, I won't do anything to make you uncomfortable.
Yunlin Temple... indeed a good temple, but not close enough to Buddha.
You figured that out just by walking a few steps at the entrance?
The monks of Yunlin Temple focus more on "martial" than "Buddha", they bear heavy burdens, have responsibilities, their hearts are not empty, this actually makes them further from Buddha.
But this is their way of cultivation, it's not for me to criticize, even worth admiring.
You actually speak some Buddhist wisdom...
However, I know a place in Lin'an City that is closer to Buddha.
I see you have wisdom, let me take you there!
Hehe.
A tavern... is this the place you said is closer to Buddha?
Yes, this place is closer to Buddha than Yunlin Temple, because when you're drunk you forget yourself, your heart is empty, and you're closer to Buddha.
I actually thought for a moment that you were an accomplished monk, I really am...
By your logic, there's a dilapidated temple next to Yunlin Temple, there's nothing there, no people, no monks, no lights, it's emptier, closer to Buddha.
There's such a place, take me there quickly!
You really want to go?
Yes... there's no candlestick here, no incense burner, hehe, you're right, this is closer to Buddha.
If the Buddha statue's nose is not a nose, and the eyes are not eyes, is it more like Buddha?
You're right, the Buddha statue looks like Buddha, but Buddha has no form!
It just feels like something is missing, but I can't figure it out right now.
Kid, I want to meditate here alone, to think about what's missing.
You want to meditate here alone?
Yes, I want to leave your team for a while and meditate in this temple.
Should I let Lai Toudian leave the team and meditate here?
You stay here and meditate. <color=#097a76>(Lai Toudian leaves the team)</color>
Let's meditate at another time.
It seems you still need me for something?
Then I'll help you get things done before I meditate.
Did you bring me here to meditate?
This dilapidated temple matches your dilapidated kasaya, it's quite fitting.
If you want to meditate, I won't force you to stay.
Hehehe, cough cough, let me think about what's going on here...
I haven't figured anything out yet, do you need me for something important?
If I leave this place and interrupt my meditation, I'll have to start over when I come back.
Sorry to interrupt, but I have an urgent matter that needs your help.<color=#097a76>(Invite)</color>
Never mind, I won't disturb you.
Hearing that you have an urgent matter, I, the monk, am afraid I can't calm down.
Let's go!
Why don't you take a stroll around Lin'an City while waiting for me?
I, the monk, am going to continue my meditation.
Lai Toudian has been in the Dilapidated Temple in Lin'an City for a while, should I go and see what results his meditation has yielded?
I heard that there is a divine brew in the Dilapidated Temple in the north of the city, drinking it can make you forget all your troubles.
I heard that this divine brew can cure regrets, I really want to try it!
Isn't the Dilapidated Temple in the north of the city where Lai Toudian meditates? He actually drinks alcohol during his meditation, and it's known all over the city.
Talking about meditation... I really believe his nonsense!
Hey, isn't this brother {PlayerName}?
Suddenly, many people gathered outside the Dilapidated Temple, I thought they were here to catch me, it scared me.
Are all these people here to drink the divine brew?
I guess so? I saw so many people and got nervous, I didn't dare to join the crowd.
Big brother, would you like to buy some firewood?
Firewood?
My father is a woodcutter, he got injured when he came back from chopping wood today, he's lying in bed, so it's inconvenient for him to sell firewood.
What about your mother?
My mother has been sick in bed for a long time.
I see... Let me see what you're selling?
Here.
Why is it all leaves and bark? It's what I least want to see when I chop wood...
Brother, no wonder so many people don't want to buy...
Leaves and bark can also be used as firewood.
But there are a lot of leaves and bark, how much are you planning to sell them for?
Sell for 5 guan.
(5 guan is not a small amount... Should I spend 5 guan to buy a large amount of leaves and bark that are of no use to me?)
Buy.<color=#097a76>(Requires 5000 money)</color>
These things are useless to me.
Here's 5 guan, give me all these leaves and bark.
Thank you, big brother, I wish you good luck today!
These things are of no use to me.
Sigh...
No relations, big brother, I wish you good luck today!
The boy and girl look at the protagonist
Big brother, do you need to buy some firewood?
(5 guan is not a small amount... Should I spend 5 guan to buy a large amount of leaves and bark that are of no use to me?)
You've sold the firewood, aren't you going home yet?
We haven't sold all our firewood yet.
Actually, the money for the medicine is not enough.
Then why didn't you sell me more just now?
Dad said, giving others a bunch of useless things and taking five guan, is already taking advantage of their kindness.
Kindness should not be abused, otherwise it will lose its backbone.
Ah... your father is a real man. Unfortunately... even a real man has to make a living.
(Even if I want to help them, I'm afraid they will refuse.)
(Why not go to the Dilapidated Temple and ask Lai Toudian, he might have a solution for this kind of thing.)
In that case, you guys keep it up. Send my regards to your parents and wish them a speedy recovery.
Thank you, big brother!
Why are there so many people lying here?
Wait, all these people are drunk, what kind of wine did Lai Toudian make...
(Sleeping face full of tears.)
(Sleep talk) Come back... come back to me...
(Sleep talk) I won't let go this time!
(Sleep talk) I'll feed you... I won't eat...
(Sleep talk) I was wrong... I won't dare again...
(Sleep talk) Mom... I miss you...
Why are there still people coming?
No cutting in line!
Sorry everyone, I'm not here to drink, I'm a friend of that monk, I have something to ask him.
You... you are such a murderer!
I won't kill you today, but if we meet again, I'm afraid I'll have to eliminate the evil!
(Sleep talk) Come on, come on...
(Sleep talk) You can't take this money...
(Sleep talk) I did it, I'll take responsibility!
(Sleep talk) I didn't hurt you...
If you're not here to drink the divine wine, why are you here?
Actually, I don't even know what the so-called divine wine is.
I'm here to see what kind of mess my monk friend has made.
Is the wine-making saint monk your friend?
Wine-making saint monk?
Yes, recently a rumor appeared in the neighborhood and the tavern, that there is a saint monk in this Dilapidated Temple who makes wine, his wine is free to drink, and it can cure regrets.

Although the words monk, wine, and Dilapidated Temple appearing in the same sentence sound absurd and suspicious, some people tried it out of curiosity, and it really cured their regrets, so many people came after the word spread.
When did Lai Toudian learn to make this kind of wine?
People who want to drink here all want to cure their regrets.
Me, I want to quit gambling!
I lost all my family property in gambling, causing my family to break up and my wife and children to leave...
Every day when I leave the gambling house, I regret it so much, I've sworn countless times to quit gambling, but I can't control myself...
This is not something my will can resist, it's a disease that can only be cured by medicine, this divine wine is my medicine to quit gambling!
As for me... when I was a kid, I was naughty and ran around with my little sister, but we ran into Mountain Bandit...
Because... I was too scared, I hid, and my little sister was killed in front of me, I didn't dare to make a sound.
Later I went to learn martial arts, practicing day and night, whether it was wooden stakes or knife racks, I never dodged.
My master told me... I'm not practicing martial arts, I'm torturing myself.
I can't forget that day, I... I hope this wine can save me.
Alas, I originally had everything, but I made countless wrong choices.
All those once beautiful things were taken away from me, healthy parents, the highest position, and her...
How can I sleep at night?
Hehe... I have too many regrets in my life...
God is too unfair to me, I live one day at a time, if I don't have it, I'll die.
I'm going to die, why not have less regrets before death, and be a straightforward ghost?
Maybe after I drink the wine, I won't want to die, haha...
I see, as for me, it's hard to have Duality in this world, I've lost a lot, but I can't say I regret it.
Maybe it's because I always have a kind of confidence in my heart that everything can start over.
You are the kind of person we admire the most...
Uh, let me ask my monk friend what's going on.
Lai Toudian! You said you felt something was missing here, so you weren't close enough to Buddha. Turns out it was your wine?

Kid, you're here? I suddenly had an epiphany about a wine recipe during meditation. I was going to save some for you, but too many people came to drink. I gave your share to someone else, you won't blame me, right?
No, you mean to tell me all these drunkards on the ground mean you're closer to Buddha?
Buddha is everywhere, look at all the people lying on the ground, they are all Buddha.
Sigh... I can only say, you're truly one of a kind.
Why is your wine so divine? What effects does it have after drinking?
This wine, it allows you to see yourself through the window.
You're asking about things you don't understand again...
My batch of wine is ready, I'll let you skip the line, want to try some?
No, I can't drink.
Strictly speaking, this isn't wine, it's medicinal tea. The people outside just misunderstood it as wine.
Really?
Do you want to try this intriguing drink?
Give it a try.
No, thanks.
What's so special about this drink of yours? Let me try...
No, I don't have any regrets that need healing.
You probably don't know what you're missing... haha.
Those in line, I have two servings here, in order.
This is yours.
Thank you! Thank you!
Huff...
Passed out after one sip?
Drink freely.
...I'm deeply grateful.
After the two people got drunk, the other drunk people woke up one after another, with faces of sorrow or joy, they thanked Lai Toudian and ran away.
It seems that this gambler and this warrior have already had their drinks and passed out into dreams.
The drunk people are gone, they probably woke up and left.
This wine is truly amazing...
Wine... give me more wine!
I want to drink more!
Don't pull out your weapons, or don't blame me for fighting back!
I remember you, you've had several drinks already, why do you want to keep drinking?
I... it's too beautiful over there, everything is there. But I can't stay, once I come back, everything is gone, all gone!
Give me another drink! I don't want to come back!
Is this person hopelessly addicted to the world of wine?
{yell}, stay away from my sister!
This warrior is still closing his eyes, is he sleepwalking?
Hey, hey, hey! You guys are fighting, making too much noise, you've scared away all the Buddhas on the ground!
You mean you've woken up all the people on the ground?
I will protect you...
The batch of wine has been drunk up, you can only drink the new batch.
The new batch of wine might have different effects, you know?
Drink, I want to drink all of it, whether it's new or old wine.
There's definitely some for you, but you'll have to wait a while.
If you feel the world is too dirty and can't stand it for a second. I, the monk, have a scripture, you can recite it, hide in the world of the sutra for a while.
Thank you for your kindness, master, I can wait until the new wine is ready.
Kid, I don't have any materials to make wine right now.
Do you want me to help you find {Material}? Alright, I'm curious about the secret of your wine.
Command me? (whispering) I'm offering you a fortune!
Commanding me is just commanding me, what's this about giving me a fortune...
Tell me, what do you want?
Listen carefully, I need at least fifty leaves and fifty pieces of bark, the more the better, then sun them under the moonlight for half a shichen.
Leaves and bark... Aren't these useless waste?
Hehe... Some people think it's waste, some people think it's a lifesaver.
Alright, I got it.
(Leaves and bark, is Lai Toudian trying to get me to take care of the business of the two children outside the door?)
(Sleep talking) Come at me if you dare!
Being killed by a mad Vagabond is not the way I want to die.
I'm a bit worried that I'll become like him after drinking the wine.
Don't talk to me, this world disgusts me.
(Sleep talking) This... this is your daughter, my daughter?
Have you collected 50 leaves and 50 pieces of bark and sunned them under the moonlight?
Sorry, I haven't met your requirements yet.
Hmm? It seems that quite a few people have woken up and run away.
Sneaky, you scared me...
Sir, you have leaves and bark on you, right? Sell them to me, I'll buy as much as you have, at a high price!
Wait, who are you? If you don't explain the reason, it's hard for me to do business with you.
I'm from the Wine God Tower. Because of this monk's divine brew, the business of the Wine God Tower has been severely affected. The boss sent me to eavesdrop on the secret of this wine.
I just heard it, leaves and bark, sunned under the sunlight and moonlight, right?
Sir, you must have leaves and bark on you, right? I'll buy as much as you have, all at a high price! Whether it's bark or leaves, each for 100 coins!
(Just now Lai Toudian said he wanted to give me a fortune, did he deliberately say it to the eavesdropper outside, and then let me sell these leaves and bark to him?)
(Should I sell him the leaves and bark?)
I have some leaves to sell you...
I have some bark to sell you...
I won't sell you, I know who will...
I won't sell anymore.
I want to sell you...
1 piece.
5 pieces.
10 pieces.
50 pieces.
I won't sell you leaves for now, let's see what else.
Only one leaf? Here's the agreed 100 coins.
Only five leaves, I'll take them! Here's the agreed 500 coins.
Ten is not a small number, here's 1000 coins.
Fifty! Great, here's 5000 coins!
Do you have anything else to sell me?
I want to sell you...
1 piece.
5 pieces.
10 pieces.
50 pieces.
I won't sell you bark for now, let's see what else.
Only one piece of bark? Here's the agreed 100 coins.
Only five pieces of bark, I'll take them! Here's the agreed 500 coins.
Ten is not a small number, here's 1000 coins.
Fifty! Great, here's 5000 coins!
Do you have anything else to sell me?
I know someone who has a lot of leaves and bark to sell, I can tell you who it is, but I have a request...
Give me a broker's fee.
Buy from them at the same price as buying from me.
No problem! Here's a coin as an introduction fee, is that okay?
Of course it is!
Don't worry, I definitely won't lower the price!
That would be best.
(Is it really so satisfying to do good deeds with these rich people's money? I'm beginning to understand Lai Toudian!)
Have you seen the two children on the street? They're selling a lot of tree bark and leaves, a super large quantity, guaranteed to be enough.
Great, thank you!
Yes, yes... I'll buy all of these. What misuse of kindness, I need them urgently!
Brother, that's great, we have enough money for this month's medicine!
Let's go home and tell our parents!
Good!
I always feel that Lai Toudian called me out on purpose, never mind the tree bark and leaves for now, I'll go back and ask him.
No problem, I'll tell the boss this secret recipe, I can also get a reward.
Anyone want to buy firewood?
Brother, why didn't you say this is tree bark?
You said you have tree bark, I'll buy it all!
And leaves? I'll buy them too!
Brother, that's great, we have enough money for this month's medicine!
Let's go home and tell our parents!
Good!
I always feel that Lai Toudian called me out on purpose, never mind the tree bark and leaves for now, I'll go back and ask him.
(I don't plan to find so many tree barks and leaves anymore, I'll go back to the Dilapidated Temple and ask Lai Toudian.)
Lai Toudian, did you know that someone was eavesdropping outside, so you deliberately asked me to find leaves and bark?
Do you really need tree leaves and bark for brewing?
I, the monk, got drunk and just remembered that I actually don't need tree bark and leaves.
You said your level of pretext is always high, but not including this sentence.
Alright, alright, don't disturb me, I need to continue brewing.
Holy monk, please accept my bow!
Alright, alright, no need to bow, get up.
Go home and take a good bath, have a good sleep. Take care of your body, the deceased is gone, you need to cherish your own body.
Great kindness of the holy monk, I will never forget!
Go back quickly, don't disturb me, the monk.
Can this wine really save regret?
Thank you, holy monk! I talked a lot with the non-gambling me and the continuing gambling me in my dream...
I feel that I will never gamble again.
That's the best.
I left some things in the gambling house, I want to dedicate them to the holy monk.
Once these things leave my body, it means I have completely cut off from my past!
I don't understand, they just had a dream, dreams are fake, why can they change so much?
Although dreams are fake, if they are real enough, they will be very real.
...I don't understand.
Suppose you were stabbed in the heart by a friend in your dream. Then you wake up and touch your heart...
If you were really stabbed in the dream, there would naturally be no stab in the heart.
How can there be none? You just can't feel it, the stab is in your heart.
Don't be in a daze, this batch of wine is ready, please give it to those in line.
I still have some wine on me, it's not convenient to go out, I'll give them the wine first.
This cup is yours.
Thank you, young hero, thank you, monk!
Come on, drink.
Let me have a good taste, hehe...
Give it to me! Give it to me!
Be careful, don't spill it!
Huff...
The effect of the wine is really fast...
I didn't have a chance to drink just now, should I have a drink now?
Drink it, or you won't have a chance.
No, I won't drink.
Judging from the performance of those who drank the wine... this wine indeed has a magical power.
Let me try...
column3: ให้ข้าลองดูหน่อย...

column2: I'm afraid I'll lose my composure after drinking, so forget it...
There are fewer and fewer people, now only the last three are left...
So, what exactly did you do when you said you were meditating before? How did you start brewing wine and attract so many wine lovers?
I was meditating and thinking about what I was missing. Then I suddenly realized two things.
The first thing is that you will never see Buddha by sitting alone in an empty hall.
The second thing is the recipe for the wine...
So you started brewing wine with the recipe that suddenly appeared in your mind?
There are three stages in life: seeing the world, seeing all beings, and seeing oneself.
This saying doesn't seem to come from Buddhism...
I, as a monk, don't just read Buddhist scriptures.
Before I was grounded, I traveled through mountains and rivers with my worn-out monk's hat and shoes, which can be considered as seeing the world.
Buddha is among all beings. As a monk, I see all beings in the Dilapidated Temple and occasionally catch a glimpse of Buddha.
So the last step, seeing oneself, is it the miraculous effect of your wine?
So what did you dream about after drinking the wine?
I saw myself as an Arhat in my dream.
Is...is that true or false?
Isn't it funny? Monks don't drink or eat meat in order to see Buddha. I drank wine and I became an Arhat. Absurd! Absurd!
I originally wanted to eat meat while drinking wine, but I got drunk as soon as I drank this wine. When I woke up, I found that the Dog meat in my hand had fallen to the ground.
If it can't be paired with meat, what's the use of brewing this wine? I won't brew it anymore, let it disappear from the world.
...If it were me, I might think about making a fortune with this miraculous wine recipe. You gave up this wonderful wine for this reason, you really are an Accomplished monk.
I...I...I won't drink anymore! I won't drink anymore!
Did you have a nightmare? What's in the dream is all false. Live in the present, cherish the present, go home and see your parents, be nice to them!
Hmm...
I have no regrets... Thank you, holy monk.
Tomorrow will be the newest day of your life, the road has come this far, keep going.
I will keep the words of the holy monk in mind.
Speaking of which, didn't a gambler just say he was going to give you something? Why hasn't he come yet?
Ha, he must have gone gambling.
Ah? Didn't he drink wine?
That's just a glass of wine, do you really think it's a regret medicine?
Why hasn't this Beggar woken up yet? Normally, he shouldn't be drunk for so long, right?
Should I go check on him?
There's another person in the Dilapidated Temple, I'll go see what's going on with him before I run away.
Hey, how are you...
He, he's dead...
The Beggar's face is full of happiness. He died in a drunken dream. Maybe on the other side, he went through another happy and completely different hundred years.
So I heard.
Once Buddha was in Trayastrimsa Heaven, preaching to his mother...
I, as a monk, have gained a lot this time, and I feel that I am one step closer to seeing Buddha.
Where are you going next?
No need, it's better to continue to see the world and travel around the world.
I wonder if you are interested in taking me, the monk, with you?
Should I invite him to join my team?
Invite.
Don't invite for now.
Hehe, I, the monk, can travel the world again!
Then I'll go back to Shifa Temple, come and see me when you have time!
Good brother, I just received a letter from Maiden House, saying that there is an urgent matter that they can't handle, and they want me to go back.
Sister, what's the matter with Maiden House?

I don't know, they didn't say. It could be that they can't balance the accounts somewhere, or it could be that some little girl is disobedient. There are always some things that need the sister to preside over.
I have nothing to do, so I will accompany you back to Maiden House.
Hmm~ If there is such a man like my brother by my side, it would be good to help my sister hold the scene.
{PlayerName} Young hero!
The protagonist moves to Maid
Are you calling me?
{PlayerName} Young hero, great, there is a very troublesome problem in the museum, I don't know if Dojokeeper can handle it alone, you go and help her!
What? Sister Yan's matter is my matter, I have to go and see!
Young hero, don't say that I told you, Dojokeeper sister might be unhappy...
Okay, don't worry.
Sister Yan, I'm here to see you!
Hey, how come you are here?
Of course I want to come and see my sister!
I just returned to the museum, and my brother came to the door. But I just heard from the girls that there is a big problem in the museum. My sister may not be able to chat with you later.
What's the big problem? I can help you solve it!
Puchi, if I can see my brother like this every day, I think I will be ten years younger.
You are not an outsider, let's go and see what the problem is together.
{PlayerName} Young hero!
Are you calling me?
{PlayerName} Young hero, great, there is a big problem in the museum, Dojokeeper needs to come back to make a decision, you quickly bring Dojokeeper back.
Do you all default to me kidnapping Dojokeeper when she is not at home? Well, it is indeed me who kidnapped her.
I will bring her back.
Oh, my brother actually came to find me today, is it because my left eye is jumping?
Sister, I am here to bring you a message, Maiden House has some things that need you to decide.
Oh, it turns out to be the right eye jumping.
Forget it, thinking that my brother can remember my sister while having fun outside, my sister can be satisfied even if she stays at home for a long time.
Don't talk about yourself like a resentful woman...
Okay, my sister knows, when you have time, take my sister to Maiden House together.
Dojokeeper! You're finally back!
Tell me, what happened to the museum?
Dojokeeper, while you were not in the museum, Miss Yantian was...
Huh? Isn't my sister in the museum these days?
This... Sister said she didn't know how {PlayerSurName} young hero was recently, and she missed him so much that she went out to inquire...
Cuiyu!
Let's talk about what happened to Yantian first!
Yes... yes.
Miss Yantian was... disfigured, and I'm afraid there is not much time left...
What!!
Tell me clearly what happened!
We suspect it was done by Lai Gou San...
He? This is a bit troublesome...
Who is this person?
This person is the cousin of Lin'an CityPrefectClerk, who is good at drilling camps, bullying men and women in the city, and doing a lot of evil. People gave him the nickname Lai Gou San.
Such a person has not been caught, just because he is the cousin of the Clerk?
Of course, it's not just because of this relationship, many people don't know, this person is good at drilling camps.
He has a significant collusion with Prefect, which is why his elder brother Clerk is tied to the ship of Prefect.
His interest network even includes Lin'an CityConstable, which is the reason for his arrogance.
How do you know such a secret?
Have you forgotten that I am the Dojokeeper of Maiden House?
This person is very narrow-minded, vengeful, but very clever. He knows who can be provoked and who can't, when to be a boss, and when to lick toes.
So the ones bullied by him are all powerless common people?
Yes... such people, the anger they receive from above, they will double it back from the common people.
I was too busy scolding him, Cuiyu, tell me about Yantan, I remember she was about to be redeemed by her lover, Master Li, wasn't she?
Yes, Miss Yantan and her lover Master Li agreed to meet in a few days, and he would go back to his hometown to bring silver for redemption.
But before Master Li came back, that Lai Gousan took a fancy to Yantan and forced her to be his concubine. Everyone knows that Lai Gousan has tortured many concubines to death.
I didn't expect this Lai Gousan to accumulate different types of bad in one body.

Moreover, Yantan has already decided on Master Li and does not want to follow. In the end... she even cut a long cut on her face with a broken porcelain piece in front of him, to cut off Lai Gousan's intention...
What!
Alas... she is really stupid, she destroyed her own appearance, does she dare to bet that her lover will not abandon her because of her disfigurement?
If her lover abandons her, how can she, who is disfigured, stay in Maiden House?
Doesn't she know that Maiden House can protect her?
But last time the Xiaohong sisters...
Cuiyu, you talk too much! Maybe Yantan is worried that after redemption, without the protection of Maiden House, Lai Gousan will still force her...
(What's the story with this Xiaohong girl? Not good, Sister Yan seems to be about to explode.)
Miss Cuiyu, you just mentioned that Yantan's days are numbered, what's going on?
Yes! Lai Gousan was scared by Miss Yantan's bravery at the time, maybe he was resentful afterwards.
The next day he found Miss Yantan and said he admired her as a strange woman and wanted to have a last drink with her, and he would never bother her again.
Yantan agreed. But since that drink, within a few days, Yantan began to vomit blood. The doctor said that she was poisoned and it was too late, her days were numbered.
We are not sure... but we guess it was done by Lai Gousan...
This beast! I must kill him!
Cuiyu, where is this Lai Gousan usually?
This Lai Gousan is often eating at the market during the day.
I know what that person looks like, I'll go with you!
Good!
Damn, if I can't have it, no one can...
Lai Gousan!!
Oh, isn't this the Dojokeeper of Maiden House? Are you here to compensate for your girl scaring me? Huh huh huh...
If the Dojokeeper personally compensates me, I might consider it...
You, what do you want to do!
You dare to touch me? Aren't you afraid of trouble in Maiden House?
You poisoned my girl, if I don't stand up for her, do you really think everyone in Maiden House can be bullied?
Damn, do you really think I'm a vegetarian?
It's strange, the Dojokeeper of Maiden House doesn't call for henchmen, but comes out to beat people himself?
Isn't this Lai Gousan? Good, kill him!
{PlayerName}, slash his face and stuff this pill into his mouth!
Yes, sir!
{yell} Ahhh! My face!
They're... they're beating someone in the street!
Should we report this to the authorities?
Look at who they're beating, we should be cheering, not reporting!
We didn't see anything, what beating? He just tripped and hit his face.
Yes, that's exactly what happened, hahahaha.
I'm sparing your life for a few days, so you can crawl back to your den and let your people see the consequences of messing around in Maiden House!
You can go cry to your backers, Maiden House is always open for you! Now get lost!
That felt good... Let's go, Yan Tan's poisoning is the real issue...
Your righteous act will be known to the world, deterring all the villains. Whoever dares to harm the girls in the world, they better watch their heads when walking in the market.
You make it sound like I'm the protector of all the girls in the world.
Alright, enough with the flattery, tell me about Yan Tan's condition...
Sigh...
The doctors in the city have seen her, the poison has reached her marrow, even their medicine is powerless.
Yan Tan said she has accepted her fate, but she has one last wish.
We shouldn't give up hope... sigh, what's her wish? Maiden House will do its best to fulfill it.
Yan Tan knows she doesn't have much time left, and she's in love, but she knows she can't be with her lover, and she doesn't want to see him with her face covered in sores.
She said, if she could recover her appearance and see him one last time, she would die content.
Such a strong girl... But this wish is a bit far-fetched.
Maybe I can find a way.
Really? Can you really do it?
Let me try, maybe I can cure her poison.
That's great! I thank you on behalf of Yan Tan!

Hmm... To treat the disease and detoxify, I need to find a <color=#c44b0e>highly skilled medical friend</color> to help, or if I have <color=#c44b0e>extremely high medical skills</color>, I can diagnose it myself.

But the person who detoxified her might also have a way, if I have a <color=#c44b0e>highly skilled toxicology friend</color>, they might be able to give advice, but if I have <color=#c44b0e>extremely high toxicology skills</color>, I don't need to ask others.

But when it comes to recovering her appearance, maybe only a <color=#c44b0e>gu insect</color> can solve it, I can ask someone who is proficient in this, but if I <color=#c44b0e>have high insect catching skills and know a bit about toxicology</color>, maybe I can find the right gu insect.
If you or your friends want to diagnose Yan Tan, you can come to me, I will arrange for Yan Tan to wait upstairs.
Alright, thank you, Miss Cuiyu.
Are you here to diagnose Yan Tan? But I must inform you: I can't make decisions without the presence of the strict Dojokeeper.
Actually I...
Yes, I'm here to diagnose Yan Tan. <color=#097a76>(Yan Rurui is with me)</color>.
Confirm to use the Heal method of Medical. <color=#097a76>(Yan Rurui is accompanying)</color>
I'm not ready yet.
Young hero, there's no need to rush. Meeting with Yan Rurui doesn't cost any silver, you can diagnose her multiple times, haha.
Alright, I'll arrange it for you, please wait a moment.
But I have to remind you, Miss Yan Rurui... values her appearance very much. Please be careful.
Let me see what your problem is...
Think of a MedicalHeal method.
Think of a ToxicologyHeal method.
Think of a Gu technique Heal method.
Decide to use the Gu technique Heal method.
Let's leave it at that for now. (Run away)
I might be able to cure Miss Yan Rurui's poison.
Really?
I can completely eradicate the poison in Miss Yan Rurui's body, making her fully recover without any loss of lifespan.
I just need to use a sharp blade to cut open the skin in four places around her body, let the poisoned blood flow out, and then apply medicinal powder.

Although this medicinal powder can remove the poison, its medicinal properties are strong, causing the skin to scar and leave marks. Although it can make you live to old age, I'm afraid there's no possibility of recovery for your <color=#c44b0e>appearance.</color>
Thanks to my superior medical skills, I already know how to cure your poison.
I can completely eradicate the poison in your body, so you can live to a ripe old age.
Really? Can you cure me?
Yes, but the poison was discovered too late. To cure it, we need to use some extreme measures.
I need to use a sharp blade to cut open the skin in four places around your body, let the poisoned blood flow out, and then apply medicinal powder.

Although this medicinal powder can remove the poison, its medicinal properties are strong, causing the skin to scar and leave marks. Although it can make her live to old age, I'm afraid there's no possibility of recovery for your <color=#c44b0e>appearance.</color>
Sigh... I've broken several mirrors in the past few days. If I have to live with this face for the next sixty years, I'd rather not.
And without my looks, do you think I can be with Li Gongzi for long?
Yan Rurui, you must have faith in Li Gongzi!
Surviving is more important than anything else!
(Whispering) Young hero, if you decide to use this method, find me downstairs later.

(It seems that Yan Rurui has developed a desire to self-destruct in these days of torment... She doesn't quite accept the MedicalHeal method, but if <color=#c44b0e>I and Maid Cuiyu insist on this,</color> she will have to accept it when it's a done deal.)
(However, once I choose this Heal method, <color=#c44b0e>I can't use any other Heal methods.</color>)
No, none of my teammates can solve this problem with Medical, and my Medical skills are not yet refined. <color=#c44b0e>(Requires at least 90 Medical)</color>
This kind of poison is not a big deal, and it's not entirely impossible to recover the appearance.
Do you have a perfect solution?
It's just that this medicine is a bit extravagant.

Find a man, feed him into a medicine man, and then apply the essence of the medicine man externally and internally. In less than half a year, Yan Tan's appearance can recover as before, and all the poison in her body can be eliminated.
What about this medicine man?

<color=#c44b0e>His body is eroded by poison, he is in pain all day, and he can probably only live for three years.</color> Doesn't she have a lover? If he is not willing to die for her, what kind of lover is he?
Your statement is too extreme...
We must not let some imaginative people hear about this prescription...
Fortunately, I am proficient in toxicology and can think of an extreme method...

Find a man, feed him into a medicine man, and then apply the essence of the medicine man externally and internally. In less than half a year, Yan Tan's appearance can recover as before, and all the poison in her body can be eliminated.
But this medicine man's <color=#c44b0e>body is eroded by poison, he is in pain all day, and he can only live for three years...</color>
We must not let some imaginative people hear about this prescription...
Miss Yan Tan, what do you think of this method...
No! No! Absolutely not! I, Yan Tan, am not such an unkind and unjust person!
If he is gone, even if I recover my appearance, who will I show it to?
I will never agree to this!
(Yan Tan seems to not accept the toxicology healing method, and the person with the most say in this matter is <color=#c44b0e>Master Li himself.</color>)
No, there is no one in my team who can solve this problem with toxicology, and my toxicology is not yet proficient. <color=#c44b0e>(Requires at least 90 in toxicology)</color>
Little brother, I have checked, there is indeed a kind of gu worm that can restore Yan Tan's appearance.
Cai Die, is what you said true?
There is a kind of gu called "Shocking Red Wither", which can correct a girl's face, regenerate skin, remove scars, and eliminate wrinkles.
Not to mention the already disfigured sister, even the ordinary sister can make her face more beautiful and attractive after using it.
Is it really that magical?
Gu technique never disappoints!

However, after using this gu, the appearance can recover quickly, but <color=#c44b0e>the body will also be quickly drained, the limbs and body will age into dry wood, and the lifespan will also be quickly exhausted.</color>
If you use this gu, you have to cover your whole body with a robe except for your face.
