Because under that beautiful face, <color=#c44b0e>the body and arms are thin and only bones are left, scars, blue veins, wrinkles gather, dry and shriveled like dry branches, the shape is terrifying</color>, this is why it is called "Shocking Red Wither".
That picture... just thinking about it is very curious...
Because the body is drained, <color=#c44b0e>the lifespan is only seven days left</color>, plus the poison she has already taken, I think it might be shorter.
The evil of gu technique never disappoints...

The sisters of Jiuli are passionate and resolute. If they meet a man they truly love but can't be with for various reasons, they will use this Gu to etch their most beautiful face deep into the man's heart, making him unable to forget for eternity.
Are all the sisters of Jiuli suicide attack enthusiasts?
Fortunately, after many years of catching bugs, I am well-versed in Gu techniques. I have found a Gu that can recover Miss Yantan's appearance.

This Gu is called "Startling Red Wither", when planted on a lady, it can make ordinary people more beautiful and charming, and it can also make the disfigured grow flesh and bones, recovering their appearance,

However, using this Gu, the appearance can be quickly recovered, but the body will also be quickly drained, the hands and feet will age into dead wood, and the lifespan will also be quickly exhausted.

Because under that beautiful face, <color=#c44b0e>the body and arms are thin and only bones are left, scars, blue veins, wrinkles gather, dry and shriveled like dry branches, the shape is terrifying</color>, this is why it is called "Shocking Red Wither".
If this Gu is used, Miss Yantan's <color=#c44b0e>life span may only be seven days</color>, or even less...
You said that using this Gu will make you more beautiful, how beautiful is it?
It is said to be stunning and captivating... But you have to think carefully, you only have seven days of life, and you are poisoned, it can only be shorter.
I only need one night! Seeing him once is enough. Seven days, is too much...
Yantan, is it worth it? Is it worth it? I just hope you can be well...
It seems that looking at the face in the mirror every day, Yantan's mentality has changed...
(If I decide to use Gu technique to heal, just let <color=#c44b0e>Yantan cooperate</color>, but once chosen, maybe <color=#c44b0e>other healing methods cannot be used.</color>)
No, there is no one in my team who can solve this problem with Gu technique, and my understanding of Gu worms is still insufficient. <color=#c44b0e>(Requires at least level 5 bug catching)</color>
Miss Yantan, please rest well, I need to seriously consider various healing methods.
Thank you, sir.
If the sir wants to see Yantan again, just come to me.
Young Master Li! Why did you come early...
Haha, my parents both like Yantan very much, so they asked me to bring money to redeem her early.
(She winks at you, hinting you to keep quiet.)
Who is this?
This is a friend of the Maiden House Dojokeeper, young hero {PlayerName}.
Oh, I've heard a lot about the young hero, nice to meet you.
So you are Miss Yantan's beloved, truly a match made in heaven.
Not at all.
Miss Yantan has been a little sick these days, her face is a bit swollen, she doesn't want to see you like this...
Haha, it does sound like Yantan's character, I have nothing to do, so I'll wait here for her to get better.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, goodbye.
Phew... Please help me keep it a secret from Young Master Li before deciding on Miss Yantan's matter.
But if the sir wants to use the Toxicology healing method, you must be honest with Young Master Li...
I wonder what the young hero came to see me for?

(Miss Yan Tan doesn't want to tell Master Li about her affairs. Should I continue to hide Miss Yan Tan's affairs? It feels like once it's said, <color=#c44b0e>things will progress to a point of no return...</color>)
(Confess) I must tell you about Yan Tan. <color=#c44b0e>(Yan Rurui is in the team)</color>
(Run away) It's nothing, just came to say hello.
Miss Yan Tan, she... such things have happened to her.
What? Yan Tan cherishes her appearance so much, but she actually did such a thing for me...
If I let down Miss Yan Tan, I will be struck by thunder and lightning, and I will not die a good death!
Don't rush to call the wind and rain, we have already found a way to help her.
Really! If the young hero needs me, I will not hesitate to die!
I can remove the poison from her body and completely cure her disease, but the price is that her appearance can never be recovered.
That's great, it's just a false alarm, but...
Yan Tan loves her appearance so much, will this be worse than death for her?
Her wish is actually to recover her appearance and see you one last time. The Gu technique I found can do it. Not only can it recover, but it can also make her appearance beautiful to the heart.
But the price is that she can only live for seven days.
No! No! Yan Tan will definitely choose this, how can I let her die like this?
There is a way to save her life and recover her appearance, but the price is a bit high...
Stop beating around the bush, what's the price?
column3: อย่าพูดอ้อมค้อมอยู่เลย บอกราคาข้ามาตรงๆ ได้แล้ว!

column2: The price is you.
What do you mean...?

To save Miss Yan Tan, we need to find a man to feed poison, turn him into a medicine man, and then feed Yan Tan with his essence. Within half a year, she can remove all the poison from her body and recover her original appearance.
And that medicine man... his body is eroded by poison, and he can only live for three years.
Without us saying, you also know who can be this medicine man, right?
Sorry, there's too much going on, give me a shichen.
If it were me... I might not be able to bear this ups and downs.
Brother, let's bet, bet whether this man will run directly to the city gate to hire a horse carriage to go home after he leaves.
I've seen many men like this, sweet talk and vows, but once they have to pay something, they run faster than anything. Leaving the girl waiting in place, wasting her youth.
Master Li is good, he only asks the girl to wait for a shichen. What about other men, they may ask the girl to wait for three years, five years, or until her hair turns white.
What do you think, bet a coin, bet or not?
I bet on sincerity!
I bet on running away!
No bet.
Okay, brother, let's wait for him to come back here, don't forget what you chose.
One shichen later.
column3: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

column2: Hmm~ A shichen is about to come.
Prepare to disperse, think about how to explain this to Yan Tan.
Yes, Dojokeeper.
Young hero!
It seems... you won.
This coin is for you to accompany me for a day today.
You lost, pay up!
This money in and out, feels like a round trip.
Young hero, give me the poison!
Don't say such misleading things in public!
Wait a moment, even if you've already decided, don't rush to take it, let's discuss it with Yantan first?
She definitely won't agree, discussing it together will only lead to disputes.
Are you sure you want to do this for Yantan?
Yes.
Such a devoted lover... I hope Yantan won't let you down.
Nothing in the world can last forever, beauty fades as flowers fall from trees...
Yantan is too obsessed with her appearance, in ten or twenty years, she will understand that it's just a skin.
If she gives up her life and happiness for these things now, it would be incredibly foolish...
Then it's decided, let's choose this healing method.
Great! Yantan can be saved!
Let's... tell Master Li about this, so he can prepare himself.
Cuiyu said, I can go see Yantan now...
Yes, go see her quickly.
Okay!
(What are they talking about? I need to use MP to hear clearly...)
(Should I eavesdrop on this doomed couple's conversation? Never mind, listen!)
Yantan, you're so silly, you actually want to hide it from me.
To me, love is not about the skin, but about the everyday life.
Won't you despise me with a face full of sores?
When I'm old and wrinkled, with no teeth left, will you despise me?
Of course not.
Then I won't either.
(…Looking at their expressions, they're obviously using MP to eavesdrop too!)
Sigh... They're so loving and promising now, but who knows what the future holds. If this man changes his heart, living will be harder for Yantan than death...
Yantan can't get over her own ugliness, she might change a lot in the future.
When a woman is impatient, a man easily becomes cold. After he becomes cold, how will Yantan cope?
Yantan already knows, she just cried a lot, you should talk to her.
Okay!
(What are they talking about? I need to use MP to hear clearly...)
(Should I eavesdrop on this doomed couple's conversation? Never mind, listen!)
Wuu... How could you do such a foolish thing? What am I going to do without you?
This is all my choice, no one forced me.
Yantan, I know you cherish your face the most, but you actually chose to disfigure yourself.
I'm sorry, this is what I owe you...
You... wuu...
Do you know where I just went? I just planted a small tree near the Maiden House.
In the following days, let's go see that tree grow every day, okay?
Yes... wuu...
(…Looking at their expressions, they're obviously using MP to eavesdrop too!)
Life is so bitter...
Listen to Yantan crying her heart out now, of course she's sincere, but who knows what their ending will be?
A good ending would be Yantan never marrying after Master Li runs away. As for a bad ending, I've seen too many at the Maiden House.
Yantan already knows, she just cried a lot, you should talk to her.
Okay!
(What are they talking about? I need to use MP to hear clearly...)
(Should I eavesdrop on this doomed couple's conversation? Never mind, listen!)
Wuu... How could you do such a foolish thing? What am I going to do without you?
This is all my choice, no one forced me.
Yantan, I know you cherish your face the most, but you actually chose to disfigure yourself.
I'm sorry, this is what I owe you...
You... wuu...
Do you know where I just went? I just planted a small tree near the Maiden House.
In the following days, let's go see that tree grow every day, okay?
Yes... wuu...
(…Looking at their expressions, they're obviously using MP to eavesdrop too!)
Life is so bitter...
Listen to Yantan crying her heart out now, of course she's sincere, but who knows what their ending will be?
A good ending would be Yantan never marrying after Master Li runs away. As for a bad ending, I've seen too many at the Maiden House.
Inn... Dojokeeper.
Sigh... I'm not here to break you up, but you should prepare yourself.
What... what do you mean?
You should talk to Yantan yourself.
(What are they talking about? I need to use MP to hear clearly...)
(Should I eavesdrop on this doomed couple's conversation? Never mind, listen!)
What, you... you... have suffered such a thing!
Yes, so I'm going to die, I'm afraid I can't keep my promise to you.
Tonight is the last time we'll see each other. You must take care of yourself, eat well, and find a good partner.
(…Looking at their expressions, they're obviously using MP to eavesdrop too!)
This little girl has a really poisonous mouth...
Have you ever seen fireworks? Yan Tan is as brilliant as fireworks, but also as fleeting as they are.

This girl was at her most beautiful and unparalleled in her lover's last sight, and she said these words, but the man could not touch or kiss her, and from then on, no woman could replace Yan Tan's position.
It sounds like this couple's story has also settled down, there's nothing to worry about anymore, stop eavesdropping, let Me take you to a place, let's go out for some fresh air.
Where does Sister Yan want to go?
Just follow Me.
So it's this place.
What, very disappointed?
How could I be disappointed, it's more like Me and Sister are in sync, I guessed it was here a long time ago.
Hmph~ You're really good at talking.
Sister, you have a question in your heart, why did you choose this Heal method? Why did you choose this ending for their story?
I chose this because...
A long-lasting love is a good ending.
It has nothing to do with love, I just want to save lives.
Because this method is the most reliable.
I agreed with you a long time ago, after ten or twenty years, she will understand that this is just a skin.
Miss Yan Tan thinks that her love is completely dependent on her own appearance, and feels that she can't get Li Gongzi's true heart without her beauty.
This may be due to the concept she formed in Maiden House...
But since she can destroy her own face to reject Lai Gou San, why doesn't she believe in Li Gongzi's sincerity?
Another possibility is that she seems to have fallen into some kind of fanaticism, in order to achieve that scene that moves her very much, she is willing to give up the chance to save her life.

It may be influenced by some tragic novels of talented men and beautiful women... The bad influence on the girls is immeasurable, it seems that I have to strictly control these books from entering Maiden House.
Actually, I never thought about choosing an ending for the story, I just came to cure the disease and save people. Compared with other methods, this method has the least loss and can save people.
Yes, as long as you do your own duty, why bother with other people's fate?
To tell the truth, other Heal methods consume a lot, and the effects are not very certain. If they fail in the end, won't it make things worse?
And with the MedicalHeal method, even if it fails, the worst result is just some more scars on the face, which does not harm others' lives.
Hmm, it's always right to be careful.
Why let the man stay out of it?
It has nothing to do with love, I just want to test this poison.
I like to see the expression on a woman's face when she regrets for the rest of her life.
For Li Gongzi, Yan Tan destroyed her own face and was poisoned. This man, however, stayed out of it.
I don't like this kind of story.
So you changed the story character and let Li Gongzi bear everything?
You and some of the girls in Maiden House must have a lot to talk about...
This kind of medicinal human therapy is rare in the martial arts world, I have only heard of it in books that the evil sects in the past had this operation.
This time I just want to see, what is the effect of this medicinal human therapy.
I don't care about the love entanglement between this man and woman.
You... forget it, this is also Li Gongzi's own will.
I like to see the expression on a woman's face when she regrets for the rest of her life! Hahahaha!
Thinking of Miss Yan Tan living with regret for the rest of her life, my heart clenches, my brows furrow, and a smile appears on my face!
Damn it... Promise me, you must never harm or kill yourself just to make a girl live with regret.
This ending is full of beauty.
It has nothing to do with love, I just want to see the wonders of Gu technique.
Just to fulfill Yan Tan's wish.
The ending of this story is full of beauty, isn't it?
The girl's last wish is to live forever in the heart of her beloved, exhausting all her HP for a night of blooming, then disappearing in a flash.
But due to her withered body, she can only cover herself with her robe, keep a distance from her beloved, and in the end, they can only look at each other across the table, never to meet again.
Sigh... What a touching ending!
Actually... I think such an ending is enough in a novel, it's better to have less of this in the real world.
I just want to see how beautiful this Gu technique can make a girl.
In today's world, this woman's infatuation is truly rare, coupled with her disfigured and poisoned situation, it is even more rare.
If we miss this time, I'm afraid there will never be another woman willing to accept this Gu technique in the world.
In terms of madness and obsession, Yan Tan is not one in ten thousand of you.
Yan Tan's wish is such, I can't go against her will.
Her goal is clear, and the result is for her to bear alone, why should I stop her? If I decide her fate on my own and make her resentful, it won't be beautiful.
Indeed... This is what she wants, we should not interfere, if she regrets it, it's her business.
Wait, today... I suddenly had an epiphany because of this.
Sister Yan had an epiphany? Is it about stargazing, Buddhism, or a breakthrough in martial arts?
Hmm~ I can only say that you are truly worthy.

It's not wrong to say it's a breakthrough in martial arts... A long time ago, I wanted to compose a song of my own, this song was almost completed many years ago, only the ending... has not been composed until now.
The ending of today's story suddenly made me think of how to end this song.
Listen to this.
Yan Rurui played a melodious tune, the song subtly expressing the initial feelings of meeting, the laughter of getting to know each other, the longing of temporary parting, and the joy of reunion.
Then the tune changes, filled with unease and determination, when it stops at the intense part, it turns into a distant tone, as if the wind of a lifetime has blown past, the wild grain is as casual.

Then the tune changes, filled with unease and determination, when it stops at the intense part, it turns into a mournful tone, the sad wind sweeps away the tears of a lifetime, flowing into the canal.

Then the tune changes, filled with unease and determination, when it stops at the intense part, it rises again, like a firework shooting straight into the sky, blooming into a beautiful firework in the sky, then disappearing in a flash, leaving only the spectators to savor it alone.
It seems you understand the song I played.
Of course, so it seems I am still your Zhong Ziqi.
Hmm~ More than just Zhong Ziqi.
Yan Rurui played a very beautiful tune, you stared at her expression, although you didn't understand, but you could see what she was thinking.
Have you seen enough? Dummy.
How could I ever get enough? When sister plays her tune, her expression and demeanor change as if she's a different person. It's truly a sight to behold. I want to listen more!
There will be plenty of opportunities to listen in the future, there's no rush.
Brother, if your noble act spreads, no one should dare to trouble Maiden House anymore.
I won't have to worry about this place every day.
There are too many sad memories left in Maiden House. I really hope to leave her worries, anxieties, forced smiles, and tears behind in Maiden House.
Leaving this door with you is always a joy.
Phew... Good night.
You, you are {PlayerName}?!
column3: เจ้า เจ้าคือ{PlayerName}?!

column2: Indeed, do you need something from me?
column3: ถูกแล้ว ท่านมีอะไรให้ข้าช่วยหรือกระไร?

column2: You, you bring bad luck, stay away from me!
column3: เจ้า ไอ้เจ้าตัวอัปมงคล ไสหัวไปไกลๆข้า!

column2: Bad luck? Me?\nWhat's going on, what did I do...
column3: อัปมงคล? ข้าเนี่ยนะ?\nเกิดอะไรขึ้น ข้าไปทำอะไรให้ท่านละนั่น...

column2: Pah, stop pretending, who doesn't know that you {PlayerName} are up to no good, utterly heartless! Wherever you go, disaster follows!
column3: ถุ้ย เลิกเล่นละครได้แล้ว ใครบ้างไม่รู้ว่า {PlayerName} เป็นพวกชั้นต่ำ เหี้ยมโหดไร้จิตใจ ไม่ว่าไปที่ไหนก็สร้างแต่ปัญหา!

column2: (What's going on? Although I did do various things, how would they know?)
column3: (เกิดอะไรขึ้นเนี่ย? ถึงข้าจะก่อเรื่องบ้างแต่พวกเขาจะไปรู้ได้อย่างไร?)

column2: It seems you know everything I've done, then you should also know the consequences of defying me, right? Tell me, who told you all these things?
column3: ในเมื่อเจ้าก็รู้ทุกอย่างที่ข้าทำ งั้นเจ้าก็คงรู้สินะว่ามาหยามข้าแบบนี้จะโดนอะไร? บอกข้ามาเดี๋ยวนี้ว่าใครบอกเจ้าเรื่องนี้?

column2: Wait, I don't know about the things you mentioned...
column3: เดี๋ยว ข้าไม่รู้ว่าเจ้าพูดอะไรอยู่...

column2: Someone must be slandering me! Can you tell me who did this, I'll confront them right away!
column3: ใครบางคนต้องใส่ความข้าแน่ๆ! เจ้าบอกข้าได้ไหม ข้าจะไปแก้ไขความเข้าใจผิดเดี๋ยวนี้!

column2: Ha, who needs to tell me?\nEveryone in the world knows! You're now like a rat crossing the street, everyone shouts and beats!
column3: เฮอะ ใครจำเป็นจะต้องบอกข้าเล่า?\nทุกคนเขารู้กันให้ทั่ว ตอนนี้เจ้าก็เหมือนหนูสกปรก ไปที่ไหนคนเห็นก็ต้องรังเกียจโห่ไล่

column2: Everyone in the world knows... It seems something must have happened when I went to the southwest...
column3: ทุกคนในโลกรู้... เหมือนจะมีเรื่องเกิดขึ้นระหว่างที่ข้าเดินทางไปยังแดนตะวันตกเฉียงใต้...

column2: Is it Jiuli Tribe or Melody House... It shouldn't be, those people don't have such ability...
column3: หรือว่าจะเกี่ยวกับเผ่าจิ่วลี่ไม่ก็ตำหนักบทเพลง... ไม่น่าใช่ ทั้งสองดูไม่น่าจะมีความสามารถที่ทำอะไรเช่นนี้ได้...

column2: It shouldn't be Beast Manor either... Could it be...\nLiu Fuming?
column3: หรือจะเป็นหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูร ไม่แน่... หรือว่า...\nหลิวฝูหมิง?

column2: If he uses the influence of Tower of Prosperity, he might be able to do it...
column3: ถ้าเจ้านั่นใช้อิทธิพลของหอเจิดจรัส ก็อาจจะทำได้ก็ได้...

column2: Liu Fuming! Letting him escape at Bailing Mountain was too lenient!\n{PlayerSurName} Brother, I haven't settled the score with him yet!
Liu Fuming... It's something that little man would do! {PlayerSurName} Young Master, let's go meet him!
Let's go ask him, if he's back he should be at Tower of Prosperity in Daliang City.
column3: ไปถามมันแล้วกัน น่าจะอยู่ที่หอเจิดจรัสในเมืองต้าเหลียงนั่นแหละ

column2: It seems Liu Fuming is not in the tower, where could he have gone...
{PlayerSurName} Young Hero, long time no see.
Mr. Liu, how come you're here.
I came with Fuming, he was seriously injured in the southwest and didn't take his medicine properly, I couldn't rest assured.
Injured?
Yes, at that time...
Phew... Phew... Finally escaped...
Damn Beast Manor, I will take revenge sooner or later——!
Who would have thought that the dignified White Robed Prime Minister would be in such a sorry state today.
Who is it this time!
Mr. Liu, do you still remember me?
You, you are from Beast Manor——\nYou really are a persistent ghost, are you here to kill me?

Mr. Liu, you misunderstand. If the Manor Lord really wanted to kill you, why would he let you run away from the snow mountain?\nIf the Manor Lord doesn't kill you, how could I overstep and take your life?
...Then what do you want to do?
I came to find Young Master Liu because I have a message for you to deliver to your master.
Speak.
Go back and tell your master that we are all dog owners. Masters should talk to masters, not just send a dog.
...I've noted it down. Can I go now?
Please do.
Young Master Liu, I suddenly remembered something else.
You despicable fellow...

This move was taught to me by Young Master Liu, you should remember it, right?\nThe master of the manor is magnanimous and didn't intend to take your life, but if this great gift is not returned, I can't swallow this breath.
Don't worry, I avoided the vital parts. If you find a doctor in time, you won't die.
Young Master Liu, see you again if fate allows.
Ah, fame...
So this happened.
Strange, why has Aunt never mentioned this to us, and why did she spare Liu Fuming's life?
Why has mother never mentioned this, and why did she spare Liu Fuming's life?
Fuming was just following orders, and the Beast Manor's action was also a message to the person behind the scenes not to underestimate the manor, right?
Who was Liu Fuming really working for?
I'm not sure, even I haven't heard Fuming mention that person's name.
Where is Liu Fuming now? Besides the Beast Manor's matter, I have something else to ask him.
Fuming... I don't know where he is.
A few days ago, a long-haired young hero came to see him. Since then, he's been secretive and told me to quickly run away from Daliang City, this place of right and wrong.
Place of right and wrong? Is something going to happen here?
I'm just guessing, maybe a new mission has been assigned.
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, I have a favor to ask. I always feel that no matter what Fuming is going to do, it won't be smooth sailing. If something happens, I hope you can protect Fuming for me...
I happen to have something to find him too, I'll keep an eye out for him in Daliang City for you.
That's good, then I can go back to the southwest with peace of mind.
Although I promised Mr. Liu, where should I start with this clue...
Usually, if I want to find out about this kind of gossip, I ask the people at the inn first. This time, I'll try my luck at the inn too.
Speaking of which, I saw the owner of the Tower of Prosperity today...
The owner of the Tower of Prosperity, Mr. Liu? Are you sure you saw him?
Of course, who in Daliang City doesn't recognize his white-clothed figure?
Do you remember where he went?
I remember he went into the Government Office and talked to a man in white for a while.
A man in white in the Government Office...
Thank you for the information!
Wait, aren't you that jinx?! Are you asking about Mr. Liu's business because...
Forget it, forget it, it's bad luck. I can't control the affairs of you vagabonds, you better go!
Who are you? If you have any grievances, go to the Prefect.
No, I came to find you. I want to ask if the owner of the Tower of Prosperity, Mr. Liu, has come to see you?
What flowers, willow trees? What are you talking about?
This... Sir, this young hero wants to express his gratitude. Under your governance, Daliang City is flourishing with flowers and willow trees, a peaceful scene...
column3: ข้าน้อย...รู้สึกซาบซึ้งใจเป็นอย่างยิ่งที่ท่านจอมยุทธหนุ่มผู้นี้ต้องการแสดงความขอบคุณ ภายใต้การปกครองของท่าน เมืองต้าเหลียงกลับมาเจริญรุ่งเรือง ประชาชนอยู่ร่มเย็นเป็นสุข เปรียบเสมือนภาพวาดอันงดงามที่ประดับประดาด้วยดอกไม้และต้นหลิว

column2: Hahaha, you're not wrong. Your words make all my efforts worthwhile.
column3: ฮ่าฮ่า..ท่านพูดถูกต้องแล้ว คำพูดของท่านช่างคุ้มค่ากับความพยายามของข้าพเจ้าเสียจริง

column2: (In a low voice) Young hero, this is not the place to talk. Let's find another place.
column3: (กระซิบ) ท่านจอมยุทธ ที่นี่ไม่ใช่สถานที่เหมาะสมสำหรับการพูดคุยกัน หาที่อื่นคุยกันดีกว่า

column2: No one else should be able to hear us here...
What do you want to talk about?
column3: ท่านมีเรื่องใดปรารถนาจะสนทนากับข้าหรือ?

column2: ...Your reaction just proves that the owner of the Liu Building has indeed come to see you, hasn't he? I want to know why he came to see you.
column3: ...ปฏิกิริยาของท่านพิสูจน์แล้วว่า เจ้าของตึก หลิวมาพบท่านจริงๆ ข้าพเจ้าอยากทราบว่าเขามาพบท่านเพื่อเหตุใด

column2: Sigh... Do you know, a few days ago, the owner of the Liu Building held a banquet and invited many officials and nobles, but at the banquet...
Sigh, never mind, it was a nightmare...
I was only away from Daliang City for a few days, what on earth happened...
Sigh... Young hero, don't ask anymore, don't ask...

You watch as the Clerk sighs heavily and returns to the government office, it seems that the events of the past few days have had a great impact on him. You return to the streets of Daliang, and the way others look at you is no longer hateful, nor do they point and whisper. You don't know what happened in the past few days, but it seems that the slander against you has quietly disappeared without your knowledge.
Yes, he did come to see me, but why should I tell you?
Given our relations, can you share a bit? <color=#097a76>(Clerk Relations reach 60)</color>
This money is my respect for you. <color=#097a76>(3000 Coins)</color>
I and the Prefect are colleagues, there's no harm in telling me. <color=#097a76>(Passed the Imperial Examination)</color>
column3: ข้านายอำเภอเป็นขุนนางเหมือนกัน เรื่องใดบอกได้ ก็บอกมาอย่ากังวล  <color=#097a76>(ผ่านการสอบระดับขุนนาง)</color>

column2: The Clerk is talented, I have long admired... <color=#097a76>(Persuade reaches 4th level Expert)</color>
I want to get to know the owner of the Liu Building, but I don't have the connections.
There are many people who want to get to know the owner of the Liu Building, why should I take care of you?
If you really want to know, I can tell you, but you have to show some sincerity, right?
Waste of time!
(In a low voice) Young hero, this is not the place to talk. Let's find another place.
column3: (กระซิบ) ท่านจอมยุทธ ที่นี่ไม่ใช่สถานที่เหมาะสมสำหรับการพูดคุยกัน หาที่อื่นคุยกันดีกว่า

column2: Still want to ask about the owner of the Liu Building? Are you ready to show your sincerity this time?
Alright, considering you've given me quite a few gifts before, I'll tell you. But you must not spread it around!
Don't worry, I won't spread it.
Is this enough to show my sincerity?
Considering your sincerity, I'll tell you, but you must not spread it around!
Don't worry, I won't spread it.
In theory, if I wanted to, I could also serve as a Prefect. This information would certainly do you no harm.
That makes some sense...
Then I will tell this news to {PlayerSurName}, and when you rise to prominence in the future, remember to take care of me.
You have a silver tongue, full of flattery, which makes the Clerk very pleased.
I didn't expect you to understand my talent so well, it's a pity we didn't meet sooner!
column3: มิได้คาดคิดว่าท่านจะเข้าใจความสามารถของข้าพเจ้าได้ดีเพียงนี้ น่าเสียดายที่เราไม่ได้พบกันเร็วกว่านี้

column2: So, about this Liu Fuming...
Of course I'll tell you! But you won't spread it around, right?
Don't worry, of course I won't.
Actually, the owner of the Liu Building came to invite me to a banquet.
A banquet?
Yes, according to the owner of the Liu Building, many of the most powerful and wealthy people in Zhongzhou will gather there.
Was the Prefect also invited?
Him? No, everyone knows that the Prefect is a fool, and it's actually Me, the Clerk, who's doing the real work in the entire Daliang Prefecture.
(It seems that the event Mr. Liu was talking about is this banquet. I need to find a way to sneak in.)
Looking thoughtful, are you also interested in attending this banquet?
Indeed, I wonder if the Clerk could help Me get in?
If you haven't received an Invite, it would be as difficult as ascending to heaven to get you in... \nBut there is a way...
Really? What's the solution?

The owner of the Liu Building wanted to Invite the Constable of Daliang City, but the Constable is on leave due to an injury. Not many people know about this, so you could pretend to be him and enter with Me. We should be able to fool them.
Impersonating an Official is punishable by death according to the law, isn't it...
You're not doing it for money or power, so even if something goes wrong, you'll only be flogged at most. \nAt that time, Me will help you deal with the Bailiff, so they'll go easy on you.
Is there really no other way?
I can't think of any other way. Don't worry, nothing should go wrong.
(Should I go to the banquet with the Clerk?)
Go to the banquet! <color=#c44b0e>(Unable to Run away from the Tower of Prosperity for a while)</color>
Think about it again.
You think about it, Me will go back to the Government Office first, come find Me when you've made up your mind.
Have you decided to attend the banquet?
(Should I go to the banquet with the Clerk?)
Come find Me when you've made up your mind.
Alright, Me will give you his clothes first. Once you've changed, we'll set off.
Remember, from now on, you are the Constable of Daliang City. Me will address you as {PlayerSurName}Constable, so be careful not to give yourself away.
Understood.
Sir, who is this?
This is {PlayerSurName}Constable of Daliang City. The owner of the Liu Building should have also Invited him.
Nice to meet you, ladies.
I see, I apologize for my rudeness. I hope {PlayerSurName}Constable won't hold it against me.
Hmm, no problem.
Thank you, sirs. Please come in.
A message by carrier pigeon? It can even be delivered in such heavy rain...
"To {PlayerSurName} young hero:\nThe banquet at the Tower of Prosperity has ended. If you wish to meet the owner of the Liu Building, please find another way.
Written by the Clerk of Daliang City Government Office."
It seems that the banquet at the Tower of Prosperity has ended. It's pointless to go back now.
Now that I've come to the southeast, if I stay here for a few days, the rumors about Me in the Central Plains should die down. Even if I leave them alone, there should be no problem.
Wow, I didn't expect so many people to be here already.
The arrival of the Clerk brings glory to our humble abode.
Being Invited by the owner of the Liu Building is the greatest honor for me.
Clerk, who is this?
This is {PlayerSurName}Constable who was absent that day. He was supposed to be on duty today, but I managed to get him off.
(Although I have a lot of questions for Liu Fuming, I should attend the banquet first.)
Nice to meet you, owner of the Liu Building.
{PlayerSurName}Constable? You seem familiar... \nNever mind, welcome both of you. Let me show you to your seats, please follow me.
Thank you.
Please have a seat here. I have some matters to attend to before the banquet begins, so I'll leave you for now.
What do you think, {PlayerSurName}Constable, seeing is believing, right?
This place is indeed very grand, and it seems that all the attendees today are influential figures.
Of course, as long as you seize the opportunity to get close to someone, you won't have to worry about food and drink for the rest of your life.
Huh, I didn't expect Liu Fuming to arrange for you insignificant shrimps to share a table with me.
You, you are... the Imperial Scholar, Mr. Shi?!
Hmph, at least you have some discernment.
My surname is Pang, I serve as a Clerk in Daliang Prefecture. Although it's a humble position, I still want to contribute to Daliang and the country...
Tsk, so pretentious. Why did this Liu arrange me here?
You, you are...
You, if you haven't seen him in Zhongzhou, it's normal. This is the vanguard of the Shengjie Army in the Ye Family Battalion, General Yao!
(The Shengjie Army should have been annihilated, this man is still alive, did he desert the battlefield?)
(This, this guy is the one who insisted in the Supreme Court that Marshal Ye was guilty—!)
This guy—! My father trusted him so much, I must stab him a few times!
Miss Ye, wait, if we can't bear the small things, we will mess up the big plans. Our goal this time is not him.
It's this self-seeking villain! If I see him elsewhere, I will smash him into a pulp with a hammer!
Damn guy, my late father was also... by such a villain...
He knows the times, unlike some people, who are stubborn and wasted Qingqing's life in vain.
Bah, this kind of villain can live in luxury, what a damn world!
If it wasn't here, I would have chopped him with a knife!
Just hearing his voice makes me sick.
(I didn't expect the comrades of the Ye Family Battalion to be invited here, Liu Fuming's purpose is even more intriguing.)
(Even the people of the Ye Family Battalion received an invite, what on earth does Liu Fuming want to do?)
Oh my, this is incredible, General, your heroic deeds in battle have inspired me greatly!
Cut the crap, I don't buy it.
Oh my, isn't this Mr. Shi and General Yao? I didn't expect to have the honor to drink and chat with you two.
This... Although he is in disguise, he should be Officer Wang from the Investigation Department, I didn't expect him to be invited too.
I'm sorry, I have poor eyesight, who are you?
Mr. Shi doesn't recognize me? It's true that the rich forget things, I visited Mr. Shi's house a few days ago.
You, you are Officer Wang from the Investigation Department?!
Since I was able to deceive Mr. Shi, it seems that my disguise skills are quite good.
Officer Wang, your seat is not here.
I just want to interact more with my colleagues in the court, is there anything wrong with that?
This... but this table is already full...
Hmph.
(Whispering) {PlayerSurName}Constable, quickly give up your seat for the officer...
(Considering the occasion, it's better to bear with it and cooperate with him for now.)
Please have a seat, sir.
Not bad, you little Constable do have some discernment.
Lord Wang, this is our Constable from the Daliang Mansion, I usually take charge of his discipline.
The Daliang Mansion has good discipline, not bad.
(They're flattering endlessly here, it's quite boring. Maybe I should sit somewhere else.)
Hello, I gave up my seat for him, could you arrange another seat for me?
Ah... alright, please follow me, honored guest.
Please sit here, Constable.
Wait, who is he, isn't this Lord Wang's seat?
I'm sorry, honored guest, Lord Wang has moved to another seat, this seat can only be given to Constable {PlayerSurName}.

Hey, do you know how much effort I put into getting the owner of the Liu Building to arrange for Lord Wang and me to sit at the same table? Now that it's been replaced by this poor Constable, how am I supposed to do business?!
This... but Lord Wang...
Hahaha, old Chen, this is what you call being too clever for your own good, man proposes, god disposes.
Stinky rat, what did you say?
I'm laughing at your scheming, Chen Guangzhou, it's known to all! Everyone knows that Lord Wang likes calligraphy and painting, your calculations are really loud.
You stinky rat who digs holes, watch your mouth or you'll have to deal with Eagle Claw Sun!
You—
The banquet is about to begin, the owner of the Liu Building has some words to say to all the honored guests, please be patient.
Hmph, consider yourself lucky, or I would have cursed you to death!
Honored guests, thank you for gracing Liu's banquet, your presence brings honor to my humble abode.

Everyone present today, regardless of their background and status, are friends of Liu. Naturally, I will serve you with the top-notch food and drinks in the building, all expenses will be borne by me, please don't be polite, drink till you drop!
No return without getting drunk!|Owner Liu is generous!

The Tower of Prosperity is indeed the most luxurious restaurant in Daliang City.\nDishes of wild herbs and seafood are served like a flowing stream, pots of fine wine are poured down the throat.\nOn the song and dance stage, beautiful women dance, making people's souls flip.
Alright, after eating and drinking, we can't forget the purpose of this trip.\nSo far, nothing seems to have happened, why not take a walk around the building and see what other people are doing.
Constable {PlayerSurName}, the banquet is not over yet, please don't run away first.
There are too many ghosts here, it's better not to stay for long.

You massacred the Tower of Prosperity, and Liu Fuming declared that he would never coexist with you.
But this incident didn't bring you any further impact, as for Liu Fuming, no one has seen him since.
A few days later, it is said that the residents of Daliang found a white blood-stained garment in the Daliang City river.
But that's another story.
People only know that the Tower of Prosperity has been abandoned since then, becoming a place where lonely ghosts gather that everyone avoids.
Did you all have a good time?
The feast of the owner of the Liu Building really opened our eyes, the Tower of Prosperity is indeed well-deserved!
As long as you enjoyed it, ladies, you may leave.
Yes.
Owner Liu, what do you mean?
I have prepared another gift for you all, please accept it.
Is this... the "Fake Crown Set"?
These are a few doggerel poems I wrote on a whim, please take a look.
"Constable Ghost Shadow is busy, causing people to be on guard everywhere.\nLying on the sickbed for several hours, where can I find the green pouch?"
Is... is this about me? It seems he already knows that I'm pretending to be a Constable...\nThe other poems are the same, they all describe what others are doing at the banquet...
Owner of the Willow Building, what do you mean by this?
It seems everyone has noticed that this "Fake Crown Set" describes all the dirty deeds you've done at this banquet.
You are all people of status, I presume you wouldn't want the contents of this "Fake Crown Set" to be known to the public, right?
Liu Fuming, what are you trying to do?
I just hope that you can do me a favor. As long as you can fulfill the content on the last page of the "Fake Crown Set" in your hands, I, Liu, will ensure that page will not be known to the public.
(The last page...)

"Pretending to be a Bailiff is a capital crime, but since the Constable is bedridden, you can take his place. If there are any fights in Daliang City in the future, please, Constable, do not interfere."
So Liu Fuming wants me to take over the original Constable's position and not to interfere with what might happen in Daliang City in the future...
He wrote this probably because he hasn't recognized who I am yet. But this move is ruthless. If it were someone else, they would probably be under his control for a lifetime...
Liu Fuming, keep dreaming! If you think I'm going to do your bidding, that's absolutely—
You—
Officer Shi?!
It seems Officer Shi can't hold his liquor. Chen, the innkeeper, could you help me get Officer Shi to a chair?
Officer Shi... is dead!
Liu Fuming, you dare to harm an imperial official! I will call the troops and horses to level your Tower of Prosperity!
Leave? None of you are going anywhere.
column3: ไป? ไม่ๆ พวกเจ้าจะไปไหนไม่ได้ทั้งนั้น

column2: You...
Liu Fuming, you've finally made a mistake.
The master is very unhappy and ordered me to clean up your mess.
Wait, please give me a chance to meet the master!
The master doesn't want to see you.
I didn't expect a small Constable to be able to block my sword.
You, you are...
Liu Fuming, I have something to ask you, you can't die so easily!
Let's see if you have the ability to save him!
(This guy's Wooden sword looks ordinary, but it can't be cut...)
I didn't expect the Constable of Daliang City to have such strength...
{PlayerSurName}Constable...{PlayerSurName}...
Could you be {PlayerName}?
Yes, I am.
Tsk.
The master seems to think highly of you, and specifically instructed that if {PlayerName} can help Liu Fuming solve this problem, spare Liu Fuming's life.
In that case, if I help you find the murderer who killed Mr. Shi, will you spare Liu Fuming's life?
After all, the master has spoken...\nI will guard the door, no one is allowed to run away before you find the murderer.
Hmph, who needs your help?
I promised Mr. Liu that no matter what happens, I will save you, and I also have something to ask you.
Liu Bencao, huh, meddling in other people's business.
You all heard what they said. I'll leave the investigation to {PlayerSurName}Constable, please cooperate with him.
You're the one with the surname Liu, aren't you the one who poisoned Mr. Shi? I'm not in the mood to play this game with you!
If you want to leave, feel free, just remember that Liao Yuelong is guarding the door.\nIf you want to make a move on me, feel free, but you'll have to get past {PlayerSurName}Constable first.
Hmph, since I'm not the one making the move, I'll play along with you!

Everyone in the room looks at each other and retreats to a corner.\nYou know clearly that the murderer of Mr. Shi is among these people.\nIf you want to find out who slandered you from Liu Fuming, you have to find the murderer first.
Alright, try to find out who the murderer is.
Burp, beauty, don't be idle, fill me up again!
Boss Chen is really generous, truly a hero.

Hehe, you're much more talkative than my wife at home, she only tells me not to drink, forget it, mentioning her is a mood killer! Let's continue drinking, this round, how about you drink with me, beauty~
Boss Chen, you're so bad, I don't have your tolerance, what if I can't handle my liquor...
Alright, then let me kiss you, and I'll drink this round for you~
Boss Chen, what are you talking about~~
(This man is really disgusting, better not to keep watching.)
Huh? Beauty, why are there two of you——?
It seems Boss Chen is completely drunk.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, have you finished eating? Why not sit down and have a few more drinks?
No, I want to take a walk around.
Mr. Shi, we need your support for our business recently.
Well said, well said.
Mr. Shi, Innkeeper, I've got a new batch of goods here, when will you two have time to take a look?
Oh? I wonder what it is——
Sorry, I'm a bit drunk, I'll go rest for a bit.
Mr. Shi, let me help you——
No need, I can go by myself...
Mr. Shi looks so pale, I hope nothing's wrong.
There... shouldn't be anything wrong.
Let's get back to business, Mole, about that batch of goods you mentioned——
(Glances at you quickly)\nLet's talk about it later, no rush, let's drink first~
Haha, alright, let's drink first.\nCome on, fill us up!
Alright, bosses.
Good wine, good food, if only there was a beauty dancing by the side~ Can you dance?
I know a little, I hope you won't mind, boss.
What are we waiting for, start dancing~
(It seems they're wary of me being here, I'd better keep my distance.)
Mr. Shi, I've got a new batch of goods here, the quality is not bad, when will you have time to take a look?
Sounds good, but I'm sorry, I'm a bit drunk, I'll go rest for a bit.
Mr. Shi, let me help you——
No need, I can go by myself...
Oh dear, can't handle your liquor, then all this good food and wine will be wasted on me, Mole!
Good wine, good food, if only there was a beauty dancing by the side~ Can you dance?
I know a little, I hope you won't mind, boss.
What are we waiting for, start dancing~
Sigh, Mr. Shi looks so pale, I hope he's really okay...
Good wine, good food and good music, how many times can one enjoy this in life~
Mr. Shi, you look pale, are you okay?
I'm fine... I just can't handle my liquor, I'll be fine in a bit, thank you for your concern, Constable...
(Shi Wansan is dead, who is this person?)
Hey, who are you really, and what are you trying to do by pretending to be Shi Wansan?
Me... I don't know what you're talking about... Me is feeling a bit unwell... Can you let Me be alone for a while?
(He doesn't look well, it doesn't seem like he's pretending. Better not cause a scene for now, I'll ask him later when I get the chance.)
Little Clerk, you look fair and tender, the treatment in the Da Liang Mansion must be good, right?
In response to your words, although the salary in the Da Liang Mansion is not high, I can feed my family without worry, so I don't have to live frugally.
Hmm, good, good. There aren't many young people like you who are content with what they have.
Thank you for your praise.
Come closer to Me, let Me have a good look at you.
You're in the prime of your life, sitting in the Government Office every day, your body is still strong.
Sir... I have been exercising...
Hmm, your body is good, why don't you come and work in our mansion, we will take good care of you.
Sir... your hand...
(This... I can't stand to watch this, I better get away from here.)
(I don't want to get close to that side, I better stay away from them.)
(This Scholar Shi wasn't sitting here originally, how did he get here?)
Mr. Shi, those books you ordered...
Hey, don't talk about those! Today is all about fun, don't talk about anything else!
Yes, Mr. Shi is right.
You... you're from the northwest, aren't you?
In response to your words, I am from the northwest.
I heard that all the girls from the northwest are good dancers, I wonder if it's true.
Then I will make a fool of myself.
Good, good, this waist, these legs.
Keep dancing, there's a reward from the official.
Thank you, sir.
(Mr. Shi seems to be drunk, he's behaving so inappropriately.)
Mr. Shi, I'll go and say hello to the owner of the Liu Building, so she can tonight...
You're really clever. I never ordered you to do this.
Understood, understood.
(So this Mr. Shi is also a beast in human clothing.)
You... you're from the northwest, aren't you?
In response to your words, I am from the northwest.
I heard that all the girls from the northwest are good dancers, I wonder if it's true.
Then I will make a fool of myself.
Good, good, this waist, these legs.
Keep dancing, there's a reward from the official.
Thank you, sir.
(Mr. Shi seems to be drunk, he's behaving so inappropriately.)
(He's in the middle of his fun, better not disturb him.)
The women from the Western Regions are indeed a feast for the eyes...
(Better not disturb her dancing.)
Good dance!
(Drinks all the wine in the cup)
Beautiful lady, fill Me up again!
Yes, General.
General, you're in a good mood.
Hahaha, you can't see this kind of scenery in the military camp, of course I have to enjoy it!
You scholars always talk about "a feast for the eyes", I didn't understand before, but now I do.
(Another cup of wine down)
I've never seen such a scene before, I guess this is what King Zhou's wine pool and meat forest were like.
If being an emperor means seeing this every day, I'd like to be an emperor for a few days!
General, you can't say that casually.
What am I afraid of! If you're afraid, stay away from me, I think you're a killjoy!
Beautiful lady, can you dance?
In response to your words, I am still practicing.
With your face and your figure, if you can dance, I don't know how many people would line up to see you!
I hope your words come true, General. When I've practiced, I'll dance for you first.
Hahaha, how about letting this General appreciate your dance tonight?
I will follow the General's orders.
Hahaha, good, fill Me up again!
General, don't get drunk, otherwise how can you appreciate my dance tonight?
This General is a Drinking God, the more I drink, the happier I get!
(Drinks all the wine in the cup)
General is heroic, I admire you greatly.
Hahaha, this General's abilities are not limited to this!
(This General Yao seems to have drunk too much, he dares to say such outrageous things.)
Beautiful lady, why are you swaying?
General, I didn't move, you drank too much.
What are you talking about?! This General can drink a thousand cups without falling, this is just the beginning, fill me up again!
Alas, General Yao is really disgraceful when he is drunk, he dares to say such outrageous things, if I don't stay away from him, I'm afraid I'll get into trouble...
Alas, should I also invite some girls to the Tea Shop...
I have almost asked about everyone's actions at the banquet, it sounds like everyone's statements can corroborate each other, but I always feel that something is strange, where is it strange?
Someone is lying.
The testimonies are contradictory.
Is someone lying... No, at present, everyone's statements can corroborate each other, and there is no evidence to indicate that someone is lying.
If no one is lying...
That contradiction in the testimony is strange.
This contradiction is...
Who spilled General Yao's wine.
Where has Mr. Shi been.
What did Eunuch Wang do.
No, this matter has nothing to do with Eunuch Wang...
No, Mr. Shi's whereabouts have always been clear, and a complete trajectory can be inferred from everyone's words.
Yes, General Yao claimed that the mole rat spilled his wine, but the mole rat denied it. Because of this, they had two disputes.
But this is strange, it's not a big deal to spill wine at a banquet, why would the mole rat deny it?
No, although I care about this, the current evidence cannot explain it, it seems that I have to start from another direction.
Reviewing everyone's testimony again, it seems that some things have not been mentioned by anyone...
The handprints on the body and the broken hairpin.
The conflict between General Yao and the mole rat.
How many places Mr. Shi has been.
No, General Yao had two conflicts with the mole rat, many people mentioned this.
No, Mr. Shi has been around three tables, many people mentioned this.
Yes... No one mentioned the handprints on Mr. Shi's body and the hairpin on his waist.
There were so many people at the banquet, if they lied, they would be easily exposed.\nBut if no one is lying, there is no conclusion to these two things with the current clues.
Could it be... there was such a person at the banquet that no one had ever seen?
Yes.
No.
If there is no such person, the current questions cannot be answered.
Although there is no evidence, I can only assume that there is such a person for now.
If there is such a person, how does he hide himself?
By using excellent Qinggong!
With the help of divine makeup skills.
No need to hide.
No... Even with high Qinggong, it's probably impossible to hide under the public eye.
No, even if others don't know, Liu Fuming who personally invited should be able to see someone is impersonating.
How could I forget, at the banquet, there are indeed people other than the guests, they are numerous and omnipresent...
It's the maids of the Tower of Prosperity!
Go find Liu Fuming and ask him to call out all the maids who have had contact with Mr. Shi.
All the maids who had contact with Mr. Shi today are here, I have already instructed, you can ask anything.
Thank you.
The clues should be almost found, if you have thought about it, go find Liu Fuming.
If you forget what others have said, go ask others again.
Mr. Shi's corpse has purple lips, blood in his mouth, bite marks on his lower lip, his left hand clutching his chest, seems to have suffered greatly before death.
The injury situation of the corpse...
There seems to be a reddish palm print on Mr. Shi's back, and something seems to be inserted in his lower abdomen...
It's a jade hairpin, it's broken.
There's nothing else worth noting.
{PlayerSurName} Constable, ask anything, I really have no relations with Mr. Shi's death!
(What should I ask?)
column3: (ข้าควรถามอะไรดี?)

column2: Ask what happened after you ran away.
Ask who touched Mr. Shi.
No more questions.
After you gave your seat to Eunuch Wang, I watched them three exchange pleasantries for a while, the content was nothing special.
Then the owner of Liu Building announced the start of the banquet, we all insisted on each other for a while before starting to eat.
Did Mr. Shi eat all the dishes at the banquet?
Mr. Shi ate a lot of that fish, but he didn't touch that meatball at all.
There's nothing else special, I also had a few bites of that fish, it was indeed very delicious.

Then those merchants came to toast, General Yao had a conflict with that merchant, so we went to watch the dance, that shifty-eyed merchant seemed to have something to find Mr. Shi, so Mr. Shi went to his table.
After that... (shivers all over)
(Looking at his reaction, what happened next must be the part I saw with Eunuch Wang and the Clerk.)
Clerk, I know about that part, you don't have to recall.
This... There are so many people at the banquet, it's normal to push each other a bit.
There's a handprint on Mr. Shi's shoulder, can you recall it carefully?
No, I can't remember, sorry I couldn't help.
{PlayerSurName} Constable, you must catch the murderer!
Damn hairy monster... That sword was really ruthless.
(What to ask General Yao?)
Ask what happened after you ran away.
Ask what happened before you came.
Ask who touched Mr. Shi.
No more questions.
After you ran away, they complimented each other for a while, then the banquet started, and they ate together.
Oh, this meal was really delicious, if I have the chance, I want to eat it again!
Did Mr. Shi have anything special?
Nothing, that shifty-eyed guy came to toast, knocked over my wine glass, if it wasn't in the Tower of Prosperity, I would have taken him down on the spot!
Later, I went to watch the beauty dance, but the more I thought about it, the angrier I got. I pushed that sneaky guy and then continued to watch the beauty dance.
Before you came? Nothing happened, just sitting and waiting.
The maid in charge of reception testified that you and Mr. Shi came together, and there seemed to be some conflict?
This... Yes, he blocked my way on the bridge outside the building, so I pushed him and we argued all the way here...
So that's how it is.
I don't know, I didn't have time to look at him.
You better hurry up and find it, I want to run away from this place as soon as possible!
Little constable, if you have any questions, ask them quickly. I have things to do.
(What should I ask the eunuch?)
Ask what happened after you ran away.
Ask the eunuch why he came to this table.
Ask who touched Mr. Shi.
No more questions.
After the little constable left, I had a great time talking with Mr. Shi and General Yao.
Ah, and that little clerk, he is really likable.
(A chill)
After the banquet started, everyone was very happy, and the next table came to toast. However, General Yao seemed unhappy and ran away alone.
Later, Mr. Shi also ran away, and I enjoyed the remaining side dishes alone with the little clerk.
(Another chill)
I work in the court, so naturally I have to get along well with my colleagues, so I took the initiative to change seats.
I see.
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว!

column2: I didn't see it, how could there be any violence at a banquet of this level?
Okay, little constable, you must find the murderer for Mr. Shi.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, please ask.
(What should I ask him?)
Ask about what happened at the banquet.
Ask if he noticed anything unusual about Mr. Shi.
No more questions.
Shortly after the banquet started, I went to toast Mr. Shi and the eunuch with the building owner and the mole.
When toasting, General Yao cursed the mole for some reason, and then left angrily.
After the toast, the mole said something to Mr. Shi, and Mr. Shi came to my table.
At the table, Mr. Shi and the building owner had a couple of drinks. At this time, General Yao came over and pushed the mole to the ground. We persuaded him for a long time before he left.
Later, Dean Lv came to find Mr. Shi and invited him to his own table.\nWhen Mr. Shi ran away, he seemed to trip over something and fell, but he waved his hand and said it was okay, so we didn't care.
Later, you, Constable, came.
Apart from falling, Mr. Shi didn't seem strange, but the building owner got very drunk after a few drinks, which you, Constable, should also know.
I hope {PlayerSurName}Constable can catch the criminal as soon as possible, I have to go back to do business.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, I have always been a good citizen, you must investigate clearly.
(What should I ask?)
column3: (ข้าควรถามอะไรดี?)

column2: Ask about what happened at the banquet.
Ask if he noticed anything unusual about Mr. Shi.
I heard you knocked over General Yao's wine glass?
No more questions.
To answer the constable, shortly after the banquet started, I went to toast the eunuch and Mr. Shi with the building owner.
At that time, General Yao cursed me for some reason, and then left with his wine glass.
After the toast, I wanted to talk business with Mr. Shi, so I invited him to my table.
Business? What business do you have to talk about with Mr. Shi?
Master Shi seems to have a fondness for relics from previous dynasties. I happen to have some and thought of selling them to him.
But unexpectedly, after having a couple of drinks with the owner of the Stone Building, Master Shi stopped discussing business with us.
What happened next?
Later, General Yao came to me, pushed me to the ground without a word, and it took a while for others to persuade him to leave.
After that, Dean Lu came to find Master Shi, and Master Shi left with him.\nBy the way, Master Shi stumbled when he was leaving, but he himself was quite cheerful, saying he was fine.
Then you arrived, sir.
Did Master Shi eat the food on your table?
No, he just had some drinks.
If anything was unusual, it was that Master Shi seemed to change after drinking, as if he was a bit dazed.
Dazed?
Yes, like he was drunk and acting crazy. But I don't know about Master Shi's alcohol tolerance and taste.
Did Master Shi drink a lot?
Not really, Master Shi just sipped a few times, while the owner of the Stone Building drank it all.
By heaven and earth, I didn't knock over General Yao's wine glass, it was General Yao who was looking for trouble!
Why was he looking for trouble? Did you have a grudge against him?
No, I had never heard of General Yao before...
Can you assure that you're telling the truth?
All true, no lies!
I wish you catch the despicable murderer soon, sir!
Ah, such bad luck, the deal didn't go through, and this happened...
{PlayerSurName}Constable, I've been with you all the time, there's nothing to ask, right?
It's routine, please understand.
Ah... alright, ask away.
(What should I ask?)
column3: (ข้าควรถามอะไรดี?)

column2: Ask about what happened at the banquet.
Ask if he noticed anything unusual about Mr. Shi.
No more questions.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, you're asking knowingly. I've been with you before I left my seat, and I didn't leave my seat afterwards.
(Indeed, Boss Chen has been with me all the time.)
I don't know, I never left my seat and didn't pay attention to others.
Ah... why am I so unlucky?
Ah, this kind of thing is really bad for the heart...
(What should I ask?)
column3: (ข้าควรถามอะไรดี?)

column2: Ask about what happened at the banquet.
Ask if he noticed anything unusual about Mr. Shi.
No more questions.

At the banquet... Dean Lu and I were having a pleasant conversation at first, but then Dean Lu saw Master Shi go to the table of the Stone Building owner. He also had something to discuss with Master Shi, so he went to invite Master Shi.
As soon as Dean Lu got up, he saw that the General and another person at the table were having some conflict. Dean Lu stepped forward to mediate, then Master Shi stumbled and came to this table.
After Master Shi arrived, Dean Lu wanted to say something to him, but Master Shi seemed to be indulging in wine, so Dean Lu left with a sigh.
You know what happened afterwards, Constable.
Master Shi seemed to have drunk too much and kept teasing the dancer from the northwest, even causing some trouble. Other than that, there was nothing noteworthy.
Ah, at my age, I really can't stand shocks.
Master Shi... is dead...
Can I ask Dean Lu a few questions?
Ah... Constable, please ask.
(What should I ask?)
column3: (ข้าควรถามอะไรดี?)

column2: Ask about what happened at the banquet.
Ask if he noticed anything unusual about Mr. Shi.
No more questions.
At the banquet... I saw Master Shi go to the table of the Stone Building owner. I also had something to discuss with Master Shi, so I went to invite him.
I had just gotten up when I saw General Yao causing trouble for the merchant in the grey clothes. It took us quite an effort to separate them.

Later, I invited Mr. Shi to my table, but he seemed uninterested in discussing matters, only thinking about the girl from the northwest... Seeing no opportunity to talk business with Mr. Shi, I simply went to watch the dance.
Mr. Shi's abnormality... Mr. Shi was indeed very rude before, I wonder if that counts as abnormal.
Sigh...
What brings you to me? Do you suspect me to be the murderer?\nThe current situation is the last thing I wanted.
Everyone present could be the murderer, including me.
Well, go ahead and ask.
(What should I ask?)
column3: (ข้าควรถามอะไรดี?)

column2: Ask where Liu Fuming was during the banquet.
Ask if there are any clues about the poison that Mr. Shi was poisoned with.
No more questions.
Observe your every move in secret and write that "Fake Crown Set".
(Indeed, Liu Fuming was not seen throughout the banquet)
Do you think Me is very proficient in Toxic?
You tame Viper, it's not strange that you are proficient in Toxic.
...Hmph, from what I can see, it should be a special kind of Snake poison. When initially poisoned, it's like being drunk, but once the poison reaches the heart, it will cause immediate death.
Snake poison, huh.
As you might think, I do keep such snakes, so it's normal for me to get this kind of Snake poison.
Believe it or not, the person who did it is definitely not me.
So? You seem confident, have you found out who the murderer is?
Already have a clue.
I'm still clueless, I want to ask more questions.
Then let me see what you're capable of!
Hmm... I shouldn't have drunk so much...
Mr. Stone, the building owner, can you answer a few questions for me?
Hmm, I--!
Hey, how can you--
Mr. Stone, the building owner, is fat, but this person doesn't seem to be that heavy, could it be that this person...
Shi Wansan is dead, who are you really? Why are you impersonating him?
Hmm, I--!
Hey, how can you--
Breathing heavily, this guy is not asleep.
You're not Shi Wansan, who are you?
(Secretly shows you a waist card).
"Jisufang"... what is that?
(In a low voice) Shh... keep it down, I'm working for the court.
(In a low voice) What is Jisufang?
(In a low voice) You don't need to know, I'll explain it to you later.
Haha, why are you all spinning...
This person is actually from the court, it seems this banquet is not simple...
Constable, feel free to ask me anything, I will tell you everything I know.
(What should I ask?)
column3: (ข้าควรถามอะไรดี?)

column2: Ask when she had contact with Mr. Shi.
Ask if there is anything noteworthy about Mr. Shi.
Is there anything else noteworthy?
No more questions.
I was in charge of welcoming Mr. Shi when he arrived, and I also led Mr. Shi and General Yao to their seats.
Mr. Shi and General Yao?
Yes, they came together, but they both seemed unhappy.
Unhappy? What happened between them?
I don't know about that.
I'm not sure, I was in charge of guiding them, then I went back to the entrance.
Well... there is a small matter...
What is it?
I can't find my hairpin... \nIt's a jade hairpin, a family heirloom passed down from my ancestors...
Hairpin... is this it?
Yes, it's this hairpin! How did it break, and why is there blood on it?
Actually, this was found on Mr. Shi's body...
Ah!? How could this be...
Do you remember when you lost it?
I don't remember, I was too busy at the time, and only noticed it was missing when the banquet started.
I pay my respects to the Constable.
I remember you came from the northwest, right?
The Constable actually remembers me, I am honored.
(What should I ask her?)
Ask when she had contact with Mr. Shi.
Ask if there is anything noteworthy about Mr. Shi.
Is there anything else noteworthy?
No more questions.
Mr. Shi came to the table I was in charge of later, and he seemed to like me a lot, so I danced for him.
Did you have any contact with him?
Mr. Shi's hands were somewhat unclean, but I'm used to this kind of thing.
There's one thing I found strange, Mr. Shi had something green on his waist.
(Something green on his waist?)
Anything else?
That's all.
Hmm... nothing else...
I have met the Constable.
(What should I ask her?)
Ask when she had contact with Mr. Shi.
Ask if there is anything noteworthy about Mr. Shi.
Is there anything else noteworthy?
No more questions.
When Mr. Shi and Mr. Shi, the building owner, were drinking, I was the one who poured the wine for them.
Where did you get the wine jug you used to pour the wine?
It was distributed by the kitchen.
Did anyone else drink from that jug of wine?
Several people at the table drank from it, but only Mr. Shi and the building owner were the most drunk.
If there's anything unusual about Mr. Shi, I think his alcohol tolerance might... he only drank about half a cup, and he seemed drunk.
A lot happened at the table I was in charge of, General Yao and Mr. Rat had a big fight, and Mr. Shi fell down afterwards...
By the way, when General Yao knocked down the mole, I saw a flash of green light.
Green light...
Greetings, Constable.
(What should I ask her?)
Ask when she had contact with Mr. Shi.
Ask if there is anything noteworthy about Mr. Shi.
Is there anything else noteworthy?
No more questions.
You may not know this, but I was originally in charge of Mr. Shi's table. So after the banquet started, I was in charge of everything for Mr. Shi and the others.
There's nothing unusual about Mr. Shi, he ate and drank normally.

Speaking of other concerns, the people at the table of the building owner came to toast Mr. Shi and the others, during which Mr. Rat knocked over General Yao's wine glass, and General Yao cursed at him.
It took me a lot of effort to calm down General Yao, but he went to push Mr. Rat to the ground before he would stop.
The mole himself said he didn't touch the wine glass.
That guy can't even admit his own mistakes, he's not a real man! I was right next to the table and saw everything clearly.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, I heard you know who the murderer is?
Of course, if I wasn't completely sure, I wouldn't have called you all here.
Then hurry up and bring out the murderer!
No rush, I want him to confess willingly.

First, let's start with the cause of Mr. Shi's death. There are three traces on Mr. Shi's body: purple lips, signs of poisoning with blood in the mouth; a broken hairpin stuck in the abdomen, and a handprint on the back.
The real cause of Mr. Shi's death is...
Poisoning.
The handprint on the back.
The hairpin in the waist.
In my opinion, the real cause of Mr. Shi's death is the palm print on his back. The murderer infused MP into Mr. Shi's body, shattering his internal organs...
But... there was no one around Mr. Shi when he died. Could it be that the murderer has the ability to strike from a distance?
The owner of the Liu Building has invited so many people, there might be martial arts masters among them...
{PlayerSurName}Constable, among all the people present, you probably have the highest martial arts skills. Are you suggesting that you killed Mr. Shi?
Haha, I'm just joking with you. The cause of death is certainly not this palm print!
{PlayerSurName}Constable, this is a matter of life and death, please be serious.
I have long seen through the murderer's tricks. The poison and the palm print are both disguises. The real cause of death is the hairpin inserted into his abdomen!
But... this hairpin seems to have only been inserted a little bit into the abdomen... Can this depth really kill a person?
This... maybe it was a coincidence that it hit a vital spot...

{PlayerSurName}Constable, I have assisted coroners in autopsies before. With this depth, it's hard to even penetrate the abdominal muscles, let alone hit a vital spot. How could it possibly have killed Mr. Shi?
This... haha, I'm not a coroner, it's normal for me to make a mistake.

Of these three traces, the one that undoubtedly caused Mr. Shi's death is the trace of poison. Moreover, according to the owner of the Liu Building, the poison in Mr. Shi was a special snake venom, which the owner of the Liu Building happens to keep!
So, are you saying that the murderer is the owner of the Liu Building?
Don't rush to identify the murderer. What I want to say now is, when was Mr. Shi poisoned?
According to the owner of the Liu Building, when initially poisoned, one would become more excited, as if drunk.
So, it was after Mr. Shi toasted with the owner of the Shi Building?
(When was Mr. Shi poisoned?)
He was poisoned when he toasted with the owner of the Shi Building.
He was poisoned after toasting with the owner of the Shi Building.
Mr. Shi was poisoned before that.
Exactly, the only one who could have done this at the time was the maid who poured Mr. Shi's wine!
This is impossible! Although I was the one who poured the wine, other people also drank from the same pot!
You must have used a special pot that can control when to pour out the poison! Only the wine given to Mr. Shi was poisoned, the wine in everyone else's cups was normal!
So that's how it is!
{PlayerSurName}Constable, I can bring out all the wine cups in the building for you to check, but what if there isn't the kind you mentioned?
This... bring them out for inspection first!
As you wish.

Liu Fuming had his servants bring out all hundreds of wine pots from the Tower of Prosperity and pile them in front of you. You carefully examined each one, but none of them had that special structure.
How about it, {PlayerSurName}Constable, did you find anything?
It seems I was wrong, Mr. Shi was not poisoned at this time...
Mr. Shi's toast with the owner of the Shi Building was just a diversion, he was actually poisoned after that!
That's not right, Mr. Shi only drank a little bit at the time and looked drunk. He shouldn't have been poisoned after that.
This... I forgot about this...
What's going on?
The maid testified that everyone else also drank from that pot of wine, but apart from Mr. Shi, no one showed symptoms of being poisoned.
According to other people's testimonies, Mr. Shi looked drunk after drinking with the stone building owner, and he only had a little bit, which means Mr. Shi must have been drunk before that.
Then why wasn't Mr. Shi pretending to be drunk, but was actually poisoned afterwards?
Of course there is evidence, this is it!
This is my hairpin...
Such a broken hairpin? What can it prove?
No, this is not a broken hairpin, this thing is at least a hundred years old!\nIt's a pity it's broken, otherwise it could be exchanged for a couple of gold pieces...
As expected of the innkeeper, you really know your stuff!
This hairpin is not just any broken hairpin, but a family heirloom of the maid in charge of reception, passed down from her ancestors.
And today, this hairpin was lost and mysteriously ended up in Mr. Shi's abdomen.
Could it be that Mr. Shi stole it?
Of course Mr. Shi didn't steal it. Even if Mr. Shi knew the value of this thing, he wouldn't risk stealing it.
Then who could it be? And how could this thing have a relation to the time Mr. Shi was poisoned?
To talk about this, we have to first talk about another thing. Among the people present, there should be another person who knows the value of this hairpin.
Who, who is it?
The person who knows the value of this hairpin—
It's you, Chen Guangzhou!
It's Eunuch Wang!
The mole over there, I'm talking about you!
Me? I'm just a seller of calligraphy and paintings...\nI don't know about such things.
Haha, just kidding.
There are plenty of good things in our house, but we don't care for such things. Besides, if we wanted this hairpin, would we need to resort to such means?
Yes, I mean Eunuch Wang doesn't care for this thing~
Heh, if you keep talking nonsense, I'll have someone rip out your tongue!
You, what evidence do you have!
Mole, since you have this nickname, and from the bits and pieces of conversation I heard earlier, if I'm not mistaken, you should be a tomb raider, right?
In your line of work, you should be more familiar with such things, so I guess, you took this hairpin on a whim.
How can you slander me out of thin air!
I do have evidence! First, the maid at your table said that when you were knocked down by General Yao, she saw a flash of green light.
Then there's this dancer from the northwest, she's the only one today who mentioned that Mr. Shi had a green object stuck in his waist!
Combining the fact that Mr. Shi tripped when he ran away from his seat, this hairpin must have been inserted into Mr. Shi's body at that time.
At this time, Mr. Shi was in a state of excitement due to being poisoned, and didn't feel any pain. This also explains that Mr. Shi couldn't have been poisoned after this!
Tsk... I admit defeat, you're right, but I only did this one thing, everything else has nothing to do with me!
No, speaking of things related to you, there's one more thing related to you.
What are you talking about?
column3: เจ้ากำลังพูดถึงอะไร?

column2: Of course it's about General Yao's wine cup being knocked over.
This has nothing to do with me! I didn't touch his wine cup at all!
Hmph, trying to deny such a trivial matter, you're not acting like a man!
Yes, this matter is indeed not big, but your reactions are completely different, which is what intrigues me.
So, to understand this, we need...
Everyone, please recount the situation at that time.
Please cooperate in recreating the situation at that time.
Everyone repeated the situation at the time, and it was consistent with the previous testimonies.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, have you reached a conclusion?
Your testimonies are the same as before and cannot resolve my doubts. It seems there is only one way...
Please recall your positions when you were toasting at that time and stand there again.
My position was where the stone Building owner was, and Chen Dean was sitting where Mr. Shi was, right?
Yes, it should have been like that at the time.
(Is this position correct?)
Yes.
No!
Wait, I remember it wasn't like this...
Is there a problem?
I remember, at that time, the Maid should have been standing between General Yao and me...
Are you sure?
column3: ท่านแน่ใจ?

column2: I am sure, General Yao should be able to confirm it too!
...It seems to be like that.
No, you once said, "I was by the table at the time and saw everything clearly."
But your current position is not by the table at all, and you can't see the wine glass!
Hmm, indeed I also remember that he was standing next to me at the time.
Miss, please come over here.
In this way, we can roughly guess what happened.
At that time, the stone Building owner brought the mole rat to toast to Mr. Shi.
At this moment, General Yao's wine glass was knocked over, and he scolded the mole rat.
At this time, everyone went to appease General Yao.
After that, Mr. Shi was poisoned.
So it seems, the incident is clear. The person who could knock over General Yao's wine glass at the time was not only the mole rat, but also another person—
It's you, the Maid in charge of this table!
The poison too...
Wait, Constable, what you said before makes sense, but she is so far away from Mr. Shi, how did she poison Mr. Shi?
(The way the Maid poisoned Mr. Shi was...)
She used her finger strength to flick the poison into Mr. Shi's wine glass.
She used Throwing to plot against Mr. Shi.
The Maid indeed has no way to poison.
Yes, she seems weak, but her martial arts skills are extraordinary. She used her finger strength to flick the poison—

{PlayerSurName}Constable, the refined Snake poison is like water, it is a liquid. Not to mention her, I'm afraid even a general martial arts master can't flick it into Mr. Shi's wine glass across the table.
I can do it, do you want to try?
{PlayerSurName}Constable, let's not joke about this.
What do you mean? Looking down on me?
{PlayerSurName}Constable, aren't we talking about this Maid poisoning the matter now?\nOr are you saying that you are the one who poisoned?
Hahaha, I was just joking~
It seems to be a bit difficult to say, it seems it should not be this method...
{PlayerSurName}Constable, you should think carefully before you speak.
This location is not far from Mr. Shi, she might be able to launch a Throwing attack.
Indeed, if someone skilled in Throwing were to attack Mr. Shi from here with a dart, it would be easy. But Mr. Shi doesn't seem to have any Throwing injuries, does he?
Well... it seems so.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, you should think carefully before you speak.
{PlayerSurName}Constable, what do you mean?\nIf it wasn't her Poison, then who could it be?
(All the previous speculations should be correct, this is the last question!)\nThe Maid couldn't have used Poison, it must have been her accomplice who used Poison. The person who used Poison is—
The Golden Fortune Shop Innkeeper!
The mole!
The stone Building owner!
Eh?! Me?\nBut at that time, I was trying to separate General Yao and the mole...
Does anyone vouch for you?
Well, as he said, General Yao was incredibly strong, it took several of us to pull him away...
In that case... at least we can rule out the possibility of the Golden Fortune Shop Innkeeper!
But... at that time, I was being scolded by General Yao, I had no time or opportunity to Poison...
It seems to be the case...
{PlayerSurName}Constable, are you just making this up?!
The Maid's accomplice, the only one who could have poisoned Mr. Shi, is this person— the stone Building owner who is pretending to sleep over there!
But how could the stone Building owner...
No, he is not the stone Building owner.
What did you say?!
"Stone Building owner", could you please explain to everyone?
You're amazing, {PlayerSurName}Constable. You got it all right.
The man in front of us, Shi Wansan, took off his coat, wiped off his makeup, and instantly transformed into a completely different person,
Who are you? I don't remember inviting you.
You may not know me, Liu Building owner, but you should recognize this badge.
Jisufang, you, you are—!
Yes, I am from Jisufang, Liu Building owner, you should know your situation now, right?
Tsk.
What does this mean?
