{PlayerSurName}Constable, Jisufang is an organization established at the beginning of this dynasty, with the purpose of monitoring every move of Liu Fuming's master, so we have been paying attention to this banquet for a long time.
Liu Fuming, we will not allow these court officials to collude with your master!
...But even so, you could have just collected evidence and taken us away, there was no need to kill, right?
Yes, you should have many options, there was no need to kill Mr. Shi...
From what I see, you chose to kill Mr. Shi for another motive.\nThis motive should be...
Personal grudge!
Did Mr. Shi steal the woman you love?
Was it an accident?
{PlayerSurName}Constable, there's no need to guess here, I have no grudges with Mr. Shi.
But you did attack, which means... Mr. Shi was not your target, was he?
What, what are you talking about?
If I'm not mistaken, the person you wanted to kill...
Is Eunuch Wang.
Is the Clerk.
Is General Yao?
Could it be me?
What does this matter have to do with you? We both don't know you.
That's true...
Huh?! Me?
Humph, if we really wanted to kill you, we wouldn't have to go through all this trouble!
Phew...thank goodness...
Although General Yao has killed countless people, he has no relation to us.
Hmm, I think so too...
Then why did you say it was me? Are you trying to make fun of this General?!
Exactly, that eunuch must die today!
A distinguished guest has already died in my building today, we can't afford any more mishaps.
Damn it...
Brother!
Sister... it seems that our revenge cannot be avenged today...
What have we done to offend you?
Wang, you coveted my family's land, used your power to imprison my father, sent me to the army, and turned my sister into an official prostitute!
I wish I could eat your flesh, skin you and pull out your tendons!
I originally wanted to take this opportunity to kill you for revenge, but unfortunately...
Wait, I'm a bit confused, how did Mr. Shi die?
...I saw the owner of the Stone Building pour something into my cup, so I switched cups with Mr. Shi. I didn't know someone was going to assassinate me, let alone that the wine was poisoned.
This...
Clerk, how should this situation be judged?
This...
My actions were for self-defense, naturally I am innocent.\nThey both wanted to poison and kill me, there's only one way for them - death!
Little Clerk, Little Constable, am I right?
This...
(What the eunuch said seems to be correct, but...)
Yes.
No!
...You're right, Mr. Shi's death was purely accidental and has nothing to do with you...
You're a sensible little constable. Here, this is my reward for you.
Thank you, eunuch.

You should bring the real culprit to justice and send him to the Government Office.\nThe banquet ended in discord, and Liao Yuelong did not persist.\nThe guests left one after another, and you also took off your disguise. Only the three of you were left in the Tower of Prosperity.
Isn't that right, Eunuch Wang? You should have known that someone wanted to assassinate you.
What do you mean?

Firstly, you deliberately disguised yourself to attend this banquet. Although you claimed not to want to attract attention, you specifically revealed your identity to Mr. Shi and General Yao. This shows that your disguise is not as simple as you said.

Secondly, it took Chen Innkeeper a lot of effort to arrange for you to sit with Liu Building owner. I think Chen Innkeeper wanted to take this opportunity to flatter you, but you changed your seat without even greeting Chen Innkeeper.
If I'm not mistaken, you should have known in advance that someone wanted to assassinate you, so you disguised yourself and changed your seat to sit with Mr. Shi and General Yao, whom you know best.
So when you saw that something was added to your wine cup, you switched cups with Mr. Shi when no one was paying attention.
Perhaps you were acting out of self-defense, but you can't escape responsibility for Mr. Shi's death!
You, you--\nYou're just a little constable, it would be easy for me to kill you!

You should bring the real culprit to justice and send him to the Government Office.
Eunuch Wang was also taken to the Government Office by you, waiting for trial.
The banquet ended in discord, and Liao Yuelong did not persist.
The guests left one after another, and you also took off your disguise. Only the three of you were left in the Tower of Prosperity.
As expected of {PlayerName}, truly extraordinary.
The event has been resolved, as per the agreement...
Hmm, I always keep my promises, let him live.

Liu Fuming, as per the order, you can still manage the Tower of Prosperity as a condition for sparing your life, but the other positions in the tower will be arranged by the master. Without the master's permission, you are not allowed to leave this tower.
...Yes.
I have finished my business here, I'll take my leave.
{PlayerName}, you are really impressive, you ruined the master's plan and still managed to earn his favor.
Just a word of advice, don't end up like me.
Wait, I have something to ask you.
What is it? Is it about the Beast Manor?
Although I really want to kill you, my mother spared your life, there must be a reason...
Liu Fuming, I will never forgive you, but since my aunt chose to spare your life, there must be a reason.
I am not from the Beast Manor, and you have received your deserved punishment. I am here for something else.
Not for the Beast Manor... then what else could it be?
I just returned from the southwest, and everywhere in the Central Plains, there are rumors about me being "evil and heartless". Is this your doing?
Your reputation is ruined? Hahaha...\nThis is indeed a joy to the world, but why do you think it was me?
Who else could have such influence besides you!
You really think highly of me.\nIndeed, I might be capable of it, but this has nothing to do with me.
If it's not you, then who could it be!?
... "Rumor Platform", you must have heard of it, right?
Indeed, if it's the Rumor Platform, they could do it...
Rumor Platform... I thought it was just a legend?
Are you saying it's the work of the Rumor Platform? But why would they...
How would I know?
Do you know where I can find them?
They operate in secret, even the beggar outside the door could be one of them.
But if you want to find them, there is a way.
I'd like to know more.
My master, King Chai, has far more power and influence than me. If even he can't help you find the people from the Rumor Platform, I'm afraid no one in this world can.
The master of the Rumor Platform is King Chai, what does he want to do by tarnishing my reputation?!
It seems you have already met my master, that saves trouble.
It seems I have to meet this King Chai no matter what.\nLiu Fuming, do you know where he is?
He is very cautious in his actions, it's not easy to meet him, but there is an opportunity to see him soon.
What opportunity?
He will be hosting a birthday banquet soon, if you can get an invitation, you can meet him at the banquet.
Invitation... can you give me one?
... If the matter in the southwest hadn't failed, maybe I could have given you one. Now, the master will never give me such power again.
But since the master appreciates you, you might as well try your luck in the southeast, maybe you can get an invitation by chance.
Southeast... how do I get there?
At the southernmost point of the Wuyue Region, there is a mountain called Meishan. There is an ancient path on the mountain that leads to the southeast, you can go from there.
Thank you for the information, Mr. Liu, the owner of the building. I'll take my leave now.
...Disappear quickly, I don't want to see you.
Next, let's go southeast to meet this King Chai.
The people here are waiting for me to solve the case, and besides, Liao Yuelong is still outside...
After making a fuss here, it's time to leave.

You massacred the Tower of Prosperity, and Liu Fuming declared a feud with you.
However, this incident didn't bring you any further trouble. As for Liu Fuming, no one has seen him since.
A few days later, it was said that the residents of Daliang found a white blood-stained garment in the river of Daliang City.
But that's a story for another time.

The doors of the Flower Tower are still wide open, with continuous music, numerous guests, and flowing banquets. It seems that the blood of that day has been washed away, and the new owner is reclusive, with no one knowing his true face...
"Green curtains lightly roll to reflect the new clothes", this must be the place. Madam, you must be one of the experts appointed by King Chai.
I wouldn't say I'm an expert. I just know some Amateurish Strike. If you're interested, I'd be happy to accompany you.
Then let me learn from your skills, madam!
Oh dear, sir, I didn't hold back. I hope I didn't hurt you too much.
Damn it, I was just careless. I'll come back to learn from you, madam!
Are you here to learn again, sir?
I won't be careless this time!
Sir, you have impressive skills. I admit defeat.
As long as you defeat the remaining few, you can get an invitation to the banquet.
It seems that you have already challenged the others. Then, as agreed, I will give you this invitation.
"Fine wine rushes through the busy tables", you must be the expert appointed by King Chai, waiter.
Oh, King Chai is overestimating me. If I were a martial arts expert, would I still be a waiter here?
I don't care if King Chai is overestimating you or not. Since King Chai appointed you, all I need to do is defeat you!
Then I have to offend you.
Oh dear, sir, have you had too much to drink? Why did you fall down?
Damn it, don't be smug. I will defeat you sooner or later!
Sir, you're back. It seems that I did a good job last time?
Enough with the cheap talk, I will definitely win this time!
Sir, you are very powerful. I am not your match.
But I see that there are still a few people you haven't challenged yet. I can't give you this invitation personally.
It seems that you have already challenged the others. Then, I will give you this invitation.
"The market is bustling with red, green and yellow", you must be the expert appointed by King Chai.
Sigh, one just left and another one comes. It's really not peaceful.
If you want to fight, do it quickly. I have to do business after this!
I didn't expect you to be so bad. You should go back and practice more. Don't embarrass yourself.
Damn it, I will definitely win next time!
Have you practiced enough this time? You're not here to get beaten again, are you?
You're the one who's going to get beaten!
Ouch, be gentle...
You better go find someone else who hasn't been beaten yet. Don't just pick on me...
Take the invitation. I hope next time you come to buy vegetables. I can't take much more beating...
"Sparks fly beside the hammer", this must be the place.
...I was halfway through forging the iron, looks like I'll have to reheat it in the furnace. I should have known better than to challenge the Wood King.
Be careful, this hammer weighs dozens of pounds. If it slips and hits you, it's no joke.
This time it's fine, the iron ingot hasn't cooled down yet, it seems I don't need to reheat it.
Uncle, you really hit hard.
...You really know how to pick your moments. Fine, let's do a Blitz attack like last time.
I won't lose to the same person twice!
Finally finished, I need to get back to forging.
You should still have a few people you haven't challenged yet, go challenge others.
Finally, I can hand this thing over. Being too close to the furnace, I was worried it would get burned...
{PlayerSurName} young hero, these four tables are prepared for the heroes of the martial arts world, please feel free to take a seat.
(It seems that the disciples of various sects are sitting over there, the Wood King's reach is quite long...)
{PlayerSurName} young hero, we meet again.
I didn't expect Brother Lu to also attend the Wood King's birthday banquet.
Yes, although I feel there will be a lot of trouble, it's even more troublesome when the Wood King's messenger comes knocking every other day.
I see, that's very much like Brother Lu's style.
...This guy's face, sigh, it seems trouble is inevitable.
Why are you all sitting at this table and not going to the others?
It's not that we want to squeeze here, it's just...

That gentleman over there is called Fu Duanyun, he prides himself on his superior swordsmanship and claims that only those who can outperform him in swordsmanship can sit with him, it's a hassle just thinking about it.
As for that gentleman over there, you see him and those two maids whispering sweet nothings, if I go there, wouldn't it ruin his mood?

As for the one farthest away, he's also a character, known as the Carefree Beggar Mo Yuan. Although his skills and personality are not a problem, he just doesn't like to bathe, he's too smelly, even I don't want to get close to him.
So that beggar is so powerful, I knew he wasn't an ordinary person...
Young hero, think about it, which table do you plan to sit at?
(Although it doesn't matter to me which table I sit at, if I make a fool of myself in front of so many people, my fame will be ruined. Which table should I sit at?)
I'll just sit at this table.
Go to Fu Duanyun's table! <color=#097a76>(Blade80, protagonist solo)</color>
Ruin that romantic scene.
Go to Mo Yuan's table.
Hahaha, welcome young hero.
The protagonist sits on the chair at Lu Yunlong's table
You young whippersnapper, daring to sit here, you've got guts.
You have plenty of empty seats, I just found an empty one to sit down, what's this about being brave or not?
Good, the rule I, Fu, set is that anyone who sits at this table must defeat me. Do you have the ability to sit here, kid?
Then you come and try!
Kid, you're not strong enough, you better not sit here.
Looks like you came back with your tail between your legs.
Sigh... I didn't expect him to be so powerful...
I didn't expect you to be so young, but you're quite skilled. This seat is yours!
This kid is pretty good.
Isn't this Brother {PlayerSurName}? I didn't expect to meet you so soon.
Greetings, Young Master Han.
I didn't expect Brother {PlayerSurName} to be so tactless. I don't like being disturbed.
Are you blind? Can't you see I'm in a good mood? Did you come here specifically to spoil my mood?
Coincidentally, I also came here hand in hand with my beloved. The other tables are all filled with rough men, which is quite uninteresting.
Hahaha, I see. I didn't expect us to have the same idea. I also felt that those men were ruining the atmosphere between me and them, so I chose to sit alone.
I am Han Zidu. You seem to get along well with me, may I know your name?
I am {PlayerName}.
Sigh, I'm really asking for trouble.
Are you joking, brother?
Of course not, watch closely!
(It really stinks here, they weren't exaggerating...\nBut since I've already boasted about it, I have to sit down even if it's disgusting!)
Senior Mo, is this seat taken?
No, you can sit.
Then I won't be polite.
I can't stand it anymore, it's too stinky!!
Hahaha, I'm back, I won!
Damn, just a little bit...
Sigh... I must have misjudged.
What are you talking about?
column3: เจ้ากำลังพูดถึงอะไร?

column2: I made a bet with them to see how long you could stand it before coming back. I won!
What's so good about betting on this...
It's not that bad, they exaggerated it.
Really that amazing?!
The spiritual master is indeed mysterious.
It seems I won~
Is that... Brother Lu?
Oh, there's more to watch.
Hey, who allowed you to sit here?
There's a vacant seat here, can't I sit?
If you can beat me in one move, you can sit here!
Who made this rule?
Of course, it's my rule!
So if I beat you in one move, according to my rules, should you run away?
You, you...
(I thought Brother Lu would gladly agree to fight him, it seems Brother Lu is not purely a man of courage and bravery.)
Your rules are interesting, I wonder whose rules I should follow?
You, you are... Golden Sword Wang Hu?!
Golden Sword Wang Hu?! Even he is here!
Who is he, is he famous?
He was quite famous more than a decade ago. He claimed to be the best swordsman in the world and challenged all the swordsmen. Many good hands were defeated by his sword.
But then he suddenly disappeared. Some say he was hurt by love, some say he was seriously injured, and some say he is already dead...
I see.
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว!

column2: I didn't expect to see Golden Sword Wang Hu here. Indeed, Duke Chai's Tower is full of talents.
Who is he, is he famous?
I've only heard of his name. More than a decade ago, his Golden Sword was famous all over the world, but then he suddenly disappeared.
I thought he had made too many enemies and was killed by them, but it seems he is doing well.
I see.
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว!

column2: Senior, please have a seat.
Senior Wang, could we have a match after the birthday banquet?
Sure, sure.
Have all the distinguished guests arrived?
Sir, they have all arrived.
...There are a lot fewer than I expected.
Yes...

Honored guests, thank you for your patience and for attending my birthday banquet. Today, we not only have the disciples of various sects, but also the outstanding heroes of the martial arts world. It is my great honor to be in the same room with you.
Ji Baichu, serve the dishes.
Yes, sir.

One after another, the exquisite dishes were served like a flowing river.\nKing Chai greeted each table of guests warmly, and the guests racked their brains to say some auspicious birthday wishes.\nYou suddenly feel a bit dazed, this royal banquet seems no different from the village feast.
Heroes of the martial arts world, since you have come to my birthday banquet, you will be my friends in the future. If you need my help, I will definitely do my best to assist!
King Chai, you are so good at making friends with the heroes of the martial arts world, you are truly a contemporary Mencius!
Haha, I can't bear such a compliment.
Your Highness King Chai, I have a presumptuous request...
You fool, look at the occasion, what kind of presumptuous request are you making at a birthday banquet...
This...
We are all friends, what is your request, just say it.
Since Your Highness said so, I will say it...\nI made some mistakes in Zhongzhou and now I am wanted by the government...
That's not a problem, I will send someone to help you settle it, you can rest well in my mansion during this period.
Thank you, King Chai!
In that case... Your Highness, I accidentally hurt someone back in my hometown...
Don't worry, that can be handled too.
Thank you, Your Highness King Chai!
Then I also...
{PlayerName} young hero, I have been paying attention to you for a long time, and today I finally have the chance to meet you. Is there anything I can help you with?

Your Highness King Chai, recently someone has been spreading rumors that I have been killing and setting fires everywhere, committing all kinds of evil deeds. I suspect it is the work of the Rumor Platform, but I don't know where this Rumor Platform is. Your Highness King Chai, you have many connections, can you help me find out?
Oh? There is such a thing--
Han Anren, the Southeastern Pacification Envoy and the General of the Blade Destruction Army, pays his respects to King Chai!
A group of soldiers swarmed in, surrounding the venue
Tsk, trouble...
Government troops?|Why would the government troops come here?|What are these government troops here for?
General Han, what is the meaning of this?
What a lavish banquet, I didn't expect that the Southeast, which just experienced a rebellion, still has so many delicacies.
It's all thanks to General Han for defeating the rebels, so I can hold this banquet without any worries. General Han, if you are interested, why not sit down and have some food?
No need, the military situation is urgent, I have some questions for Your Highness King Chai, please come with me.
Four soldiers surround King Chai
General Han, what is the meaning of this?
We found something related to Your Highness in the bandit camp. Your Highness King Chai, you wouldn't refuse to cooperate with my investigation, would you?
General Han, I am entertaining guests, does it have to be now?
The military situation is urgent, please understand, Your Highness King Chai.
Han, King Chai has the imperial edict of the founding emperor of our dynasty, how can you arbitrarily take him for questioning?
Right, how can you just take people away?!
May I know the names of the two heroes?
Golden Sword, Wang Hu!
I... have nothing to do with you!
Alright, I will tell you why I am taking him!
Firstly, I invited His Highness Prince Chai to cooperate with the investigation. If it is found that Prince Chai is not involved in this matter, I will personally escort him back to his mansion.

Secondly, the Iron Certificate clearly states, "If the descendants of the Chai family commit a crime, they shall not be punished. Even if they commit treason, they shall only be executed in prison, not publicly executed or implicated their relatives." If this matter is indeed related to Prince Chai, it would be an unforgivable crime of treason!

Thirdly, Prince Chai's followers, such as Wang Hu, have obstructed official duties. According to the law, they should be imprisoned for three months and receive eighty lashes. If they have a criminal record, they should be punished for all their crimes!
This... forget I said anything.
If you're afraid, your father's surname isn't Wang!
It seems you want to test the power of the Blade Destruction Army?
Mr. Wang, please stop.
But, Your Highness...
General Han is just asking me to cooperate with the investigation. I have never done anything wrong and I believe the truth will soon be revealed and I will return to my mansion.
Since Your Highness has said so... alright then.
Since Prince Chai is so understanding, I will arrange for these soldiers to search Duke Chai's Tower later. I'm sure Your Highness, being so generous, will not refuse, right?
Please do, just don't damage my precious collections.
I can assure you on that matter, Your Highness, please rest assured.
General Han, please lead the way.
Prince Chai, after you.
The sudden incident at the birthday banquet caught everyone off guard. The banquet ended in a way that no one could have expected. All the delicious food lost its taste at this moment.
Amitabha, I didn't expect such a thing to happen at Prince Chai's birthday banquet. I need to return to the temple and inform the Abbot.
I didn't expect such a thing to happen at Prince Chai's birthday banquet. I need to return to the Taoist Sect and inform the Sect Leader.
I didn't expect such a thing to happen at Prince Chai's birthday banquet. I need to return to the guild and inform the Dojokeeper as soon as possible.
I didn't expect such a thing to happen at Prince Chai's birthday banquet. I need to report this to the Pavilion Master as soon as possible.
I didn't expect such a thing to happen at Prince Chai's birthday banquet. I need to report this to the Boss as soon as possible.
Mr. Ji, I need to report the incident at the banquet to the clan leader. You don't have any objections, do you?
Friends from various sects, this matter has nothing to do with your sects. I'm sure Prince Chai doesn't want to drag you into this. Please go back and remember what His Highness said at the banquet.
Mr. Ji, what's going on?
Yeah, what's going on?
Everyone, please calm down and listen to me.

As you all know, Prince Chai comes from a prominent family. Since Han Anren took office as the governor, he has been causing trouble for Prince Chai in order to get him to contribute money and effort. This time, he must have chosen to make trouble at the prince's birthday banquet. His intentions are condemnable.
You're right!
That's despicable!
This Han seems honest, but he's so despicable. Mr. Ji, we Vagabonds may not have much, but we have strength! Why don't we storm his county office and rescue Prince Chai!
Yes, rescue him!
I'm best at digging tunnels!
I appreciate the kindness of all the heroes on behalf of Prince Chai, but storming the county office is tantamount to treason...
This...
I've already got a lot of blood on my hands anyway!
Please let us help Prince Chai!
In that case, I do have a plan. If successful, not only can we ensure the safety of Duke Chai, but you all will not bear the crime of treason. What do you think?
Who doesn't know about Duke Chai's virtue?! If there's a way to save him, I, Wang Hu, will be the first to agree!
I agree too!|Same here!|Count me in!
I understand your intentions, what about the others?
I, Old Beggar, prefer to act alone, so I won't join your fun.
I just want to compete with the masters, I'm not interested in anything else.
Ah, what a hassle...
Young master, shall we avoid this muddy water?
Of course, how could I let you fall into danger?
I see, {PlayerSurName} young hero, what are your thoughts?
(Should I agree to help?)
If Duke Chai needs help, I will naturally lend a hand!
I have a feeling that something is not right about this, let's wait and see.
column3: ข้ารู้สึกว่ามีบางสิ่งที่ไม่ชอบมาพากล รอคอยดูสถานการณ์กันต่อไปก่อนดีกว่า

column2: In that case, those who are unwilling to help may leave. You are no longer friends of Duke Chai's Tower, and we will go our separate ways from now on.
I didn't expect {PlayerSurName} brother to choose not to stay and help.
I just feel that this matter is not simple...
Ah, I feel the same way.
What do you two find suspicious? I want to see if your judgments match mine.
Duke Chai likes to make friends with heroes and has many guests in his mansion, but today Old Beggar only saw that man surnamed Ji, the number of people is too few.
Moreover, when Han Anren came to "invite" Duke Chai, Mr. Ji seemed too calm, as if he had planned it all along.
His response afterwards was neither hurried nor slow, which is indeed strange.
And that Golden Sword Wang Hu, he actually proposed to rescue Duke Chai from the Government Office, no matter how you think about it, it's strange.
Your guesses are similar to mine, there must be something more to this.
So, what do you want to do?
Ah... what a hassle, I don't want to get involved in this mess.
Old Beggar just needs a place to beg.
I, the young master, just want to travel, eat, drink and have fun, I don't want to get involved in anything else.
I'm just a martial artist, I just want to become stronger.
I came here to ask Duke Chai about the rumors...
It sounds like you should stay in Duke Chai's Tower.
Maybe so, but I can't ignore these doubts.
Especially... what if Duke Chai really is involved in the rebellion?
Old Beggar heard that Han Anren's original troops were only a few hundred and have been wiped out. The current Blade Destruction Army is a newly transferred unit of only 1000 men.
If Duke Chai is really involved in the rebellion, then we might be the only ones who know about their countermeasures.
If we turn a blind eye... ah, what a hassle...
You are all famous heroes, you wouldn't turn a blind eye to this, would you?
...If it really is the worst outcome, I'm afraid I won't be able to sleep well every day. Although it's a hassle... it's much better than not being able to sleep.
If this beautiful land falls into war because of my momentary decision, I won't be able to live with myself. What do you think?
We'll follow the young master's decision.
Wherever the young master goes, I will follow.
As long as I can confront them, I don't care where I am, I don't have to go with you.
Ah, youth is wonderful, old Beggar can't handle it anymore, besides, with just a few of you, can you turn the world upside down?
Senior Mo, Brother Lu...
Everyone has their own ambitions, why persuade them?\nWhat about you, Brother {PlayerSurName}, what are you planning to do?
I plan to...
Investigate the truth about Chai Wang supporting the rebels.
Remind Han Anren.
Stop Ji Baichu's plan.
Easier said than done, do you know where to find them?
Well... the rebel camp or Duke Chai's Tower...
Chai Wang has been taken away, even if there is evidence in Duke Chai's Tower, it should have been destroyed.\nAs for the rebel camp, do you know where it is?
Then... then...
But we know nothing about Ji Baichu's plan.
At worst, we'll just guard the door of Duke Chai's Tower, they have to come out no matter what they do!
What's wrong? I think this method is quite good.
As I said before, there are not many servants in Duke Chai's Tower, I'm afraid Ji Baichu's plan started before the birthday banquet, what's the use of you guarding here?
Then... then...
Given the current situation, this seems to be the most feasible option.
Then let's go to the Government Office together.
No, this is too inefficient. I suggest we split up.
I agree, I just want to investigate this Duke Chai's Tower.
Now Duke Chai's Tower will definitely be on guard against us, Brother Han, how are you going to investigate?
I have my ways.
Alright, I'll gather information at the tavern.
Then I'll leave the Government Office to you, Brother {PlayerSurName}. Let's meet up at the restaurant later to share information.
Okay.
Why do I feel like you've given me the most troublesome task... Well, since it's come to this, I'll go to the Government Office.
With the help of Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, it's better than the strength of a hundred people!
As for those who are unwilling to help, please leave. You are no longer friends of Duke Chai's Tower, and we will go our separate ways in the future.
So, those who stay here are friends. I thank you on behalf of Duke Chai.
Who doesn't know about Duke Chai's righteousness? If he's in trouble and we just stand by, can we still be considered part of the jianghu?
Exactly, I wonder if Mr. Ji has any way to save Duke Chai?
Isn't it simple? We break into the government office, kill that bird General, and rescue the Duke!
Absolutely not, this is tantamount to treason. If we really do this, the Duke will become the target of public criticism.
So... what do you suggest we do?
This Han Anren is rigid and never oversteps the line...
I have a plan to hit Han Anren's pain point, which will force him to release the Duke. However... this plan requires your help.
What do you need help with, just say it.
I'm the same, I'll do my best to help!
Good, please come in one by one, and I'll tell you what I need your help with.
Why is this Ji Baichu so mysterious?
These scholars are all like this, who cares!
...Anyway, I have no way back.
Alright, alright, when in Rome, do as the Romans do.

You watch as others line up to enter the room, emerging moments later with serious expressions, and run away from Duke Chai's Tower.\nYou wonder what task Ji Baichu has assigned them.\nFinally, it's your turn.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, sorry to keep you waiting.
column3: คุณชาย{PlayerSurName} ข้าขออภัยที่ทำให้ต้องรอเสียนาน

column2: For the sake of Duke Chai, this little time is nothing.\nWhat task has Mr. Ji arranged for me?
Then let me get straight to the point.\nDo you know the Youth with a Beautiful Face, Han Zidou, from the banquet?
What happened to Young Master Han?
Do you know about the family history of Duke Chai?
I've read in books that Duke Chai's ancestors were the emperors of the previous dynasty, and the founding emperor of this dynasty was originally a minister of the previous emperor.
After the death of the previous emperor, the new emperor was young and the country was unstable. The founding emperor was forced by his subordinates to rebel and established the Zhao Kingdom.

Afterwards, the founding emperor granted the title of Duke Chai to the descendants of the previous emperor, granting them the Iron Certificate of Immunity, hereditary and irreplaceable. The current Duke Chai is a descendant of the previous imperial family.
Yes, just as you said.
I know this book well! Duke Chai is a descendant of the previous imperial family, granted the Iron Certificate of Immunity, hereditary and irreplaceable!
A descendant of the previous imperial family? Why does he still hold such a position today?

This has to do with the founding emperor of the Zhao Kingdom. The founding emperor was a military general of the previous dynasty. After the death of the previous emperor, the new emperor ascended the throne at the age of seven. During a foreign invasion, the founding emperor led troops to repel the enemy. Along the way, a strange phenomenon occurred: two suns appeared in the sky, a sign of the change of emperors.

The founding emperor was highly respected, and his soldiers were loyal to him. They forced the founding emperor to become the emperor by putting a yellow robe on him. The founding emperor returned to the court and persuaded the young emperor to abdicate in his favor, thus establishing the Zhao Kingdom.

After becoming emperor, the founding emperor, grateful for the kindness of the previous imperial family, treated the young emperor generously, granting him the title of Duke Chai, which continues to this day.
Yes, your book is quite accurate.
Hehe, thank you for the compliment.
I'm not very knowledgeable, but I know a little.

The ancestor of the Duke was from the previous imperial family, and the founding emperor of this dynasty was a great general of the previous dynasty. After the death of the previous emperor, the founding emperor led troops to resist foreign enemies, but was mutinied along the way, usurping the throne of the previous dynasty and establishing the Zhao Kingdom.

To show his benevolent heart, the founding emperor granted the young emperor the title of Duke Chai, bestowed the Iron Certificate of Immunity, and made the title hereditary and irreplaceable. The current Duke Chai is a descendant of that young emperor. Is what I said correct?
Yes, that's exactly it.
This question can't stump me!

The ancestor of Duke Chai was the emperor of the previous dynasty, and the founding emperor of this dynasty was a great general of the previous dynasty. When he led troops out, he claimed to be the emperor by wearing a yellow robe, and then forced the previous emperor to abdicate, thus establishing the Zhao Kingdom.

To repay the previous emperor for his kindness, he granted the descendants of the previous emperor the title of Duke Chai, bestowed the Iron Certificate of Immunity, and made the title hereditary and irreplaceable.
I see, I didn't expect Brother Lv to know even this.
Heh, it's nothing.
I don't know, I hope the gentleman can enlighten me.

Simply put, the ancestor of the Duke was the emperor of the previous dynasty, and the founding emperor of this dynasty was a great general of the previous dynasty. When he led troops out, he claimed to be the emperor by wearing a yellow robe, and then forced the previous emperor to abdicate, thus establishing the Zhao Kingdom.

After becoming emperor, the founding emperor, grateful for the kindness of the previous imperial family, treated the young emperor generously, granting him the title of Duke Chai, which continues to this day.
I see.
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว!

column2: But what is the relationship between the family history of Duke Chai and Young Master Han?
Young hero, you may not know, Master Han's ancestors were a general under the previous emperor. The only one killed during the founding emperor's coup was Master Han's ancestor.

Because of this, even if the Han family has great talents, they still find it difficult to be reused in this dynasty. Your Highness invited Master Han this time, hoping that he could become a servant of Your Highness.
But Master Han ran away... So, Mr. Ji, you want me to help win over Master Han?
Exactly.
It sounds easy, but how can we win him over?
For descendants of former dynasty officials like Master Han, there must be spies from the Zhao country around him at all times. Young hero, you might as well use this as a starting point.
Monitoring the descendants of former dynasty officials... Does this mean that even around Prince Chai...
You don't need to worry about this, young hero. All you need to do is help win over Master Han.
I see, I'll give it a try in the metropolitan examination. But where can I find Master Han?

He has only two hobbies in his life, indulging in sensual pleasures and traveling. There is a bamboo forest near Phoenix Woods Harbor, the scenery is quite beautiful. If you can't find him in the city's tavern, you might as well go to the bamboo forest.
Okay, I'll go find him.
Then I'll wait here for your good news.
Ah, young hero, after you.
You've worked hard.
It's my duty, it's nothing.
I am {PlayerName}, I've seen General Han.
You... I seem to have seen you in Prince Chai's mansion, what are you here for?
Report to the general, I guess Prince Chai must have planned to be caught long ago, and there should be a backup plan. I want to help the general.
At the banquet, Prince Chai was easily taken away by me, naturally, he should have a backup plan. I've thought about this.
As for your offer to help, we all know that Prince Chai likes to make friends with vagabonds, I can't ask for your help, hope you understand.
Then... I wonder if the general could tell me the location of the rebel camp. I want to help investigate some clues.
I have already searched the rebel camp, and brought back relevant clues. Soldiers have been stationed in the camp, {PlayerSurName} young hero, you don't need to worry.
Report--!
Report to the general, the remnants of the South-East Barbarians are making a comeback, trying to retake the camp. The number of soldiers in the camp is insufficient, and they are hard to deal with!
Report--!
Report to the general, a distress signal has been lit on the island!
How could this happen...
General Han, this might be Prince Chai's plan. You don't have enough soldiers, it's not advisable to divide your forces. Please allow us to help.
You make sense, but...
Messenger, how many South-East Barbarian remnants are besieging the camp?
Reply to the general, there are about a hundred, but the leader of the thieves is tough.
The number is not large, how is the battle situation?
When I left, they were attacking the camp fiercely.
In that case, how did you break through?
This... I fought my way out...
In the woods, you, an archer, fought your way out of a fierce battle with hundreds of people?
Guards, arrest him!
Damn it, die!
Tsk...
Who are you, why are you impersonating my sergeant and lying about military information?
I won't say anything, anyway, it's just a death!
(Headbutts the ground)
This... this guy actually...
My lord... I failed to hold him back...
...It's okay, it's not your fault.
Thank you, my lord.
Thank you for your help, young hero Sacrificial. How are your injuries?
Don't worry, my lord. I managed to dodge the arrow and wasn't injured.
That's good to hear. You are truly skilled.
Messenger, continue to monitor the situation at sea and report any changes.
Yes!
Today, thanks to the presence of young hero {PlayerSurName}, I was almost caught off guard by his plot.
I didn't expect him to harm himself rather than betray his information...\nIf he really is a Desperate nurtured by King Chai, we must be careful.
As for his information and the Wolf smoke at sea, I believe it's a diversion. If I send troops to rescue, the port will be left unguarded, and we won't be able to recover from whatever happens.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, although the military information is false, I can't let my guard down. However, I'm short of manpower. Could you help me investigate?
I would be honored to help, General.
I will mark the location of the South-East Barbarian Camp on your map, and I will write a letter to prove your identity. To avoid any complications, I hope you can leave as soon as possible.
Understood.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, how is the situation outside?
You tell Han Anren everything that happened.
Such a thing happened, thanks to {PlayerSurName}'s quick thinking, the people of Mei Pass Post were spared...
column3: ในเหตุการณ์เช่นนี้ ต้องขอขอบคุณ {PlayerSurName} เป็นอย่างสูง ที่ช่วยผู้คนในจุดพักม้าด่านเหมยขอรับ...

column2: When people are in trouble, how can I not help?
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you are truly selfless. I was suspicious of you before, I feel ashamed.
It's only natural for General Han to be suspicious, I don't mind.\nCan General Han tell me what the clue I found in the South-East Barbarian Camp is?
Hmm, I see no harm in telling you.\nIt's a notebook, recording the exchange of goods between the South-East Barbarians and King Chai.
The specific content is... "Three days, fifty long spears, thirty bows, two hundred arrows. Five days, received three jars of wine from Duke Chai's Tower, three thousand taels of silver."
Three thousand taels, that's quite a lot...
Indeed, and it's also engraved with the words "Chai Ming".
"Chai Ming"... I understand the "Chai", but what does "Ming" mean?
I'm not sure either, it would be great if you could figure it out.
Here is a martial arts manual, it's a spoil of war from when we took over the South-East Barbarian Camp, I'll give it to you.
Thank you, General Han.
General Han, did anything happen at Phoenix Woods Harbor while I was away?
Yes, I sent someone to the island that used to be a Pirate Camp. We have confirmed that the Wolf smoke was set by someone who sneaked into the island, and several guards were injured.
The Wolf smoke has now been extinguished, and there are no signs of Pirates, so it seems to be a false alarm.
...To be honest, I was the one who sneaked into the island and set off the Wolf smoke.
Brother Liao?! Why did you...
It's Mr. Ji's strategy of distracting the enemy, but Mr. Ji won't reveal all his plans to us, so we don't know what he really wants to do.
I see.
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว!

column2: Apart from this, I have no more information here.
In that case... I have a few friends gathering information in the city, I'll go ask them.
That would be great.
At this time, they should have gathered at the tavern, let's go find them there.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, have you found anything new?
Yes, I am.
You tell Han Anren your conclusions.
You say they want to assassinate me, the General?
We believe there is a high possibility.
...But, King Chai has many skilled fighters, if they want to assassinate me, why go through such trouble?
This...
You say they want to take the opportunity to break into the prison?
We believe there is a high possibility.
...But, this is undoubtedly a capital crime of treason, King Chai has no soldiers, what will they do after breaking into the prison?
This...
...This is indeed possible. If what you say is true, how can we break the situation?
Since they are using information gap to deceive the people of Phoenix Woods Harbor, we just need to eliminate the information gap.

The news Mr. Lu heard is about the South-East Barbarians, combined with the South-East Barbarians burning the Mei Pass Post and harassing the camp, perhaps they want to spread the news that the South-East Barbarians have cut off the land trade route.
column3: ข่าวคราวที่คุณชายหลู่ได้ยินนั้นมาจากพวกคนเถื่อนเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ พวกมันได้เผาด่านเหมยและโจมตีค่ายทหาร อาจจะเป็นการส่งสัญญาณว่า พวกมันต้องการตัดเส้นทางการค้าทางบก

column2: So, as long as Mr. Lu can ensure that the land transport can arrive smoothly, this rumor will self-destruct.
Alas, it's easier said than done...
This is my negligence, I will allocate 50 elite soldiers to assist you.
What a hassle... Well, we'll do our best.
As for Brother Lu, there should be few pirates left at sea, so I'll ask Brother Lu to go out to sea and prove that there are no pirates.
Okay.
There is still a warship in Phoenix Woods Harbor, I will allocate 50 soldiers to sail, to assist the brave man.
Thank you.
As for me, I will stay in the city and adapt to changes.
Young hero, you have arranged everything in an orderly manner, you have really helped me a lot.
I don't think this is King Chai's true intention.
What does General Han think?
I don't have any clues for the time being.
Why not listen to me?
What's your opinion, sir?
I think, King Chai actually manages most of the shops in Phoenix Woods Harbor, using this as a threat to force General Han to release him without charge, should be the more likely method.
Hmm... Can you explain in detail, sir?

If I were Ji Baichu, the purpose of designing these strategies could only be to exaggerate the General's inability to suppress bandits, the innkeepers dare not open their doors for various reasons, and the ignorant people will blame everything on the General.
At this point, the General will be in a difficult position and will have to release King Chai to calm the situation.
...This is indeed possible. If what you say is true, how can we break the situation?
Since they are using information gap to deceive the people of Phoenix Woods Harbor, we just need to eliminate the information gap.

The news I heard is about the South-East Barbarians, combined with the South-East Barbarians burning the Mei Pass Post and harassing the camp, perhaps they want to spread the news that the South-East Barbarians have cut off the land trade route.
column3: ข้าได้ยินข่าวคราวเกี่ยวกับพวกคนเถื่อนเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ พวกมันได้เผาจุดพักม้าด่านเหมยและโจมตีค่ายทหาร อาจจะเป็นการส่งสัญญาณว่า พวกมันต้องการตัดเส้นทางการค้าทางบก

column2: So, General Han, all you need to do is...
I understand, I will allocate 50 elite soldiers to assist you.
...Alas, that's not what I meant... Well, even though it's a hassle, leave it to me.
As for the sea, there should be few pirates left, so I'll ask Brother Lu to go out to sea and prove that there are no pirates.
Okay.
There is still a warship in Phoenix Woods Harbor, I will allocate 50 soldiers to sail, to assist the brave man.
Thank you.
As for {PlayerSurName} brother, I'll have to trouble you to accompany General Han and adapt to changes.
Okay.
The gentleman has everything arranged in an orderly manner, which is a great help to me.
However, even so, there is no way to convict King Chai.
As for the evidence of King Chai's crime, we have someone infiltrating Duke Chai's Tower. As long as he can successfully obtain the evidence, King Chai's treason will be nailed down.
That's good, you knights have really helped me a lot.
I would like to ask you all to act according to the plan, I wish you all success!
Yes!
{PlayerSurName} young hero, tomorrow should be the day when King Chai and his men rise up, please rest well tonight.
General Han, you should also rest well.
Damn, I slipped up...\nGeneral Han is dead, it seems impossible to stop King Chai's plot now...
{PlayerSurName} brother.
Brother Lu? Didn't you leave? Is there anything else?
... Mo Yuan, he's dead.
There's a knife wound on his back... Elder Mo was killed by a sneak attack from behind.
There's no blood on the ground, this is not the crime scene.
The known knife masters... Tian Wu, Wang Hu, Fu Duanyun, and...
Me.
...If you did it, why would you come to me?
Someone tried to sneak attack me too.\nI didn't kill him, but he left this.
Is this... a short stick?
It's from that weird guy with his head wrapped.
Could it be a mole?\n...But why would they attack you when you're clearly not involved?
...Maybe to them, we're all threats.
If that's the case, you and I should be careful.
Now I can't stay out of it, {PlayerSurName} brother, please let me help you.
With Brother Lu's help, it's better than a hundred people.
I'll go around the city to help collect information, and if I find anything, I'll come to you.
Let Elder Mo rest in peace.
You found a suitable place and buried Mo Yuan's body.
Elder Mo, I hope you have a good journey...
{PlayerSurName} General.
You are... Lu Chenxuan? What's the matter?
I'm here to report a crime, Mo Yuan, he's dead.
There's a knife wound on his back... He was killed by a sneak attack from behind.
There's no blood on the ground, this is not the crime scene.
Do you have any clues about the person who used the knife?
Wang Hu and Fu Duanyun who I saw at the birthday banquet, and Tian Wu, a servant of Duke Chai's Tower, and...
You?
But it's not me.
I hope it's not you.
Someone tried to sneak attack me too.\nI didn't kill him, but he left this.
Is this... a short stick?
It's from that weird guy with his head wrapped.
Why did he sneak attack you?
They stayed to help King Chai, we didn't.
Just because of this?
I can't think of any other possibilities.\nIf I can't stay out of it, {PlayerSurName} General, please let me help.
Okay, then I'll ask you to work with Mr. Lu to collect some clues in the city. The most urgent task is to find out the purpose of King Chai and his men.
Leave it to me.
His body... Send it back to the Government Office and give it to the coroner.
Wait, something's not right around here--
That was close, if I hadn't reacted quickly, I would have been hit.
Who dares to ambush me!
Tsk, I missed...
Over there!
Isn't that Qin Yanluo? I didn't expect you to become a dog for the Chai family after you ran away.
Yi Zhihua, I will avenge the grudge of one arrow today!
A defeated general, yet you still talk big. Let me see what else you can do!
Who are you, why are you ambushing me?!
You don't need to know so much, anyway, you're already a dead man!
Just with you guys?!
Qin Yanluo, it's you!
Worthy of {PlayerName}, but you must die today!
Just with you guys?!
Tsk, missed, retreat!
Hey, don't think about running!
Damn, I didn't expect Qin Yanluo to be involved in this matter, it seems this guy also has relations with King Chai.
There was also a South-East Barbarian with him just now... It seems I must hurry to the camp.
Damn, who is this guy, he dares to ambush me!
There was also a South-East Barbarian with him just now... It seems I must hurry to the camp.
It seems normal here, there is no trace of the South-East Barbarian.
Who are you, this is a military camp, no loitering allowed!
I am {PlayerName}, entrusted by General Han to come and report the situation, this is General Han's letter of introduction.
So it is, there are thieves pretending to be soldiers delivering false information...
So, the news of the South-East Barbarian remnants attacking is false?
Not exactly, they do often come to harass this camp, but each time there are only a few of them, and they are easily repelled.
People of the Central Plains, give us back our homeland!
Huh, speak of the devil...\n{PlayerSurName} young hero, please step back, leave this to us.
No, I want to lend a hand too!
Just a few people trying to seize the camp?
Yes... it's always just a few people...
They can't pose much of a threat to the camp, but their constant harassment is quite annoying...
{PlayerSurName} young hero, what are you thinking?
With such a small scale, constantly harassing, what is their purpose? They can't really expect to take back the camp with just a few people...
Now that you mention it... it is indeed strange...
I heard that the Blade Destruction Army doesn't have many soldiers, are there other bases in the southeast?
Yes, besides here, we also have the Pirate Camp and the main camp that we have captured.
Now that the majority of the rebel army has been defeated, what is the main camp responsible for?

According to General Han's arrangement, the Blade Destruction Army Camp and Phoenix Woods Harbor support each other. If Phoenix Woods Harbor is attacked, the main camp will rush to its aid immediately.
What if there are enemies in other parts of the South-East Region?
It will be handled by the main camp...
But there are occasional harassments from the South-East Barbarians here, you can't just run away from the camp...
I understand, the attacks here are just feints, their real target must be somewhere else!
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว การโจมตีที่นี่เป็นเพียงการเบี่ยงเบนความสนใจ เป้าหมายจริงๆ ของพวกมันต้องอยู่ที่อื่นแน่!

column2: Could it be the Blade Destruction Army Camp?! But there...
column3: ค่ายกองทัพดาบพิฆาตเหรอ?! แต่ที่นั่นมัน...

column2: ...Yes, the remnants wouldn't easily attack there, is there any other place in the South-East Region...
column3: ...ใช่แล้ว ไอ้กากเดนพวกนี้คงไม่กล้าบุกที่นั่นหรอก ยังมีที่อื่นอีกในเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้...

column2: Yes, the Mei Pass Post! It's all Han people there, and the supplies are quite abundant. It's also a necessary route to the southeast, as long as they capture it...
column3: ใช่แล้ว ด่านเหมย! ที่นั่นมีแต่พวกฮั่น เสบียงอาหารก็อุดมสมบูรณ์ เป็นเส้นทางสำคัญไปยังตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ด้วย ถ้าหากพวกมันยึดได้ละก็...

column2: No, I must hurry to Mei Pass Post!
column3: ไม่ได้ ข้าต้องรีบไปจุดพักม้าด่านเหมย!

column2: {PlayerSurName} General, what are your orders.
column3: ท่านแม่ทัพ {PlayerSurName} มีอะไรให้รับใช้ขอรับ

column2: I received a report that remnants of the South-East Barbarian are coming to seize the camp?
column3: ข้าได้รับรายงานว่าพวกคนเถื่อนเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้กำลังมารวมตัวกันเพื่อยึดค่ายใช่ไหม?

column2: They did come indeed, but there were only a few of them each time, and we easily repelled them.
column3: พวกมันบุกมาจริงๆ แต่มาไม่เยอะเท่าไหร่ พวกเราจัดการพวกมันได้สบายอยู่แล้ว

column2: Just a few people...
column3: แค่ไม่กี่คนเนี่ยนะ...

column2: People of the Central Plains, give us back our homeland!
column3: ผู้คนในจงหยวน จงกอบกู้บ้านเกิดเมืองนอนของเรา!

column2: Well, speak of the devil...\n{PlayerSurName}General, please step back, leave this to us!
column3: โอ้ ช่างบังเอิญเสียจริง\nท่านแม่ทัพ {PlayerSurName} วางใจได้เลย ปล่อยเป็นหน้าที่พวกเราเอง!

column2: No, since they ran into me, they're out of luck!
column3: ไม่ ถ้ามันเข้ามาเจอข้า ก็ถึงคราวซวยของพวกมันแล้ว!

column2: Just a few people trying to seize the camp?
column3: แค่คนหยิบมือเดียวเองรึที่คิดจะยึดค่าย?

column2: Yes... it's always just a few people...
column3: ถูกต้อง... ก็มักจะมีแค่คนหยิบมือเดียวทุกครั้งไป..

column2: They can't pose much of a threat to the camp, but their constant harassment is quite annoying...
column3: ถึงพวกมันไม่ได้มีพิษสงให้กับค่ายมากเท่าไหร่ แต่การก่อกวนพวกมัน ช่างน่ารำคาญยิ่งนัก...

column2: They should already know the combat power of our army, but they still keep harassing us with just a few people, what is their purpose? They can't really expect to take back the camp with just a few people...
column3: พวกมันน่าจะรู้แล้วว่ากองทัพของเรามีกำลังพลแค่ไหน แต่ทำไมยังส่งคนเพียงหยิบมือมาก่อกวนเราอยู่บ่อย ๆ เป้าหมายของพวกมันคืออะไร? มันคงยึดค่ายด้วยเพียงหยิบมือแบบนี้หรอกนะ...

column2: Now that you mention it... it is indeed strange...
column3: จริงด้วย... พูดถึงเรื่องนี้แล้วมันก็แปลกๆ นะขอรับ...

column2: Currently, the Blade Destruction Army is stationed at the main camp, here, Pirate and Phoenix Woods Harbor, supporting each other... But with the harassment of the South-East Barbarian here, we can't act rashly...
column3: ตอนนี้กองทัพดาบพิฆาตประจำอยู่ที่ค่ายหลัก มีโจรสลัดและท่าเรือป่าหงส์คอยหนุนหลัง... แต่ด้วยการรบกวนของพวกคนเถื่อนตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ที่นี่ทำให้เราเคลื่อนพลไม่สะดวก

column2: I understand, the attacks here are just feints, their real target must be somewhere else!
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว การโจมตีที่นี่เป็นเพียงการเบี่ยงเบนความสนใจ เป้าหมายจริงๆ ของพวกมันต้องอยู่ที่อื่นแน่!

column2: Could it be the Blade Destruction Army Camp?! But there...
column3: ค่ายกองทัพดาบพิฆาตเหรอ?! แต่ที่นั่นมัน...

column2: ...Yes, the remnants wouldn't easily attack there, is there any other place in the South-East Region...
column3: ...ใช่แล้ว ไอ้กากเดนพวกนี้คงไม่กล้าบุกที่นั่นหรอก ยังมีที่อื่นอีกในเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้...

column2: Right, Mei Pass Post! There are plenty of supplies there, and it's a must-pass route to the southeast, as long as we capture it...
column3: ถูกต้อง จุดพักม้าด่านเหมยที่นั่นมีเสบียงอาหาร และเป็นเส้นทางผ่านสำคัญไปยังตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ หากเราสามารถยึดที่นั่นได้...

column2: No, I must hurry to Mei Pass Post!
column3: ไม่ได้ ข้าต้องรีบไปจุดพักม้าด่านเหมย!

column3: ท่านแม่ทัพ {PlayerSurName} มีอะไรให้รับใช้ขอรับ

column3: ข้าได้รับรายงานว่าพวกคนเถื่อนเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้กำลังมารวมตัวกันเพื่อยึดค่ายใช่ไหม?

column2: They did come indeed, but there were only a few of them each time, and we easily repelled them.

column2: Just a few people...
column3: แค่ไม่กี่คนเนี่ยนะ...

column2: People of the Central Plains, avenge our fallen kin!
Well, speak of the devil...\n{PlayerSurName}General, please step back, leave this to us!
column3: โอ้ ช่างบังเอิญเสียจริง\nท่านแม่ทัพ {PlayerSurName} วางใจได้เลย ปล่อยเป็นหน้าที่พวกเราเอง!

column2: No, since they ran into me, they're out of luck!
column3: ไม่ ถ้ามันเข้ามาเจอข้า ก็ถึงคราวซวยของพวกมันแล้ว!

column2: Just a few people are coming to attack the main camp?
Yes... it's always just a few people...
column3: ถูกต้อง... ก็มักจะมีแค่คนหยิบมือเดียวทุกครั้งไป..

column2: They can't pose much of a threat to the camp, but their constant harassment is quite annoying...
column3: ถึงพวกมันไม่ได้มีพิษสงให้กับค่ายมากเท่าไหร่ แต่การก่อกวนพวกมัน ช่างน่ารำคาญยิ่งนัก...

column2: They should already know the combat power of our army, but they still keep harassing us with just a few people, what is their purpose? They can't really expect to take down the main camp with just a few people...
Now that you mention it... it is indeed strange...
column3: จริงด้วย... พูดถึงเรื่องนี้แล้วมันก็แปลกๆ นะขอรับ...

I understand, the attacks here are just feints, their real target must be somewhere else!
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว การโจมตีที่นี่เป็นเพียงการเบี่ยงเบนความสนใจ เป้าหมายจริงๆ ของพวกมันต้องอยู่ที่อื่นแน่!

column2: Are there any other places in the South-East Region...
Right, Mei Pass Post! There are plenty of supplies there, and it's a must-pass route to the southeast, as long as we capture it...
column3: ถูกต้อง จุดพักม้าด่านเหมยที่นั่นมีเสบียงอาหาร และเป็นเส้นทางผ่านสำคัญไปยังตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ หากเราสามารถยึดที่นั่นได้...

column2: No, I must hurry to Mei Pass Post!
column3: ไม่ได้ ข้าต้องรีบไปจุดพักม้าด่านเหมย!

column2: Damn, still one step too late!
Oh, another one here to die!
The ones who should die are you!
These South-East Barbarians rushed in without a word and started fighting, even burning our houses...\nIf it weren't for your timely arrival, I'm afraid...
Phew... I thought I was done for this time, thanks to your timely arrival...
Don't worry, leave this place to me, you guys go to a safe place to hide, I will definitely drive all these South-East Barbarians away!
Damn South-East Barbarians, such burning, killing and looting, I will not spare you!
Why is this yard already burned clean?
Yes, but a few things look pretty good.
You, who are you?! Where are the other Clanmen?
They've all been killed by me, now it's just you guys left!
These South-East Barbarians are really hateful, they actually want to harm the people here...
I suddenly felt a chill...
Such a heavy killing intent!
{yell}You actually did this here... Die!
Liao Yuelong, why are you doing this?!
You bastard, you actually destroyed my home again—!
Could it be that Liao Yuelong is from Mei Pass Post?
column3: เป็นไปได้ไหมว่า เหลียวเย่หลง มาจากด่านเหมย?

column2: Brother Liao, listen to my explanation, this is the doing of the South-East Barbarians, it has nothing to do with me!
Then where are the South-East Barbarians you mentioned?!
They've all been dealt with by me...
Do you think I would believe you?!
The South-East Barbarians have been wiped out, how could they still come to harass Mei Pass Post?\nMoreover, my lord—
column3: พวกคนเถื่อนเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ถูกกวาดล้างหมดแล้ว พวกมันจะมาโจมตีจุดพักม้าด่านเหมยได้อย่างไรขอรับ?\nแจ้งให้นายท่านทราบ—

column2: —Anyway, prepare to die!
(My lord? The lord in Liao Yuelong's mouth must be King Chai, it seems that King Chai and the South-East Barbarians are indeed related.)
Liao Yuelong, do you know something about King Chai and the South-East Barbarians?
It's none of your business!
(Damn, this guy doesn't listen to anyone, do I have to—)
Young Master Liao, he's telling the truth, please stop.
You say this...
Yes, it was indeed South-East Barbarian who did it. If it weren't for his help, we would have probably...
The most urgent task is to put out this fire. If it continues to burn, Mei Pass Post might be ruined.
column3: อันดับแรกต้องรีบดับไฟให้ได้โดยเร็วที่สุด หากปล่อยให้ไฟลามต่อไป จุดพักม้าด่านเหมยก็จะมอดไหม้เป็นจุล

column2: Okay.
I'll help too.
You and the residents of Mei Pass Post put out the fire set by South-East Barbarian.\nFortunately, you arrived in time and the houses in Mei Pass Post were not severely burned.
column3: เจ้าและชาวบ้านจุดพักม้าด่านเหมย ร่วมแรงร่วมใจกันดับไฟที่ได้เผาโดยคนเถื่อนเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้\nโชคดีที่บ้านเรือนในจุดพักม้าด่านเหมยไม่ได้ถูกไฟไหม้จนเสียหายมากนัก

column2: Thank you for your help, young hero. We were able to get through this disaster because of you.
No need to be polite, it's my duty. I will report this to General Han and ask him to strengthen the guard here.
That would be great.
Brother Liao, do you have something to say?
...I mistakenly thought you were the arsonist before, it was my mistake, I apologize.
No relations, if you can tell me some of the information you know, we will be even.
...What do you want to know?
The relations between South-East Barbarian and King Chai.
I work for the lord, there are some things I can't say.
Brother Liao, you are really loyal to King Chai.
The lord promised me that he would tell me who the murderer is...
I see, then I don't need to say anything. But I still have to remind Brother Liao, today it was South-East Barbarian who set fire to Mei Pass Post, please think about it.
column3: อย่างนี้นี่เอง ข้าไม่มีอะไรจะพูดหรอก แต่ข้าขอให้พี่เหลียวจำไว้ว่า วันนี้พวกคนเถื่อนเขตตะวันออกเฉียงใต้คือคนที่เผาจุดพักม้าด่านเหมย เรื่องนี้ข้าอยากให้พี่เหลียวเก็บไปคิดดูก่อนนะ

column2: Today's arson and the past grudges of the innkeepers, I will make you pay with blood!
Ancestors, I'm sorry...
There's no point in staying here, better run away.
Report this to General Han.
Luckily, I arrived in time and Mei Pass Post was successfully saved.
column3: โชคดีที่ข้ามาทันเวลา เรากู้วิกฤตจุดพักม้าด่านเหมยสำเร็จแล้ว

column2: There are no other clues for now, let's go back to Mei Pass Post and see if there are any developments from others.
column3: ตอนนี้ยังไม่มีเบาะแสอะไรเลย กลับไปจุดพักม้าด่านเหมยก่อน เผื่อมีอะไรคืบหน้าอะไรบ้าง

column2: Mr. Lu, Brother Lu, it seems that both of you have gained something?
It's okay, I happened to hear some interesting things in the tavern.
Same at the pier.
Alas, it seems that only the incident I encountered can be considered dangerous.
Then you have to tell us in detail.
Waiter, bring the wine!
Alright!
Shouldn't we wait for Brother Han?
Right, where is he?
He said he was going to investigate Duke Chai's Tower, did he encounter any danger?
Should we go and check?
I have no objections.
Ah, what a hassle...
Young Master Han, you're finally here, it seems we saved the trouble of looking for you...
Sorry, I made a mistake...
Young Master Han, why are you covered in wounds?
Young Master Han doesn't seem to have any injuries on his face, no wonder I didn't notice at first glance.
What happened?
We were ambushed... Go save Chun Xing An Zhi...
...Young Master Han fainted, but he should be out of danger.
It seems that something happened in Duke Chai's Tower, the names he just mentioned should be his two female companions.
It should be so.
I'm going to Duke Chai's Tower.
Wait, Brother Lu, I'm coming too!
Then I'll take care of Young Master Han, I'll take him to the medical clinic.
Then I'll leave it to Mr. Lu.
Why is there no one here, even the doorkeeper servant is not here.
I'll go in and have a look.
Hey Brother Lu, it might be a trap... It seems I'm too late.
The door of Duke Chai's Tower is wide open, there might be a trap inside, be prepared before entering.
This is... a pigeon cage? What does King Chai raise so many pigeons for?
There's no one around here either...
The tables and chairs have been tidied up, it seems that the capture of Chai Wang did not cause any disturbance, Ji Baichu and the others did not panic and run away...
There's no one here, and it doesn't seem like there's anything that needs special attention.
This seems to be Chai Wang's study... I wonder if there are any clues.
There doesn't seem to be anything suspicious, as expected, Chai Wang wouldn't make it easy for anyone to find his weaknesses...
There's no one here, I wonder where Brother Lu has gone, I should probably run away from here first.
Brother Lu, how come...
Sigh, there's more dirty stuff...
{PlayerSurName} Brother, this guy is tough, don't underestimate him!
Hmm, he is indeed tough.
(This servant is really strong, no wonder Brother Lu lost to him, such a person is just a servant in Duke Chai's Tower?)
But he's still no match for me!
I'm not as skilled as you, I have nothing to say, do as you wish with me.
Why would I kill you? You're a servant in Duke Chai's Tower, you must know a lot about Chai Wang, why not confess and spare yourself the pain.
Betray my master? Never!
He actually tried to bite his tongue and commit suicide, luckily I was quick enough to hit his acupoint...
Hmm... Hmm...
But now, it's even harder to get information out of him...\nWhy not take him to General Han? They should be professionals in interrogation.
No, you're not going anywhere.
Shan Xing Chun Xing, with Lu Yunlong, Lu Yunlong kneeling, followed by Tian Wu and Fu Duan Yun
You, you're not Han Zidu's... how come you're with them?
Let him go, or I'll kill this guy!
Sorry {PlayerSurName} brother, I've been hit too...
I advise you to stop, no matter how high your martial arts are, you can't be faster than her.
Damn it...
Perfect, I've been wanting to spar with the two of you!
Brother Lu, don't be impulsive, look calmly, they are all participants in the longevity banquet, the real people of Duke Chai's Tower haven't shown up, dealing with them here won't do us any good.
So what? Being able to spar with them is enough for me!
Muscular, indeed powerful...
You can block my attack, you're not bad, kid.
It seems you don't care about this guy's life or death anymore?
What does his life or death have to do with me?
That's really hurtful...
In that case, I'll just--
Don't even think about it!
You, you are--
Run!
Phew... I'm saved, thank you for your help, heroine.
Tsk, didn't get to fight.
Thank you for your help, may I know your name?
You don't have to be so polite, we've met before, I'm Han Gongzi's wife, An Zhi.
Huh? Aren't you-- why did you change your name?
I didn't expect to meet the leader here, greetings leader.
I'm no longer the leader, you don't have to be so formal.
Wait, she's from the Xuan Yi Hui?
Yes, she was one of my capable subordinates, but given the current situation, I suppose the orders for Xuan Yi Hui are given directly by the prince.
You don't have to be so formal, get up.
Wait, she's from the Xuan Yi Hui?
Hmm, she is a capable member under my command, but I didn't know she was here. It must have been the Duke who gave her the order directly.
Sister Hua is right, it was a mission arranged by the Duke himself.
(The leader behind the Black Cloak Society is Duke Qi, but now that Duke Qi is dead, I wonder who she is taking orders from?)
(The leader behind the Black Cloak Society is Duke Qi. Duke Qi has already put me and Yi Zhihua on the kill list, but it seems she doesn't want to be our enemy yet.)
(Again, this "Duke", I wonder who the real master behind the Black Cloak Society is.)
So that's how it is.
No wonder you look familiar... But you're not just a maid, are you?
Since you are not enemies, I won't hide it. I am a member of the Black Cloak Society, and I infiltrated Han Gongzi's side to complete my mission.
I didn't expect you to be a member of the Black Cloak Society...
You mentioned a mission, can you reveal it?
In principle, the content of the mission cannot be disclosed. But to dispel your doubts, I'll tell you a part of it.
Do you know the origin of King Chai?
I've read in books that King Chai's ancestor was the emperor of the previous dynasty, and the founding emperor of this dynasty was originally a minister of the previous emperor.
After the death of the previous emperor, the new emperor was young and the country was unstable. The founding emperor was forced by his subordinates to rebel and established the Zhao Kingdom.

Afterwards, the founding emperor granted the title of Duke Chai to the descendants of the previous emperor, granting them the Iron Certificate of Immunity, hereditary and irreplaceable. The current Duke Chai is a descendant of the previous imperial family.
Yes, just as you said.
I know this book well! King Chai is a descendant of the royal family of the previous dynasty, with a red book and iron coupon, hereditary and irreplaceable!
A descendant of the previous imperial family? Why does he still hold such a position today?

This has to do with the founding emperor of the Zhao Kingdom. The founding emperor was a military general of the previous dynasty. After the death of the previous emperor, the new emperor ascended the throne at the age of seven. During a foreign invasion, the founding emperor led troops to repel the enemy. Along the way, a strange phenomenon occurred: two suns appeared in the sky, a sign of the change of emperors.

The founding emperor was highly respected, and his soldiers were loyal to him. They forced the founding emperor to become the emperor by putting a yellow robe on him. The founding emperor returned to the court and persuaded the young emperor to abdicate in his favor, thus establishing the Zhao Kingdom.

After becoming emperor, the founding emperor, grateful for the kindness of the previous imperial family, treated the young emperor generously, granting him the title of Duke Chai, which continues to this day.
Yes, the gentleman's book is really good.
Hehe, thank you for the compliment.
I'm not very knowledgeable, but I know a little.

King Chai's ancestor was the royal family of the previous dynasty, and the founding emperor of this dynasty was a general of the previous dynasty. After the emperor of the previous dynasty died, the founding emperor led troops to resist foreign enemies, but there was a mutiny on the way, and he usurped the throne of the previous dynasty and established the Zhao Kingdom.

The founding emperor, in order to show his benevolence, sealed the young emperor as King Chai, gave him a red book and iron coupon, and made him hereditary and irreplaceable. The current King Chai is a descendant of the young emperor at that time. Is what I said correct?
The young master is well-educated, and what he said is indeed correct.
This question can't stump me!

King Chai's ancestor was the emperor of the previous dynasty, and the founding emperor of this dynasty was a general in the previous dynasty. When he led troops out, he claimed to be the emperor in a yellow robe, and then made the emperor of the previous dynasty abdicate, thus establishing the Zhao Kingdom.

To repay the previous emperor for his kindness, he granted the descendants of the previous emperor the title of Duke Chai, bestowed the Iron Certificate of Immunity, and made the title hereditary and irreplaceable.
The young master looks like a prodigal son, but he actually has some knowledge.

I saw it in a book before, but I didn't finish reading it because it was too troublesome. But basically, the founding emperor of this dynasty usurped the throne of the emperor of the previous dynasty, sealed the descendants of the emperor of the previous dynasty as King Chai, gave them a red book and iron coupon, and made them hereditary and irreplaceable. Is that about right?
Hmm, that's basically correct.

Since the founding emperor sealed the royal family of the previous dynasty as King Chai, he has been respectful to King Chai on the surface, but he has always been wary of King Chai's growing power, so he has been planting spies in Duke Chai's Tower.

Now in this chaotic world, the old emperor is hunting in the north, Duke Qi and Duke Kang are fighting for power, and the Duke is worried that King Chai will take the opportunity to cause trouble, so he ordered me to connect with the spy in Duke Chai's Tower to determine King Chai's true intentions.
Who is this spy?
I don't know, I only know that he has been lurking in Duke Chai's Tower for more than ten years, and his current appearance and name are unknown.
How are we going to find him? It's like looking for a needle in a haystack.
There is a secret signal for the connection, as long as it can match, we will know.

Wait, you are from the Black Cloak Society, and Chunxing is in cahoots with the people from Duke Chai's Tower, so who exactly is your Han Gongzi, who can live under the same roof with people from both camps?

...He is the descendant of a general from the previous dynasty. The only person the founding emperor killed on his way to the throne was his ancestor. The founding emperor spared the rest of his family, but they were only allowed to live as commoners, even the imperial examination was not allowed.
By the time it came to the son, he was intelligent and skilled in martial arts. King Chai wanted to win him over, and the prince was worried that he would be used by King Chai, so...
So you two are actually keeping an eye on Han Zidu...
It's a bit hard to say, but it's as the young hero said...
Sigh, at first I was a bit envious of Han's good fortune.
I feel sorry for Brother Han... By the way, where is Brother Han?
...He was still unconscious when I was attacked.
Since King Chai wants to win him over, he won't harm him. Let's think about King Chai's plan.
Hey, as a servant of King Chai, you must know something, right?
Right, to prevent him from biting his tongue and committing suicide, I sealed his acupoints.
Could you please unseal his acupoints, young hero?
What if he tries to bite his tongue and commit suicide again?
Then we'll just seal his acupoints again.
Alright.
I've unsealed your mute acupoint, but I've also sealed the acupoints on your legs. Don't try to run.
Although it shouldn't be that easy...\n<color=#c44b0e>How many leaves have fallen in the royal palace?</color>
<color=#c44b0e>Three thousand three hundred and thirty-three years ago.</color>
You... how could you be...
After sweeping the floor in Duke Chai's Tower for twenty years, I finally have a use.
Miss An Zhi, could he be...
Hmm... he should be the one sent to monitor King Chai...
Wei Rusong, the mechanic, greets you all.
I didn't expect it to be you, I'll unseal your acupoints right away...
Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}.
Brother Wei, do you know what King Chai's plan is?

King Chai... It was indeed part of the plan for King Chai to be taken away by General Han at the birthday banquet. He had indeed arranged a series of backup plans. I don't know much, I just heard some fragments.
What I can confirm is that the South-East Barbarian rebels and the pirates are both secretly supported by King Chai, but King Chai has hidden it well and left no evidence.

After the rebels were defeated, the rebel leaders who were originally arranged all died in battle. King Chai arranged Tian Wu as the leader of the remnants of the South-East Barbarians. The attack on Mei Pass Post was also his doing.
Damn it, it's this guy!
As for the pirates, there should be very few remnants left. King Chai was so angry about this that he smashed a lot of things, all of which I had to clean up.

As for the arrangements after King Chai was arrested, it was something King Chai and Ji Baichu discussed privately. I only know that Ji Baichu arranged for everyone to go out, I don't know what each person is doing specifically.
In the end, we still don't know anything...

After all, I'm just an ordinary servant in the mansion. But being an ordinary servant has its advantages. I took advantage of their absence from the mansion and found letters of correspondence with the South-East Barbarians in the bamboo room.
This, this is decisive evidence! Do you have it with you?
No, I was afraid Ji Baichu would become suspicious, so I put it back after reading it.
It seems the information is still not enough...
The command I received was to set off Wolf smoke on the island.
That should be a strategy of feinting in the east and attacking in the west, to make it difficult for Han Anren to take care of both sides.

At present, I only know that Ji Baichu used the strategy of feinting in the east and attacking in the west, set off Wolf smoke in Pirate Camp, and eliminated a small group of South-East Barbarian harassing the camp, making it difficult for several Soldiers to respond.
Is that all? It feels very strange...
Mr. Lu and Brother Lu mentioned some discoveries in the tavern before, what exactly did they say?
Several fishermen at the Pier have sealed their boats and seem to have no plans to go out to sea for a short time.
In the tavern, there were whispers about South-East Barbarian, but as soon as I tried to approach, they stopped talking.
In addition, several shops seem to be going out of business, I don't know what they are planning.
Shops going out of business, fishermen sealing their boats, coupled with South-East Barbarian and feinting in the east and attacking in the west...\nJi Baichu's plan should be...
Incite citizens to strike.
Warn citizens to be wary of rebels.
He's quite a good planner.
Mr. Lu, do you think it's not like this?
Of course, Chai Wang controls all walks of life in Phoenix Woods Harbor, the current situation must be his attempt to incite citizens to strike and cause public anger in the harbor.
Yes, it's obvious, Chai Wang controls all walks of life in Phoenix Woods Harbor, the current situation must be his attempt to incite citizens to strike and cause public anger in the harbor.
The question is, what are they planning to do after inciting public anger?
If all the shops in the city cannot operate normally, the dissatisfied people will definitely create chaos on the street, at this time General Han must come forward to solve...
After General Han comes forward, Ji Baichu and his team can...
Assassinate Han Anren!
Take advantage of the emptiness of the Government Office to raid the prison.
Force Han Anren to release Chai Wang.
There are many experts in Duke Chai's Tower, and there are also many masters in Phoenix Woods Harbor. As long as General Han shows up, it is indeed possible to use the angry crowd to kill Han Anren.
Indeed, the Black Clothes Society has also used this method to assassinate targets.
Although I have some objections to this conclusion... but since all three of you agree, let's take it as such.
Then let's go and inform General Han about this.
Chai Wang has many informants, I can't go with you to see General Han, I'll go back to Duke Chai's Tower to find some letters first.
With what happened in Duke Chai's Tower before, you might...
No problem, even if there is a conflict, I can fight my way out.
I'll go with you for support.
No need, it's too dangerous, I'll go alone.
But...
If I really have to fight, I can actually do better on my own.
...I have to go, even if you don't agree, I have to go, Young Master Han might still be in Duke Chai's Tower...
Sigh... in that case, come with me.
Good!
Brother Wei, Miss An Zhi, be careful.
Don't worry.
Okay, let's go too.

Hmm... General Han will come forward to appease the people, he will definitely bring Guards with him, at this time the Government Office will definitely be empty, the people from Duke Chai's Tower can go to raid the prison.
So we can stop them by guarding the prison at this time, is that what you mean?
Yes, that's right, it must be like this.
Although I have some objections to this conclusion... but since all three of you agree, let's take it as such.
Then let's go and inform General Han about this.
Chai Wang has many informants, I can't go with you to see General Han, I'll go back to Duke Chai's Tower to find some letters first.
With what happened in Duke Chai's Tower before, you might...
No problem, even if there is a conflict, I can fight my way out.
I'll go with you for support.
No need, it's too dangerous, I'll go alone.
But...
If I really have to fight, I can actually do better on my own.
...I have to go, even if you don't agree, I have to go, Young Master Han might still be in Duke Chai's Tower...
