Sigh... in that case, come with me.
Good!
Brother Wei, Miss An Zhi, be careful.
Don't worry.
Okay, let's go too.
I feel the same way.
Force Han Anren to release Chai Wang? What does that mean.

Thinking carefully, whether it's to assassinate Han Anren or to jailbreak, although it can ensure that King Chai gets out of jail, the crime of King Chai's rebellion cannot be washed away. Now that the rebels in the southeast have been wiped out, King Chai does not have many soldiers under his command, so he should not do so.
In fact, King Chai actually manages most of the shops in Phoenix Woods Harbor, and uses this as a threat to force General Han to release him without guilt, which should be a more likely approach.
It makes some sense, and it seems like something King Chai and Ji Baichu could do.
Alright, you guys are smart, you decide.\nWhat should we do next?
Anyway, let's tell General Han about this speculation first.
Chai Wang has many informants, I can't go with you to see General Han, I'll go back to Duke Chai's Tower to find some letters first.
With what happened in Duke Chai's Tower before, you might...
No problem, even if there is a conflict, I can fight my way out.
I'll go with you for support.
No need, it's too dangerous, I'll go alone.
But...
If I really have to fight, I can actually do better on my own.
...I have to go, even if you don't agree, I have to go, Young Master Han might still be in Duke Chai's Tower...
Sigh... in that case, come with me.
Good!
Brother Wei, Miss An Zhi, be careful.
Don't worry.
Okay, let's go too.
I didn't encounter any South-East Barbarians on my way here, so there's no need to search here.
There are no traces of South-East Barbarians walking this way... So all the remaining South-East Barbarians are in Mei Pass Post!
As expected of Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, he managed to escape under others' noses and even took a hostage.
Mainly, I didn't want to return without accomplishing anything, whether it was a hostage or a tongue, I didn't think too much at the time.
Today is the day when King Chai and his men are going to rebel, we should hurry to the Government Office and meet up with General Han.
Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, you came just in time.
General Han, is there any movement now?
So far...
Han Anren, come out!
Speak of the devil, Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, let's go out and take a look.
After you, General Han.
Han Anren, come out!|Give us an explanation!|We can't live like this anymore!|What kind of bullshit official are you!|We can't even eat!|Don't be a coward!
Fellow villagers, please don't rush, I am here, if you have any issues, please tell me.
The market is closed today, how is my family supposed to cook!
It's not that we don't want to do business, our goods were robbed by those South-East Barbarians, how can we sell without goods?
Also, there are pirates disturbing the sea, we can't go out to fish!
Mr. Han, didn't you say that the bandits have been wiped out?!
Yeah, are you saying that Mr. Han lied about the military situation to gain merit for himself?
Give us an explanation!|I can't believe Mr. Han is this kind of person!|I misjudged you!
(These people are echoing each other, there must be someone who arranged this.)
(Looking closely, there are also the mole crickets and Fu Duanyun in the crowd, as expected, this matter must have something to do with Duke Chai's Tower.)
Fellow villagers, listen to me, the bandits have indeed been wiped out by me, these things are definitely someone stirring up trouble, spreading false news to mislead everyone.
Bullshit! My goods were robbed by the South-East Barbarians, I saw them attacking the Blade Destruction Army's camp with my own eyes, the Blade Destruction Army was defeated!
Yes, a few days ago I saw a beacon fire on a distant island, it must be a critical situation, but I didn't see Mr. Han sending reinforcements!
Did Mr. Han not eliminate the bandits at all? What did he say before?
I get it, Mr. Han is actually in cahoots with these bandits, they are in the same gang!
(This ability to distort the truth is really first-class...)
About these matters, I have already sent people to investigate, they are all false alarms, there are no bandits causing trouble in the South-East Region, please rest assured, everyone.
I don't believe you!
Yes, you Han Anren are not a good person either, we don't believe you!
Yes, we don't believe you!|You Han Anren are not a good person!|You're a hypocrite!
Ladies and gentlemen, please listen to me. I have investigated the matter of the South-East Barbarian. It was just a small group causing trouble, and they are no longer a threat.
As for the Pirate matter, it turned out to be a false alarm.
Who are you!
I am {PlayerName}, well-known in the martial arts world.
That's your Vagabond's business, what does it have to do with us?
I've seen this guy! He killed a beggar in an alley and buried his body!
(I didn't expect them to bring up the matter of Elder Mo...)
Turns out he's a murderer!
Why is Han Anren with a murderer?!
He's really not a good person!
{PlayerSurName} is a young hero who saves people from danger, definitely not a murderer!
I am willing to vouch for {PlayerSurName}, he can be trusted!
Since he said so...|But...|Could it be...
Thank you, Innkeeper.
Don't mention it, one good turn deserves another!
The Sea Goddess also said that {PlayerName} is a good person. If he is a good person, how could he do such a thing?
column3: แม้ท่านเทพธิดาเจ้าสมุทรบอกเองว่าเจ้า {PlayerName} เป็นคนดี ถ้าหากเป็นคนดีมีคุณธรรม ใยจึงทำเรื่องแบบนี้?

column2: This... If the Sea Goddess said so.|Since the Sea Goddess said so...
column3: นั่นสิ...ท่านเทพธิดาเจ้าสมุทรบอกเช่นนั้น......|เมื่อเทพธิดาเจ้าสมุทรบอก ก็คงต้องเป็นเช่นนั้น

column2: Thank you.
You don't have to thank me, thank the Sea Goddess.
column3: ไม่ต้องขอบคุณข้าหรอก ขอบคุณท่านเทพธิดาเจ้าสมุทรเหอะ

column2: I can also vouch for him, {PlayerSurName} is not a villain.
Who are you!
I am Liao Yuelong from Duke Chai's Tower, is this identity enough?
This...|I didn't expect him to be from Duke Chai's Tower...|Could it be true?
Don't be fooled by him, this guy is not from Duke Chai's Tower, I've never seen him before!
Whether I am from Duke Chai's Tower or not, it's not up to you to decide.
Could this kid be telling the truth?|Could it be...|Were we all deceived?
It seems they are wavering, as long as there is evidence, the situation will be reversed.
I hope Mr. Lu and Brother Lu can come back soon, and I hope Brother Wei and Miss An Zhi can succeed...
You guys--!
What a twist of truth and falsehood! This Duke Chai's Tower is really hard to deal with.
General Han, what should we do now?
Now they don't believe anything we say, it seems we can only hope that Mr. Lu and Young Master Lu can come back soon.
Huh? Did someone call me?

Report to General Han, no traces of South-East Barbarian were found on the route from Mei Pass Post to Phoenix Woods Harbor. I arranged soldiers to guard several key points and support each other. This is a merchant team I happened to meet, so I escorted them back to the harbor.
This... Isn't this my clerk?!
Innkeeper, we arrived safely all the way, didn't see a single South-East Barbarian~\nWe got a lot of good ores this time, we can make a lot of good things!
As you can see, there are no thieves on the land route, you can go back to your business with peace of mind.
……|Let's go back...|What General Han said is right...
Wait, the sea issue hasn't been resolved yet! Our Phoenix Woods Harbor relies on the sea for living!
The sea issue has been resolved.
Reporting to you, sir, I patrolled the sea for several shichen and did not encounter any Pirates. However, I did come across a Merchant ship from Perth, which I took the initiative to escort here.
General Han, the ship has docked, but where are the Clerks to unload the goods?\nWhat are all these people gathered here for?
You take a rest, I will arrange for the unloading of the goods.
This...|It seems they are all fake...|Was I deceived?|Let's go back...
Everyone, please wait and listen to me!
(Ji Baichu, this fox finally shows up!)
I am Ji Baichu, a servant of Duke Chai's Tower, and I want to speak for justice.
From Duke Chai's Tower?|Speak for justice?|It should be credible.|Let's listen.
Innkeepers, I have a question for you. Were your goods robbed by the South-East Barbarians, and were you harassed by Pirates at sea? Is this true or false?
These things...

I remind you, if this is false, it means you are spreading rumors and inciting the residents of the harbor to attack the government. According to the law, you can be exiled to the frontier, or even beheaded.
Vegetable vendor Fish vendor chijing
(This Ji Baichu is obviously here to stir up emotions. With his words, these Merchants can only insist that there are South-East Barbarians and Pirates.)
Innkeepers, don't worry. I can turn a blind eye to today's events. Just tell the truth.
This... My goods were robbed by the South-East Barbarians...
Innkeeper, you better think carefully before you speak.
Vegetable vendor Fish vendor ganga
It's true, all true!
Mine, my situation is also true!
Protagonist and others chijing
(It seems that these Merchants are afraid of offending Duke Chai. In their eyes, Duke Chai's Tower is more powerful.)
Since this is true, are you suggesting that General Han and these unknown heroes are colluding with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates to stage a play and make false evidence?
Vegetable vendor Fish vendor ganga
This...
Nonsense! General Han is fair and loves the people, and his heroic resistance to the enemy is well known. How dare you say he is colluding with the enemy and harboring evil intentions?

(This Ji Baichu is really powerful. These few sentences seem to be scolding these vendors, but in fact, they are overturning General Han's efforts in one sentence, and even the evidence we made for General Han is not counted.)
Fellow villagers, I promise you here, I, Han Anren, am loyal to the Zhao country and have no second heart. I have never colluded with the South-East Barbarians or Pirates, please rest assured.
General Han speaks sincerely|I knew General Han is a good official|General Han is fair and unprejudiced!
General Han, you say you have not colluded with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates, do you have any evidence?
Yes, there's no proof...|Almost fooled by him!|Do you have evidence?|Show us the evidence!
(It's easy to get evidence of collusion with the enemy, but how to prove that there is no contact? This Ji Baichu is simply proposing something that cannot be proved.)
Ji Baichu, you say General Han is colluding with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates, do you have any evidence?
Of course I do! A few days ago, a drowned Soldier was washed ashore. When I was collecting his body, I happened to find a letter between General Han and the Pirates in his arms!
At first, I didn't want to believe it was true, so I hid the letter in my cottage.
But yesterday, a man disguised as a servant from Duke Chai's Tower sneaked into my humble abode, aiming for this letter. Thanks to my timely discovery, I captured him.
(Could it be...)
Bring them up.
(As expected, it's Brother Wei and Miss An Zhi... Judging by their appearance, they seem to have been severely tortured and lost consciousness...)
These two were quite stubborn, so I had to use some means to make them confess. I didn't expect that these two are from the current court's speed room!
People from the court?!|Colleagues with General Han?|Could what he said be true?|So General Han really...
What a trick to reverse black and white... This guy is really hateful!
This man is really hateful for making up rumors and causing trouble, my father was also...
Looking at his face, I really want to stab him!
Husband, what he said seems to make sense...
This guy is reversing black and white and stirring up trouble, Miss Jun, don't be fooled by him.
Reversing black and white, stirring up trouble, this kind of thing seems familiar.
This guy's face always reminds me of that Zhuge guy, it's really annoying!
General Han, what do you say?
I know nothing about these two.
Of course you would say that, because if you knew them, wouldn't your crime of colluding with thieves be confirmed?
(No, the rhythm here is completely controlled by him, I must do something to disrupt his rhythm!)
Use force to coerce Ji Baichu!
Bluffing, let Ji Baichu reveal his true colors.
Step forward and take the blame for Han Anren.
Ji Baichu you--
{PlayerSurName} Brother, calm down, if you make a move under the public eye, General Han will be unable to clear his name even if he jumps into the Yellow River.
Mr. Lu, what do you suggest, let this guy spout nonsense?
Since that guy is making up things to convince these people to believe in the crimes that General Han didn't commit, we can do the same.
Fight fire with fire!
Right, do you remember what Wei Rusong and An Zhi said about monitoring Duke Chai?
I see, Mr. Lu is brilliant!
These two people...
{PlayerSurName} Brother, calm down, there's no benefit for you to take the blame for General Han.
Mr. Lu, what do you suggest, let this guy spout nonsense?
Since that guy is making up things to convince these people to believe in the crimes that General Han didn't commit, we can do the same.
Fight fire with fire!
Right, do you remember what Wei Rusong and An Zhi said about monitoring Duke Chai?
I see, Mr. Lu is brilliant!
What are you... what are you going to do?
Here, I need to clarify something to everyone.\nThese two are actually sent by me to investigate Duke Chai's Tower.
This matter should not have been publicized, but now I have to say it.\nActually, I am also from the speed room, do you know what the speed room does?
What does it do?|I've never heard of it.|Do you know?|I don't know.
It's normal if you don't know. In fact, the speed room has existed since the establishment of this dynasty, with the purpose of monitoring every move of Duke Chai.
This time we received reliable information that Duke Chai is colluding with the Southeast Barbarians and Pirates to cause chaos in the southeast, plotting rebellion.
You... nonsense, everyone don't believe him!
Am I talking nonsense? Mr. Ji, look at these two people, if you weren't eager to hide something, why would you torture them like this?

But you probably don't know, just the act of torturing the people from the Mechanism Room is enough to convict you of treason. Even if King Chai has the Golden Medallion, he can't pardon the crime of treason, let alone you, a mere servant?
What... Me... How would I know they were from the Mechanism Room?!
If you didn't know, why did you set a trap and ambush the two of them?!
Me... I only knew that this Servant had ill intentions and coveted the secrets of the mansion...
Oh? What secrets?
In my opinion, the secret is that King Chai is colluding with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates to cause chaos, and stir up a rebellion in the Southeast Agile!
That's not true! You're making false accusations and distorting the truth!
Then you tell us, what is this secret that has Duke Chai's Tower on high alert?
Yes... Yes...
Speak up!|Speak up quickly!|This is embarrassing!|You tell us!
If you don't speak, it's as good as admitting that King Chai is plotting treason!
Ji Baichu, you are suspected of participating in King Chai's treason, do you have anything to say?
Me... I have nothing...
Take him away!
{yell} Ancestor, save me!
This is so embarrassing...
Damn it, don't think about escaping!
That Old Man seems skinny, but his Qinggong is excellent. Even while carrying Ji Baichu, he still moves lightly. You chase after him desperately, but can only barely keep up.
Don't run!
Damn it, persistent ghost!
Ji Baichu, surrender now!
Damn it, don't think you're so great, I have a master backing me up too!
These little guys don't need me to take action. You deal with the trouble you've caused yourself.
Ancestor, are you just going to leave me alone to face the three of them?
Phew... That Old Man sure can run fast...
What's going on?!
You guys came just in time, help me deal with these ungrateful bastards!
Perfect, I haven't seen your skills yet!
We need to capture Ji Baichu alive, don't be too harsh.
Sigh, what a hassle...
The new wave pushes the old...
Come with me obediently, your matter is not over yet!
Shura Master, it's you!
... Ancestor, do you know each other?
Heh, we have some connections.
Shura Master, so you're also from Duke Chai's Tower!
Phew... That Old Man sure can run fast...
What's going on?!
You guys came just in time, help me deal with these ungrateful bastards!
Perfect, I haven't seen your skills yet!
That old man is powerful, be careful!
Sigh, what a hassle...
He's really powerful...
Shura Master, are you still resisting?
Hmph!
Come with me obediently, your matter is not over yet!
That Old Man seems skinny, but his Qinggong is excellent. Even while carrying Ji Baichu, he still moves lightly. However, he's still a bit slower than you.
The Old Man has good footwork, but let's see where you can run to!
Phew... {PlayerSurName} Brother, you run really fast...
Damn it...
Fellow villagers, please believe that I will investigate this matter thoroughly and give you a satisfactory answer.
Today's matter is over, I will not pursue everyone's responsibility, please go back.
General Han is wise!|Oh, the great blue sky!|I told you General Han is a good man!|Bring the bad guys to justice!
General Han, Ji Baichu has been captured.
Good, put him in the dungeon, don't let him meet with King Chai.
Yes!
General Han, what about Miss An Zhi and Brother Wei?
I have already sent people to take them to the medical clinic.
How are their injuries?
Their injuries are serious, although their lives are not in danger, their meridians are all broken. I'm afraid they will lose all their martial arts after recovery, just like a disabled person.
...What a pity, with his skills, he could have been a Storyteller.
Damn Ji Baichu, what do you mean by "used some means"? Clearly, you didn't intend to leave any survivors!
Rest assured, I have found the best Doctor for them. They will be cured.
Tomorrow is the day of Chai Wang's trial, please rest well tonight.
Han Anren, come out!
It seems I arrived just in time, let's see what's happening.
Han Anren, come out!|Give us an explanation!|We can't live like this anymore!|What kind of bullshit official are you!|We can't even eat!|Don't be a coward!

Fellow villagers, General Han is unwell and cannot appear. \nHowever, he has already acquitted me a few days ago. If you are concerned about me, please go home first. I will thank you one by one later.
Listen to Chai Wang!|Disperse, disperse!|Let's go home~
I didn't expect these people to go home so easily, it seems there's no good show to watch...
{PlayerName}, the assassination of Han Anren must be your doing, right?
Yes, I am.
I have met countless heroes, but you are the only one who can operate outside the rules of the world.
You deliberately kept a low profile before, gaining Han Anren's trust, causing Ji Baichu to make a misjudgment. Your mind is so deep that even I can't fathom it.
You assassinated Han Anren, which also helped me. The matter of the Wind Rumor Platform you mentioned before, I will solve it for you.
Thank you, Your Highness King Chai!
Don't worry about such a small matter, young hero. After you go back, everyone will surely praise you.
Then I will go back to my mansion. There must be a lot of things to deal with after being away for a few days. {PlayerSurName}, please feel free to do as you please.
Chai Wang kept his promise, and your Fame has finally turned around.\nThe purpose of this trip to the southeast has been achieved, it's time to Run away.
Although I have seen the government office of Daliang City, it's my first time seeing a criminal trial. I'm quite looking forward to it.
I hope General Han is better than the stupid Prefect of Daliang City.
...I feel really uncomfortable staying here.
Could it be that Qingqing, you have been tried?
I haven't, but some brothers who have been in jail said that although the trial is scary, the prison food is quite good.
Alas, it always brings up some unbearable past...
Please keep quiet in the court.
The time has come, rise to the court, bring Chai Wang into the hall!
Suspect Chai Wang, why don't you kneel?
I, Chai, am innocent, why should I kneel?
I found a ledger in the South-East Barbarian Camp that records your financial and military dealings. What do you have to say?
Ledger? What's written on it?
"On the fifth day, received 3 jars of wine from Duke Chai's Tower, three thousand taels of silver... On the fifteenth day, Blade Destruction Army arrived..."
Is my seal stamped on it?
This...
Anyone can write such a ledger with a wave of their hand.\nWould you believe me if I wrote a Ledger now about General Han accepting my bribe?
Your servant Ji Baichu, abused his power, tortured the members of the Mechanism Room, this act is undoubtedly a crime. What do you have to say?
I know nothing about this. If Ji Baichu acted on his own, let General Han deal with him. I will not protect him.
What about Ji Baichu spreading rumors in the city and disturbing the peace?
At that time, I was in jail and knew nothing about the outside world.
What about colluding with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates?
General Han seems to have a poor memory, this matter has already been mentioned by Chai.\nIf General Han wants to accuse Chai of a crime, please present the evidence.
This Chai Wang really knows how to shirk responsibility, but he's so confident, I'm afraid even if there's evidence, he's already destroyed it.
Someone, take Chai Wang to rest.
Yes!
Bring the prisoner Ji Baichu!
Ji Baichu, you abused your power, tortured the members of the Mechanic Room, do you plead guilty?
I plead guilty.
You spread rumors in the city, incited the public to cause trouble at the government office, and disturbed public order, do you plead guilty?
I plead guilty!
You escaped with other accomplices and resisted arrest, do you plead guilty?
I had no choice but to...
Do you plead guilty?
...I plead guilty.
Good, according to the law, you should be sentenced to death by dismemberment and your nine clans should be implicated. But I will give you a chance to redeem your crimes, are you willing?

(Although the crimes committed by Ji Baichu are not light, the punishment of dismemberment and implicating nine clans is a bit too much. General Han probably wants to scare him into confessing against Chai Wang.)
I'm willing! I'm willing to do anything!
Good, tell me about the dealings between Chai Wang, South-East Barbarian, and Pirate.
This...
If you don't speak, I will sentence you to 50 lashes first—
I'll speak, I'll speak!
column3: ข้าพูด ข้าพูดแล้ว!

column2: Chai Wang... actually has been secretly making connections with the martial arts heroes, and also has contacts with South-East Barbarian and pirates.

When the Central Plains was in chaos, the emperor went hunting in the north, Duke Kang and Duke Qi were fighting for power, Chai Wang felt the time was right. He first bribed the soldiers of Heavy Rock Reef, took the prisoners there for his own use, and then assigned them as leaders of South-East Barbarian and Pirate to create rebellion...
General Han, you are wise and martial, you defeated these ungrateful rebels and arrested Chai Wang. The things that happened afterwards were all arranged by Chai Wang for me to do...
(This Ji Baichu is really a coward, he confessed everything after a little scare...)
Good, do you dare to testify and argue with Chai Wang in court?
General Han, if I can accuse Chai Wang, my crime...
If so, I will spare you from death.
Good, good, Chai Wang has committed many crimes in the village, I know all about them, I am willing to accuse Chai Wang and argue with him in court!
Good, bring Chai Wang!
Chai, I just rested, what's the matter again?
Chai! You bribed criminals, colluded with South-East Barbarian and Pirate to cause chaos, General Han knows everything!
Oh?
Not to mention you oppressed the people, I know it all!
Oh.
No noise is allowed in the court, kneel down now!
I'm talking to you Chai, kneel down!
I'm talking to both of you! Kneel down for me!
Chai Wang, why don't you kneel?
I, Chai, am innocent, why should I kneel?
You Chai—
Your servant Ji Baichu accused you of these crimes, don't you admit it?
It's just a false accusation, Chai has always obeyed the law, what crime is there?\nIf General Han convicts Chai based on one-sided words, wouldn't it be a joke if this matter gets out?
This...
Of course, General Han, you can also order the Bailiff to reward Chai with dozens of lashes, maybe Chai will confess under torture.
Oh no, Chai has a family heirloom of a pill book and iron ticket, if you reward Chai with lashes, you are slapping the face of the great ancestor emperor.
(It seems that General Han has been driven to a dead end, is there any other evidence here?)
There is evidence!
There is no evidence left.
I have evidence!
What? What evidence do you have? Are you just making things up?
Of course I have evidence, and that evidence is——
The silver found in South-East Barbarian Camp!
The Sea Goddess told me!
column3: ข้าแต่ท่านเทพธิดาเจ้าสมุทร จงบอกข้าเถิด!

column2: Guests at King Chai's banquet!
The play performed by the troupe!
Those guests are all famous figures in the martial arts world, how could they become evidence for your accusation against this king?
If you are not guilty, why would you associate with Vagabond?!
By your logic, I'm afraid Lord Xue of the Warring States period also committed a crime.
(It seems that the evidence is not this...)
The play performed by that troupe is nonsense, how could it be considered evidence?
It seems so, it really doesn't count as evidence...
I hope {PlayerName} doesn't talk nonsense.
This is a court, I didn't expect General Han to actually accept the words of gods and buddhas, it really opened my eyes.
This... I didn't...
What are you laughing at, the Sea Goddess is very effective!
column3: หัวเราะเยาะเย้ยทำไมกัน บารมีของท่านเทพธิดาเจ้าสมุทรช่างสูงส่งนะ!

column2: By your words, your Ye Family Battalion doesn't need to resist the Yan army, just go and worship the Sea Goddess.
column3: หากเป็นเช่นนั้น กองทัพสกุลเย่ของเจ้าก็ไม่ต้องทำการศึกให้เหนื่อยหรอก ไปอ้อนวอนต่อท่านเทพธิดาเจ้าสมุทรเสียสิ

column2: The silver found in the South-East Barbarian Camp?
Yes, General Han, can you tell us what was found on those silvers?
"Chai Ming", the "Chai" of King Chai, the "Ming" of crowing.
So what?
As far as I know, the silver with this inscription is supplied by Roaring Sea House to Duke Chai's Tower.

...So what? I had previously hired Surging Waves Escort to escort a shipment, which included this silver, but they were incompetent and lost my shipment, it seems it was robbed by South-East Barbarian.
Since General Han has recovered the silver for me, I hope it can be returned in full.
You think it's simple, General Han, how much is this batch of silver in total?
Three thousand taels.

Do you all remember the account book found in the South-East Barbarian Camp? It says "On the fifth day, received 3 jars of wine from Duke Chai's Tower, silver three thousand taels... On the fifteenth day, Blade Destruction Army arrived..."
That is to say, this batch of silver was transported out by you through Surging Waves Escort, and you also let South-East Barbarian rob it themselves!
...This is all Ji Baichu's own decision, it has nothing to do with me.
Are you saying you didn't know about the escort of the silver by the escort agency?
I was not aware!
King Chai, you say you didn't know about the escort of the silver, you——
Lying!
He really doesn't seem to know.
(No, it's impossible, I definitely heard about this, King Chai must know about this escort, I have to hold on here no matter what...)
King Chai, you're lying, you knew about this escort!
Do you have any evidence?
(Damn it, King Chai has already shown his hand, but the Innkeeper of Surging Waves Escort is dead, there's no one to testify against him, it's still a failure...)
Since you have no evidence to accuse me, please don't waste time.
Of course I have evidence! \nGeneral Han, I would like to call the Innkeeper of Surging Waves Escort as a witness.
Alright, as you wish.
Witness, who are you?
I am the Innkeeper of Surging Waves Escort.
Could the Innkeeper please tell us about the three escorts commissioned by King Chai?
Yes...
The first escort was at the end of last month, King Chai personally came to commission me to escort a batch of Ingredient to Daliang, but it was robbed on the way...

The second escort was on the third day of last month, Ji Baichu commissioned me to send a batch of weapons to Xiangfan Region, promising that as long as this delivery was successful, the compensation for the last time would be waived, but this trip was still robbed by South-East Barbarian...

On the fifth day of last month, Ji Baichu brought three thousand taels of silver, intending to send it to Xiangfan Region. He said that as long as it was successfully delivered, the previous compensation would be written off.
Because the amount was huge this time, I went to confirm with King Chai, and only after receiving his handwritten confirmation did I dispatch the escort team...
Do you still have the escort bill from that time?
There are two copies of the escort bill, one held by the Elite Escort in charge, and the other kept by me. It's right here, please take a look, General.
King Chai, your seal is indeed on this. Are you still going to deny it?
I did transport the silver. But Ji Baichu knew about this too, he could have had the South-East Barbarians ambush and rob the escort in advance.
So, you admit what the Innkeeper said?
Indeed, it's true.
Good, that's what I wanted to hear!
Innkeeper, there's another problem with these three escorts, that is—
The first escort.
The second escort.
The third escort.
I don't understand, what's the problem with this escort?
Why did you transport weapons?
The situation in Xiangfan was urgent, I kindly transported weapons to the Ye Family Battalion to resist the Yan people, what's wrong with that?
You were clearly transporting for the South-East Barbarians!
I'm not aware of the South-East Barbarians robbing the escort, how many times do I have to tell you?
(Damn, it seems there's no way to pry open King Chai's mouth about this escort!)
...Didn't we just finish talking about this escort?\n{PlayerSurName}Young hero, you're so young and your memory is so bad, I'm very worried.
What's wrong with this escort?

This escort was the first one robbed by the South-East Barbarians, it didn't even appear in the South-East Barbarians' account book, but it can prove that you, King Chai, colluded with the South-East Barbarians!
I don't understand what you're talking about.
Innkeeper, how long does it take to transport goods from here to Daliang City?
Ten days by water, twenty days by land...
A total of thirty days' journey, but what you transported were some ingredients, even if the ingredients arrived, they would probably have rotted.
My friend wanted to try some specialties from the southeast, I just overlooked the fact that the ingredients would rot.
Even if you forget, wouldn't the other people in the escort agency remember?
Uh, we did tell King Chai about this at the time, but he didn't care...
...It was just a little oversight, I didn't pay attention.
But you didn't think that this little oversight could expose your collusion with the South-East Barbarians!
General Han, please bring up the South-East Barbarian I found.
Alright, bring up the South-East Barbarian!
It's you again! You promised that as long as I tell you what I know, you'll let me go. You Han people can't be trusted!
Don't worry, this is the last time.
Do you remember what you robbed the first time your leader sent you to rob the escort?
...I remember, it was some good wine and meat.
Your leader knew in advance that they would pass by, right?
Yes, our leader knows everything!

Ladies and Gentlemen, I have already identified the identity of the leader of the South-East Barbarians. His name is Ba Nantian, a death row prisoner exiled to Heavy Rock Reef, who was previously released by King Chai's servant Ji Baichu. Ji Baichu, am I right?
Yes, yes! Just as the General said...
King Chai, you're a smart man, are you still going to deny it?
Hahaha...
{yell} Hahahaha—!
What are you laughing at!
{PlayerName}, I didn't misjudge you. I didn't expect you to catch such a small mistake. You are indeed amazing, you win.
Yes, it was I who released the prisoners of Heavy Rock Reef, and it was I who arranged for them to become rebels. I did all of this.
The only miscalculation I made was that you could lead a team to defeat this rabble and find so many clues.
Take this as a reward from me for your hard work!
Chai Wang, your treason is conclusive. Even if you have the Protection, you can't escape death!
Put Chai Wang into the death cell!
Chai Wang's Machinery was calculated, but you were Superior and Neutralized all his plots.
Chai Wang didn't expect that a small mistake would become the most Critical handle.
The Bailiff took Chai Wang into the prison, but Chai Wang's expression remained unchanged.
Looking at Chai Wang's expression, you vaguely feel that your karma with Chai Wang is not over yet...
This matter was indeed dangerous. Thanks to the help of the three of you, I was able to convict Chai Wang.
Although the three of you are Vagabonds, you are very capable. I want to take you as my staff. What do you think?
...I don't like dealing with officialdom, so I won't accompany you.
In that case, I won't keep you. I have prepared some money, please take it, Lu Shaoxia.
I appreciate it, goodbye.
{PlayerSurName} Shaoxia, I hope you can be my deputy. What do you think?
Thank you for your kindness, General, but the rivers and lakes are more suitable for me.
It seems that I can't keep you... What about Mr. Lu?
So I'm just a substitute for {PlayerSurName}'s younger brother...
No, I didn't mean that...
I'm not young anymore, and I can't wander around the rivers and lakes. It's easier to stay by General Han's side and give advice.
That's great! With Mr. Lu's help, I feel much more at ease!
Mr. Lu...
Don't look at me like that, {PlayerSurName} little brother. After all, I'm older than you, and my kung fu can't improve anymore. It's time to retire.
This Manual is what I got when I was young. Unfortunately, I'm not smart enough to fully understand the secrets in it. But you are far better than me, you will definitely understand it.
Thank you, Mr. Lu.
{PlayerSurName} Shaoxia, although I can't work with you, you are a major contributor to this event. I don't know how to express... Please accept these money.
Thank you, General Han, goodbye.
Well, have a safe journey.
Damn it, although I'm unwilling, I really don't have any evidence...
Ji Baichu, do you have any evidence?
This... No...
Ha, you don't have evidence, but I know something!
General Han, there is a Pond in my mansion. I often see Ji Baichu hiding something in the rockery in the Pond. I wonder if General Han has searched it?
Go and find it.
Yes!
Before he comes back, let's take a break from this case.
This Chai Wang is really not easy to deal with...\nWhat do you two think?
Seeing the confident look on King Chai's face, he must have been prepared for this. I have a bad feeling about this...
Perhaps {Me} and I have been too naive. King Chai is a strategic mastermind, and we might still be playing into his hands.
Alas, I have miscalculated, I'm afraid...
General Han, we have found the evidence!
Show it to me.
Absurd!
General Han, what's wrong?
As expected, this must have been arranged by King Chai in advance.
This thing...
General Han, have you found the evidence?
This old fox...
There's nothing we can do at this point. We'll just have to take it one step at a time.
General Han, have you seen the evidence?
Ji Baichu, did you write this?
This... I don't know anything about these things...
General Han, what is the evidence you found? Can you show it to me?
Ji Baichu, think carefully. Lying in court is a serious crime.
I dare not hide anything, I really don't know about this thing...
King Chai, did you plant this evidence in advance?
This is interesting. I know nothing about what you're talking about. How can I answer you? Why don't you show me the evidence, General Han, so I can respond.
You, King Chai--
(General Han's face turned green with anger, not knowing what the evidence was...)
Yeah, what is it?
General Han looks so bad, what is the evidence?
General Han, please reveal the evidence.
This is... a record of communications between Duke Chai's Tower and the South-East Barbarians, Pirates, and Heavy Rock Reef...
Isn't this conclusive evidence?
--The signature, seal, and recipient are all... Ji Baichu...
This means...

It seems clear now. With both human and physical evidence, it was Ji Baichu who contacted and bribed the South-East Barbarians and Pirates to cause chaos. The one who committed the crime of treason is also Ji Baichu.
Alas, I have failed to recognize people and teach them properly, allowing my servant to commit such a crime...
{yell} You, surnamed Chai, have calculated this step in advance--!
No matter what you say, the evidence is irrefutable. What do you say, General Han?
(General Han bit his lip until it bled...)
...Ji Baichu.
I'm here, I'm innocent!
With both human and physical evidence, how can you deny it?
This is all his, surnamed Chai, framing me. I could never commit such a capital crime. Please investigate, sir!
No matter what you say, I only believe in evidence, and I believe General Han does too. Isn't that right, General Han?
...Ji Baichu, you are guilty of treason. With both human and physical evidence, you should be executed by dismemberment, and your family punished as well.
I'm innocent!
...Take him away.

As for King Chai, due to his failure to discipline, he should be flogged eighty times and exiled to the frontier according to the law. However, as stated in the ironclad edict, this punishment can be waived. Please run away on your own.
After returning, King Chai will definitely discipline his servants properly. Farewell.
General Han, is it really going to end like this...
Court dismissed...
...General Han, farewell.
King Chai is a strategic mastermind. Despite your best efforts, you couldn't find any evidence against him.
Seeing the resentful look on Han Anren's face and his gritted teeth, you also feel a bit down.
With a heart full of resentment, you rush into Duke Chai's Tower, only to find it deserted, with no sign of Duke Chai.
Thus ends your journey to the southeast. You swear to yourself that you will catch Duke Chai and bring him to justice.
As for those who slandered you, they never appeared again. But that's another story.
Ah, here.
Who would have thought that there would be such a magnificent waterfall in the Bamboo Forest...
The waterfall in the Bamboo Forest is beautiful, but compared to you two beauties, it pales in comparison.
You're such a flatterer.
But I speak from the heart.
Sigh...
You've been sulking since we left Duke Chai's Tower. What's wrong?
Master... I was just thinking, we were invited to Duke Chai's birthday banquet, and now he's in prison, and we're just standing by. Is this right...
...I don't want to get involved in these power struggles. It's better for us three to enjoy our freedom and travel.
But...
Master Han is in a good mood.
The young hero looks familiar. Who might you be?
I am {PlayerName}, I met Master Han at Duke Chai's birthday banquet.
I see, I am Han Zidu, I have met {PlayerSurName} young hero.
I am Anzhi, nice to meet you, young hero.
I am Chunxing, nice to meet you, young hero.
This waterfall is truly spectacular.
Does {PlayerSurName} young hero also enjoy traveling and sightseeing?
Haha, who doesn't love beautiful landscapes?
Well said, but how did the young hero find time to enjoy the scenery here while helping Duke Chai? I suspect you're here for me.
Since you've seen through me, I'll be straightforward.\nIndeed, I was asked by Mr. Ji to find you.
Oh? What does he want with me?
I heard that your ancestors had deep relations with Duke Chai. Mr. Ji hopes that you can help Duke Chai and restore the relations between the two families.
Hahaha, it seems there is such a thing. But because of this, my family has been serving the people for generations, and we are not allowed to be officials or businessmen.

When my Han family was struggling, his Chai family was flourishing generation after generation. When did they ever care about us? Now that Duke Chai is in prison, he remembers my Han family. There's no such thing as a free lunch!
(It seems that Han Zidu has a deep grudge against the Chai family. But he does have a point. How can I persuade him?)
Use force to make him submit! (Specific battle, only the protagonist participates)
Defend Duke Chai. (Persuade level 3 advance)
Tell him there is a traitor among his ranks. (Specific battle, only the protagonist participates)
Forget it, I'm not good at talking, I'll just beat you up and drag you back.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, I'm not a pushover either.\nAnzhi, you don't know martial arts, stay back, so you don't get hurt.
...Master, be careful.
Come on!
With your skills, you want to drag me back by force? Go back and practice for another twenty years!
Damn, he's really strong...
Anzhi, Chunxing, let's go. This place is a mood killer, let's go somewhere else to have fun.
As you wish, Master.
Alas, I couldn't bring him back, I don't know how to explain to Mr. Ji.
You are not as skilled as me, why not follow me obediently?
...Even if you take me back, this young master will not help King Chai!
That's Mr. Ji's business, what does it have to do with me?
Mr. Ji, I have brought Han Zi back.
Why is Young Master Han covered in wounds?
He was reluctant to come, so I had to be a bit rough.
This...never mind, you can leave first, leave the rest to me.
So Mr. Ji, what should I do next?
You go out and wait for a while, I'll find you later.
Alright.
Young Master Han, to my knowledge, it's not that Prince Chai doesn't want to contact you, he just can't.
Can't? What do you mean by that?
You should know more about Prince Chai's family background than I do.
That's true.
Then let me ask you, if you were the emperor of Zhao, would you allow Prince Chai to contact the descendants of the former emperor's troops?
This...indeed, if I were the emperor, I would never allow such a thing to happen.
The world is in chaos now, and Prince Chai contacted you at the first opportunity. Doesn't this prove that the Chai family hasn't forgotten the old kindness of the Han family?
You do have a point.

Young Master...But if the Chai family remembers the kindness of the Han family, why haven't they sent any financial aid to the Han family for decades? With the power of the Chai family, this should be easy to do.
The South-East Region is far from the Central Plains, there is only one pass in and out, and there are often South-East Barbarians causing trouble, it's not easy to transport goods out, right?
(This Chun Xing seems to want Han Zi to contact Prince Chai, while An Zhi is completely opposite, it's quite intriguing.)
We can't reach a conclusion by discussing here, why not go and ask?\nYoung hero, please lead the way.
Please, Young Master Han.
Mr. Ji, I have persuaded Young Master Han to help.
Young Master Han is willing to follow Mr. Ji's orders.
Very good, very good!\n{PlayerSurName}Young hero, you have done a great job!

Young Master Han, the prince has always been thinking about you. This fan was made by a skilled artisan at the prince's request when he heard that you are good at using short weapons. He instructed me to give it to you.
Thank you for Prince Chai's kindness, but I am used to the fan in my hand. I will give this fan to {PlayerSurName}young hero as a gift.
This...Since Young Master Han said so, please accept it, {PlayerSurName}young hero.
Then I won't be polite~\nThank you, Young Master Han, for the fan.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, I need to discuss some things with Young Master Han, please excuse us.
Just like before, right? I understand...
What...what did you say?!
Think about it, both you and Prince Chai are descendants of the former dynasty, how can Zhao let you act freely? If I were the emperor of Zhao, I would definitely plant spies around you.
Although it makes sense...but...
If I'm not mistaken, the two ladies accompanying you are probably...
Young Master, you must believe me, I have been with you since you were down and out...
Young master, I have deep feelings for you and always follow your lead, you must believe me...
You all...
{PlayerName}, what are you trying to do by stirring up trouble between me and them?!
I'm just stating the facts, believe it or not, it's up to you.
Young master, you can't possibly believe what this guy is saying, can you?
Young master...
All of you, be quiet, let me think...
Young master, it must be An Zhi, I often see him whispering behind your back with others!
Spring Apricot, what are you talking about? I am devoted to the young master, how could I...
Don't try to argue your way out of this!
Spring Apricot, what are you doing?! An Zhi doesn't know martial arts, are you trying to kill her?!
Young master, you are so protective of her, don't tell me you think I'm a spy?!
You... how could you be a spy...
So, young master, do you think I...
You... we've been through thick and thin together, I absolutely don't believe you are...
{PlayerName}, you're trying to sow discord, I'll fight you!
Sigh, I didn't want to fight you, if I had known this would happen, why would I have bothered talking?\nMaster Han, I can only forcibly take you to Duke Chai's Tower.
{PlayerName}, don't think you can force me to submit!
You can talk to Mr. Ji about it.
Mr. Ji, I have brought Han Zi back.
Why is Young Master Han covered in wounds?
He was reluctant to come, so I had to be a bit rough.
This...never mind, you can leave first, leave the rest to me.
So Mr. Ji, what should I do next?
You go out and wait for a while, I'll find you later.
Alright.
This Mr. Ji is so mysterious, I don't know what he's up to...
Ah, young hero, I just happened to be cleaning here...
Oh...
Where are Master Han and the others?
I have invited them elsewhere.\nAlright, let's not talk about them, {PlayerSurName} young hero, you've worked hard, Prince Chai will remember your kindness.

There's nothing else for you to do for now.\nAccording to the plan, we will force General Han to release the prince in two days. I'm sure the area around the Government Office will be bustling then, you can go and have a look.
So what should I do in these two days?
You can freely roam around the South-East Region, if you happen to encounter other heroes in trouble, you can lend a hand.
Understood.
Damn, I didn't expect Mr. Ji to be so fragile...\nMr. Ji is gone, there's no point in working for him now...
Why do I faintly hear the sound of fighting?
Go take a look.
Better not to get involved in this.
Tsk, the old beggar's kung fu is not bad.
What kung fu? The old beggar just follows the pictures, he doesn't know any kung fu~
{yell} you old man——!
It seems that Fu Duanyun is not a match for this beggar, Ji Baichu said earlier to help others in trouble, should I...
Help Fu Duanyun!<color=#c44b0e>(Specific battle)</color>
Pretend I didn't see it.
If it's none of my business, I'll stay out of it...
Brother Fu, I'm here to help you!
Hahaha, you all came to play with the old beggar, that's great!
Phew... this old beggar is really strong.
As expected of "Carefree Beggar" Mo Yuan, his skills are extraordinary.
Thanks to the help of {PlayerSurName} brother, but...
However?
Here's some silver for you, brother, just don't tell anyone you helped me, so they don't think my martial arts are weak...
So that's how it is. Don't worry, my lips are sealed.
Thank you, I need to deal with the scene here, so I won't chat with you for long.
That person over there seems to be...
Master, do we have a ship that can sail?
Sailing? What for?
To fight the Pirates.
Are you trying to get yourself killed?
I'm not afraid of them.
We are! You should find someone else.
Isn't that Brother Lu?
I don't know you.
I'm known as the Digger, we met at the longevity banquet.
What do you want?
I heard that Brother Lu wants to sail. I also want to go to the sea. Would Brother Lu like to join me?
Where is your ship?
Just over there.
Alright, I'll go.
You actually saw through it...
Such a strong killing intent, it would be strange if I didn't notice.
The Digger actually ambushed Lu Chenxuan...\nShould I help since it seems like the Digger is not his match?
Lend a hand to the Digger! <color=#c44b0e>(Specific Battle)</color>
Pretend I didn't see it.
What does his defeat have to do with me? I'll just pretend I didn't see it.
Don't panic, brother, I'm here to help!
Perfect timing, let's take this guy down together!
Such arrogance!
Phew... This guy is quite capable. If it weren't for your help, I might have been at a disadvantage!
We're all working for King Chai, of course I would help.

I always distinguish between gratitude and grudges. You helped me, so I will naturally repay you. This black donkey hoof is something I carry with me every day. With it, I'm not afraid of any demons or ghosts.
(Just a donkey hoof?)
To be honest, I'm not afraid of these demons and evil spirits. Do you have anything more useful?
Well, then take this. I found it when I was digging. I won't have a chance to return to the Central Plains, so I'll give it to you.
(This seems to be a treasure map? I'll have to take a good look at it later.)
Thank you, brother.
Humph~
column3: ฮืม~

column2: It seems like someone is leading troops out of the city? He looks familiar...
Is that... Mr. Lu? Why would he lead troops out of the city?
I'm curious about where he's going. Maybe I should go out of the city to find him.
I didn't expect to run into the South-East Barbarians. What a hassle...
Lu... If you have the guts, don't use tricks, fight me one on one!
One on one? That's too much trouble...
Mr. Lu, the fire set by the South-East Barbarians has been put out!
Good, thank you.
Now, what should I do with you? By rights, I should send you to Phoenix Woods Harbor to be dealt with by General Han...
...But that's too much trouble. I might as well execute you here and now.
You... Are you serious?
Mr. Lu, isn't this a bit inappropriate...
Now that you mention it...
How about this, I'll spare one of you. Whoever knows the most about King Chai's secrets, I'll let him live.
What's wrong? Speak up. This is your chance to live.
Mr. Lu, they don't know anything. Isn't this a bit too much?
Finally, the big fish is hooked.
Tian Wu? Isn't he merciless towards the South-East Barbarians? Why is he standing with the South-East Barbarians now?
Judging by your appearance, you seem to know a lot. Can you cooperate and tell me what you know?
column3: ดูจากท่าทางของท่านแล้ว ท่านน่าจะรู้เรื่องราวมากมาย ข้าพเจ้าขอร้องท่าน กรุณาให้ความร่วมมือและบอกเล่าสิ่งที่ท่านทราบแก่ข้าพเจ้าได้หรือไม่

column2: Then you should ask Me about this knife first!
Ah, what a hassle.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, you've been watching for quite a while. Why not join in and stretch your muscles?
(What... should I do...)
Show yourself and fight. <color=#c44b0e>(Specific battle)</color>
Sneak away quietly.
Tsk, coward...
I'm sorry, Brother Tian, I really don't want to get involved in this mess.
Ah... what a hassle...
Teaming up with the younger brother again, he's really capable.
Last time we fought the South-East Barbarian, this time... what should we do with them?
That's simple.
They... they are soldiers.
Anyway, it was all done by the South-East Barbarian, what does it have to do with us?
Hey, you guys, are your injuries that serious? How long are you going to kneel?
Boss Tian, what about this side...
Forget it, the kid already knows about this side. If we don't leave now, you'll all die.
{PlayerSurName} Young brother, you should also run away from here, we'll meet again.
This Tian Wu is ruthless, really a character not to be messed with...
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, why is it you?
Who are you?
My name is Liao Yuelong, like you, I work for the adults.
(Adults? He must be referring to King Chai. It seems that this Liao Yuelong is not an enemy.)
Nice to meet you, Brother Liao. I wonder why you came here.
Brother Liao? Why are you here?
This is my home. I heard that the South-East Barbarian were causing trouble at Mei Pass Post, so I rushed back. Where are the South-East Barbarian?
South-East Barbarian? They've already gone back.
Could it be that {PlayerSurName} brother drove them away for me?
Thank you, {PlayerSurName} brother, please accept my bow!
No... it wasn't me...
Who was it then...?
(I better not tell him about Tian Wu leading the team to kill Lu Yunlong.)\nWell... when I arrived, they were already fleeing...
I see... If I ever get the chance to know who defeated the South-East Barbarian, I really want to thank him.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, just in case, I will stay here for a few more days. If you need anything, come find me.
Okay.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, I have things to do, so I won't stay long. We'll catch up when we have the chance.
Take care, Brother Liao.
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, please come in.
I choose to trust {PlayerSurName} young hero!
Dear friends, our troupe has been able to survive until now thanks to the support of {PlayerSurName} young hero. I trust his character, the murder in the alley is purely fabricated!
Han Anren, come out!
It seems to have started.
Han Anren, come out!|Give us an explanation!|We can't live like this anymore!|What kind of bullshit official are you!|We can't even eat!|Don't be a coward!

Fellow villagers, General Han is unwell and cannot appear. \nHowever, he has already acquitted me a few days ago. If you are concerned about me, please go home first. I will thank you one by one later.
Listen to Chai Wang!|Disperse, disperse!|Let's go home~
I didn't expect these people to go home so easily, it seems there's no good show to watch...
{PlayerName}, the assassination of Han Anren must be your doing, right?
Yes, I am.
I have met countless heroes, but you are the only one who can operate outside the rules of the world.
You assassinated Han Anren, which also helped me. The matter of the Wind Rumor Platform you mentioned before, I will solve it for you.
Thank you, Your Highness King Chai!
Don't worry about such a small matter, young hero. After you go back, everyone will surely praise you.
Then I will go back to my mansion. There must be a lot of things to deal with after being away for a few days. {PlayerSurName}, please feel free to do as you please.
Chai Wang kept his promise, and your Fame has finally turned around.\nThe purpose of this trip to the southeast has been achieved, it's time to Run away.
Fellow villagers, please don't rush, I am here, if you have any issues, please tell me.
The market is closed today, how is my family supposed to cook!
It's not that we don't want to do business, our goods were robbed by those South-East Barbarians, how can we sell without goods?
Also, there are pirates disturbing the sea, we can't go out to fish!
Mr. Han, didn't you say that the bandits have been wiped out?!
Yeah, are you saying that Mr. Han lied about the military situation to gain merit for himself?
Give us an explanation!|I can't believe Mr. Han is this kind of person!|I misjudged you!
(These people are all in cahoots, they must have been arranged by Mr. Ji.)
(Looking closely, there are also the mole and Fu Duanyun among the crowd. It seems that everything was arranged by Mr. Ji.)
Fellow villagers, listen to me, the bandits have indeed been wiped out by me, these things are definitely someone stirring up trouble, spreading false news to mislead everyone.
Bullshit! My goods were robbed by the South-East Barbarians, I saw them attacking the Blade Destruction Army's camp with my own eyes, the Blade Destruction Army was defeated!
Yes, a few days ago I saw a beacon fire on a distant island, it must be a critical situation, but I didn't see Mr. Han sending reinforcements!
Did Mr. Han not eliminate the bandits at all? What did he say before?
I get it, Mr. Han is actually in cahoots with these bandits, they are in the same gang!
(It seems that Mr. Ji has turned everything upside down, I wonder how Han Anren will respond?)
About these matters, I have already sent people to investigate, they are all false alarms, there are no bandits causing trouble in the South-East Region, please rest assured, everyone.
I don't believe you!
Yes, you Han Anren are not a good person either, we don't believe you!
Yes, we don't believe you!|You Han Anren are not a good person!|You're a hypocrite!
Hmm? Why are there so many people?

Report to General Han, no traces of South-East Barbarian were found on the route from Mei Pass Post to Phoenix Woods Harbor. I arranged soldiers to guard several key points and support each other. This is a merchant team I happened to meet, so I escorted them back to the harbor.
This... Isn't this my clerk?!
Innkeeper, we arrived safely all the way, didn't see a single South-East Barbarian~\nWe got a lot of good ores this time, we can make a lot of good things!
As you can see, there are no thieves on the land route, you can go back to your business with peace of mind.
……|Let's go back...|What General Han said is right...
Wait, the sea issue hasn't been resolved yet! Our Phoenix Woods Harbor relies on the sea for living!
Mr. Lu hasn't returned yet, could it be...
I hope Lu the warrior is safe and sound...
General Han, the matter at sea has been resolved.
Reporting to you, sir, I patrolled the sea for several shichen and did not encounter any Pirates. However, I did come across a Merchant ship from Perth, which I took the initiative to escort here.
General Han, the ship has docked, but where are the Clerks to unload the goods?\nWhat are all these people gathered here for?
You take a rest, I will arrange for the unloading of the goods.
This...|It seems they are all fake...|Was I deceived?|Let's go back...
General Han, your crimes are not limited to this.
I am Ji Baichu, a servant of Duke Chai's Tower. I have discovered another crime committed by General Han. Please listen to me.
From Duke Chai's Tower?|A crime?|It should be credible.|Let's listen.
Ji Baichu, you must speak with conscience, with evidence!
My fellow villagers, I know you all want justice. I already have evidence of Chai Wang's rebellion and will soon bring him to trial. You can all come to the government office to see.
Let's go, let's see!|Hehe, there's a show to watch~|I've never seen a trial before.|Justice is in the heart of the people!
It seems that Han Anren is full of confidence, why not go to the government office and see what they have to say in court.
Everyone, please wait and listen to me!
I am Ji Baichu, a servant of Duke Chai's Tower, and I want to speak for justice.
From Duke Chai's Tower?|Speak for justice?|It should be credible.|Let's listen.
Innkeepers, I have a question for you. Were your goods robbed by the South-East Barbarians, and were you harassed by Pirates at sea? Is this true or false?
These things...

I remind you, if this is false, it means you are spreading rumors and inciting the residents of the harbor to attack the government. According to the law, you can be exiled to the frontier, or even beheaded.
(Mr. Ji is clearly here to stir up emotions. With his words, these merchants can only insist that there are South-East Barbarians and Pirates.)
Innkeepers, don't worry. I can turn a blind eye to today's events. Just tell the truth.
This... My goods were robbed by the South-East Barbarians...
Innkeeper, you better think carefully before you speak.
It's true, all true!
Mine, my situation is also true!
(It seems that these Merchants are afraid of offending Duke Chai. In their eyes, Duke Chai's Tower is more powerful.)
Since this is true, are you suggesting that General Han and these unknown heroes are colluding with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates to stage a play and make false evidence?
This...
Nonsense! General Han is fair and loves the people, and his heroic resistance to the enemy is well known. How dare you say he is colluding with the enemy and harboring evil intentions?

(Mr. Ji is indeed powerful. These few sentences seem to be scolding these vendors, but in fact, they are overturning General Han's efforts with a single sentence, and the previous evidence is also disregarded.)
Fellow villagers, I promise you here, I, Han Anren, am loyal to the Zhao country and have no second heart. I have never colluded with the South-East Barbarians or Pirates, please rest assured.
General Han speaks sincerely|I knew General Han is a good official|General Han is fair and unprejudiced!
General Han, you say you have not colluded with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates, do you have any evidence?
Yes, there's no proof...|Almost fooled by him!|Do you have evidence?|Show us the evidence!
(The evidence of collusion with thieves is easy to obtain, but how to prove that there is no contact, Mr. Ji has proposed something that cannot be proven.)
Ji Baichu, you say General Han is colluding with the South-East Barbarians and Pirates, do you have any evidence?
I do have evidence! A few days ago, a drowned soldier was washed ashore. When I was collecting his body, I happened to find a letter between General Han and the Pirates in his arms!
At first, I didn't want to believe it was true, so I hid the letter in my cottage.
But yesterday, someone disguised as a servant of Duke Chai's Tower sneaked into my hut, aiming at this letter. Thanks to my timely discovery, I caught him.
Bring them up.
(This person is a servant of Duke Chai's Tower... Looking at them, they seem to have been severely tortured, their faces are completely unrecognizable...)
This person was quite stubborn, so I had to use some means to make them confess. I didn't expect these two to be from the current court's speed room!
People from the court?!|Colleagues with General Han?|Could what he said be true?|So General Han really...
(These common people don't know what the speed room is, but for them, as long as this servant is from the court like General Han, it's enough to prove that they are in the same group.)
General Han, what do you have to say?
...What's the use of what I say now?
(Indeed, after Mr. Ji's set, black has become white. I'm afraid no matter what General Han says, these common people won't believe it.)

(Moreover, Han Anren accused Chai Wang of collusion, as long as everyone believes that Han Anren is the colluder, Chai Wang is naturally innocent. So this is the strategy Mr. Ji said to force Han Anren to release Chai Wang, it's really vicious...)
Mr. Ji, it's your superior, under the golden mouth of the public, I, Han Anren, can't argue. But if you want me to judge Chai Wang as innocent, you've miscalculated!

Send the order, urgently report to Marshal Ye, I, Han, am incompetent and have made a mistake in the Blade Destruction Army. Please Marshal Ye appoint another general. Before Marshal Ye's order arrives, my deputy will temporarily take over the military affairs of the Blade Destruction Army, and must not make a decision on this case!
I, Han Anren, have been loyal to the country all my life, and today I can only prove my innocence with death!
Dead, dead?!|General Han--|What should we do?|We didn't mean it like this...

(This General Han is truly a man, proving his innocence with his death. And his statement that he won't acquit King Chai implies that King Chai is still suspected of treason. Until the verdict is out, he might have to stay in the Prison...)
This guy with the surname Ji is stirring up trouble and distorting the truth, framing the loyal and good, it's really annoying! {PlayerSurName} Brother, why would you help him?
This, this... I didn't know he would do this...
Disgusting, it makes me sick.
{PlayerName}, it's unbearable for such a villain like Ji to exist!
Hmph, what I hate the most is this kind of person who stirs up trouble!
Back then, General Yang was also framed like this...
You little brat, now you know what "words can kill" means.
It seems that not only weapons can kill...
Lies... all lies!
This is why you Han people can't beat us Yan people, you spend all your energy fighting each other.
Fellow villagers, don't panic, listen to me...

With Han Anren's suicide to prove his innocence, the people gathered here are all in chaos.\nSomeone was the first to run away from the Government Office, followed by the second and third person in panic.\nUntil only a few of you were left in front of the Government Office, Ji Baichu was still trying to say something, but no one cared.
Damn Han Anren, he really put on a show for me...
Mr. Ji, what should we do now?
What should we do...
Anyway, let's go find His Highness first!
Alright.
Your Highness, now that Han Anren is dead and the Blade Destruction Army is in chaos, what... what should we do?
You said Han Anren is dead? What happened?
Your Highness, this is what happened...
Idiot! You got carried away with a little victory, don't you know to leave some room for maneuver? You even messed up such a small thing?!
Your Highness, is Han Anren really that important?
He's not important, but I'm still under suspicion, and you've left a pretext for forcing a life official to death, that's what's important!
This...
Although I have the royal pardon, I can always find a way out, but you're different, how many heads do you have?
I... I'll release the news right away, saying that Han Anren committed suicide out of guilt...
Sigh... there's a reason why you failed the exams repeatedly.
Yes...
{PlayerSurName} young hero, I remember you wanted to find the person in charge of the Fengwen Platform, right?
Exactly, I have a score to settle with them!
Now I tell you, the person in charge of the Fengwen Platform is Ji Baichu in front of you. He took it upon himself to spread the news, and even I was kept in the dark.
Wait, Your Highness, I also--
Can't you take responsibility for your own mistakes?\n{PlayerSurName} young hero, he's all yours, I won't interfere.
Ji Baichu, I have no grudges against you in the past or recently, why did you slander me!
{PlayerSurName} young hero, I...\nWhen His Highness received Liu Fuming's report and was furious, I took it upon myself...
(What should I do with Ji Baichu?)
Total Annihilation, this man must not be spared! <color=#c44b0e>(Solo fight by the protagonist)</color>
Threaten Ji Baichu to correct his ways.
You can take your words to the underworld and tell them to Yama!
{PlayerName}, you Chai surnamed people, do you really think I, a mere scholar, am easy to bully!? Today, I will show you what I'm capable of!
Today, you will pay the price for defaming me at will!
Decisive in killing, a real man indeed!
I wasn't wrong, {PlayerName} is quick to repay kindness and revenge, indeed a heroic figure in the martial arts world.
Do you realize your mistake?
I know, I know...
So what will you do next?
I will go back and spread the news that the young hero is a great person...
What if you dare to offend again?
I dare not... I dare not...
You...
Tian Wu, what are you doing?!
This is not my intention, it's the prince's.
You say...

Ji Baichu abused the power of the news platform, not only defaming you, but also inciting the people of Phoenix Woods Harbor, causing the death of the parents of official Han Anren, he deserved to die.
{PlayerName}, you are highly skilled, I admire you very much. Now that Ji Baichu is dead, the position of the leader of the news platform is vacant, would you like to take over the news platform?

(Chai Wang is a strategic mastermind, even his many years of subordinates can be easily discarded. If I really work for Chai Wang, I'm afraid that one day if I don't please him, I will end up like Ji Baichu.)
Thank you for your kindness, Chai Wang, but please allow me to refuse.
Are you really unwilling?
I am used to being free in the martial arts world, I hope Chai Wang understands.
In that case, I won't force you.\nThis is a manual passed down in my family, in recognition of {PlayerName}'s efforts to save me, I will give it to you.
Now that Phoenix Woods Harbor is in turmoil, I need to go back to my mansion to take control of the situation, we will meet again if we are destined.
Chai Wang is a strategic mastermind, even when he is in prison, he has already calculated everything and kept himself clean.
As you walk out of the government office, Phoenix Woods Harbor is still bustling with people.
It seems that the death of Han Anren is just a grain of sand thrown into the water, causing no ripples.
You don't know if your choice is the best, but everything you do is true to your heart, and that's enough.
My fellow villagers, I know you all want justice. I already have evidence of Chai Wang's rebellion and will soon bring him to trial. You can all come to the government office to see.
Let's go, let's see!|Hehe, there's a show to watch~|I've never seen a trial before.|Justice is in the heart of the people!
It seems that Han Anren is full of confidence, why not go to the government office and see what they have to say in court.
Bring the suspect, Chai Wang, to the court!
Suspect Chai Wang, why don't you kneel?
I, Chai, am innocent, why should I kneel?
I found a ledger in the South-East Barbarian Camp that records your financial and military dealings. What do you have to say?
Is my seal stamped on it?
This...
Anyone can write such a ledger with a wave of their hand.\nWould you believe me if I wrote a Ledger now about General Han accepting my bribe?
I see you won't shed a tear until you see the coffin, bring the witness to the court!
Witness in the court, state your name.
I, I am Wu Liu...

Wu Liu, you are a Wu South-East Barbarian, because of a dispute with someone after drinking, you killed a whole family of sixteen people. Because you turned yourself in after drinking, you were given a lighter sentence and sent to Heavy Rock Reef, is this true?
Yes, sir, it's true.
So how are you here now?
Sir, a few months ago, a strong man came to the island and killed all the guards. He wanted to take us away from Heavy Rock Reef. Those who refused were killed on the spot, so I followed him.
After following him, I was blindfolded and taken to a dark place like a prison. There was a man in white who divided us into two groups and took us to different places.
I don't know where the other group went, I was sent back to Heavy Rock Reef, given weapons, and disguised as a pirate to rob everywhere...
But although I am a Wu South-East Barbarian, I can't swim, so I was caught by you...
Do you know where the dark place they were taken to is, and who they saw?
I don't know...
Have you seen the person in this portrait?
It's a bit far, but the person in the portrait seems to be... Ji Baichu?
I've seen him! That day, it was this man who divided us into two teams!
Wu Liu, if you dare to perjure yourself in court...
Same punishment as the criminals! I know the rules, I dare not talk nonsense.
Alright, take him away.
Yes.
Chai Wang, do you have anything to say?
column3: ท่านอ๋องไฉมีสิ่งใดจะกล่าวหรือไม่?

column2: I don't understand what General Han means.

Your servant Ji Baichu, colluding with pirates, there are also account books of your Duke Chai's Tower's supplies coming and going in the South-East Barbarian Camp, both human and physical evidence are here, do you still want to deny it?
You should ask Ji Baichu about this matter, not me.
Unfortunately, Ji Baichu is dead, otherwise I would definitely be able to ask some clues.
You say he's dead... then there's no evidence to the contrary.\nHowever, the evidence in General Han's hands can only prove that Ji Baichu colluded with the rebels.
He is your servant, how could you not know what he has done?
I have many servants, how could I possibly know what everyone has done privately?
However, since General Han mentioned Ji Baichu, I do remember something.
I believe General Han has already searched my house, right?\nDid General Han search the rockery in the pond?
What do you mean?
I once saw Ji Baichu sneaking around there, I don't know what he hid.\nWhy don't General Han send someone to check it out?
Go and find it.
Yes!
Please wait a moment, everyone.
(Looking at Chai Wang's confident appearance, he must have been prepared.)
A moment later...
Sir, there is indeed a harvest.
Show it to me.
Absurd!
General Han, what does it say on this?
Chai, do you think I'm a fool? You forged letters, framed all this on your servant Ji Baichu, and now he's dead without evidence, you're clean!
I don't understand what General Han means. Why don't you show me what this is, so I can answer.
Chai, you--!
(General Han's face turned green with anger, not knowing what the evidence was...)
Yeah, what is it?
General Han looks so bad, what is the evidence?
General Han, please reveal the evidence.
This is... a record of communications between Duke Chai's Tower and the South-East Barbarians, Pirates, and Heavy Rock Reef...
--The signature, seal, and recipient are all... Ji Baichu...
This means...

It seems clear now. With both human and physical evidence, it was Ji Baichu who contacted and bribed the South-East Barbarians and Pirates to cause chaos. The one who committed the crime of treason is also Ji Baichu.
Alas, I have chosen the wrong person, failed to recognize people, and failed to teach people. I let my servant commit such a crime. If he were not dead, I would definitely teach him a good lesson...
{yell} You, surnamed Chai, have calculated this step in advance--!
I don't understand what General Han means, but I think the evidence is solid, what do you think, General Han?

...Ji Baichu, committed the crime of treason, with both human and physical evidence, according to the law, he should be executed by dismemberment, and his nine clans should be implicated. But since he is dead, there is no need to carry out the sentence.

As for King Chai, due to his failure to discipline, he should be flogged eighty times and exiled to the frontier according to the law. However, as stated in the ironclad edict, this punishment can be waived. Please run away on your own.
After returning, King Chai will definitely discipline his servants properly. Farewell.
Court dismissed...
Chai Wang, you are a strategic mastermind, even if you sabotage, you can still get away with it.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, I have something to ask you.
...What do you want to ask?
What I want to ask, you naturally understand, I also know the answer to the question, but I want to ask you, why do you want to do this.
...I just don't like Ji Baichu, there's no reason.
You are a rule breaker, I didn't see it wrong.\nI wanted to make friends with you, but now it seems that I have to be on guard against you.
I didn't expect Han Anren to commit suicide...
Fool, don't you know the military law says: besiege the teacher must be missing? You push him like this, other than committing suicide to prove his innocence, where else can he go?!
I had everything planned out, even if I had to face him in court, I wouldn't be afraid. But your move has disrupted all my plans!
Han Zi has exhausted all his means, but he still can't do anything to King Chai.
Looking at the back of King Chai, you can't help but feel a chill.
